sprin chen gyis// mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// so sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyen dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod// de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba chen por gyur te// g.yon pa skyed pa mang pos mnyes pa dang pad+ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so// chos kun dngos po med par rab gsal ba// 'byung gnas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen// e ma 'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa// mdangs bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring// sku ni ldem la tsan dan dri// yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen// tshems dkar sum cu rda rdo med// mgul ba zlum rings rab tu legs// gser la g.yu spras g.yas su 'khyil// gzungs ma 'di dag bsten par bya// skad gdangs mi snyan ra ra po// yang na rmongs bag sub sub po// sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin// sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog/ dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzod// phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can// de bsten na ni dngos grub nyams// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la// rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin// bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis// yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs// ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas// kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas grub// bud med la ni mchod bsten na// ye shes chen po grub par

gsungs// dpal kun tu bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so// mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di// phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na// rnal 'byor sdom pa gnas pa yin// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun du khyab pa kun du sbyor// rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog/ de byi dkar sham mdog dang ldan// bcu drug bong tshod ring ba dang// lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang// dpral pa dbyes che kos ko phra// nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring// yid tsam mig dkyus ring ba dang// so dkar thags bzangs mtshams thung zhing// skad bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di la brtson par byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gnas rab bden par rab brtags te// sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan// lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can// so dkar thags bzangs mig dkyus ring// skad phra mdog dgod spro ring ba// dpral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa// rma nag la sogs gnas pa ni// rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yin// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las// 'di las brtson byas bsgrubs pa yi// de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las// phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na// tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni// sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs// bud med cha lugs legs pa ni// bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing// rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum brtsan dmar che// blun du chags pa mi shes med// lus la mtshan gyi rmad 'dras brgyan// tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang// so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan// chog shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// 'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig gis// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// lus zlum gtum pa nga rgyal can// khong na sems rnog sems la 'dzin// bya ba 'dra la mi gtong ldan// bslab pa'i blo rtul sha rus che// mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir gsal// sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dad// rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bag chags yi ge tshar gcod cing// ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na// bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu rtsen pa yis// yum gyi pad+ma kha phye zhing// bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rjes mdzad spyod bye brag gis// 'jig rten dag na dman

pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na// snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po gsungs// shan pa'i rigs ngan smad 'tshong ma'i// na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams// 'joms pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs// yi dwags gnod sbyin byol song dang// khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sogs// mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so so 'tsham pa dga' spyad na// las mchog dam pa 'grub par gsungs// rab tu chags la chags pa'i mchog/ rab tu rmugs pa rmugs pa sel// zhe sdang can la 'tsham par ston// grags pa can la zhi ba che// rtsen pa dag la rtsen par mdzad// thabs kyi mdzad pa kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams// gdul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med// shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis// gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad// shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis// grags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad// shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad// e ma 'o shin tu ngo mtshar che// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen pos rab tu brtson par mdzad pa// yid kyi 'phro ba dang// zla gam med pa dang/ gyad 'gyed pa dang/ khur pa bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do// sha mdog dkar la nu ma 'bur// stod smad phyed la smin dkyus rung// pad+ma'i dri yang dung ltar 'phro// pad+ma legs pa gro bos 'dra// zlum pa che chung snyoms pa'o// sha mdog dkar la sme ba can// stod smad phyed la sor mo ring// nu ma chung zhing mkhrang ba ste// dri yang pad+ma'i dri ru bro// mgul pa legs la ring thung ran// pad+ma dmar la mkhur tshos legs// spyan yang zlum la 'og nas lta// sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum// rked pa phra la ro smad zlum// rkang pa'i sor mo nang du skyor// lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms// tshems kyang dmar la thags kyang dam// sor mo rnams kyang phra la ring// dri yang tsan dan dri ru bro// yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen// pad+ma ser la phra la ring// spyan yang phra la zur du gzigs// sha mdog gnag la smre ba gnag/ sha yang gnag la rtsub pa ste// skad gdangs mi snyan gnyid ra ro// rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo// nu rdog che la nu bshal ring// rkang pa sbom la sor mo thung// gdong yang leb la sme ba mthug/ smin ma thung la mig mi sdug/ lus po spom thung mjing pa thung// pad+ma gnag la yangs pa ste// ba lang can gyi rigs zhes pa'o// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsal pa'i don ni/ rang dbang thob pa nga lo yang// bcos su btub la lung nyan pa// skad gsal lta bas thag chod pa// spyod

pa la dor rtog pa choms// yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po gsal// sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag/ dam tshig phog las mi 'da' ba// tshig la brdzun gyi gron theb med// dad pa skyo dang dub pa med// spyod pa blang zhing dor ba med// brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med// ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa// gom pa dal la spyod pa gzob// mig 'bru tshugs su mi lta zhing// 'og dang zur gyis rtogs par lta// dbu lo 'jam la lcang lor 'khyil// spyan bkra phra la dkyus ring ba// sna gzur zor la rgyud ma chad// ya yo nyag dad chad pa med// so dkar sum cu thags bzangs la// kos ko sogs bu yul gzungs 'dra// mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs phyed pa// rked phan chag gang zlum pa dang// mgul pa zlum la phra la ring// ngang mo bya yi tshul dang 'dra// sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang// phyag gi sor mo phra la ring// rna ba gro ba gcus pa 'dra// lce ni dar bltab khug pa bzhin// dbugs rgyu phyi nang med pa 'dra// gnyid chung sha yang sdud pa med// kha snabs med la dri zhim pa// sna tshogs spos dri lus la bro// bskyod par mkhas shing las la dpa'// sbyor drod rig dang ting 'dzin rig/ pad+ma dam la spyad na dog/ nu ma dag ni chung la sra// kha mchu+u srab la bzang ba'o// lha yi sbyor ba tsog pu// mi'i gan rkyal/ yi dwags zur gyis sbyor/ byol song kha sbub tu sbyor ro// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad bzung ste// dam du bcas nas mchod dus mi chag par phyi nang mi bsre/ dam bcas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o// gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te// mngal gyi srin bu kha dmar du skye'o// dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o// gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' mthun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni o~M la dpal chen po yab lnga la yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang sku la rdzogs so// de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shes lngar bstan to// a ltar snang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ zla tshes me long lta bu'i ye shes/ sna ru so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ a la btags par bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ yab yum rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar/ chos thams cad

ma byung ma skyes pa'i ngang la skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan no// ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang sprul pa lcam dral// phung po lnga he ru ka lnga/ 'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga/ khams dang skye mched phra men ma bcu drug/ sgal tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad// ba spu nyag ma re re sprul pa'i phra men ma dang pho nya/ yan lag sgo ba bzhi/ sprul pa thugs kyi rgyan te// sngags ma hA yo ga'o// dkyil 'khor la yang phyogs dang gral ma nor bar dgod do// sgo skyong yan chad rim bzhin du dgod/ ru lu lhar shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na sangs rgyas yin par shes par bya'o// ru lu mchod par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na/ bdag byang chub kyi sems mchod pas 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes pa ste// 'grangs shing tshim par 'gyur ro// tshim pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ru lu bsnyen par shes pa ni bsnyen pa ni dpal chen po'i sku'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni yum kro d+hi shwa ri'o// sgrub pa ni phra men ma bcu drug/ sgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar bsgrubs pas 'bras bu drod rnam pa gsum dang sbyar ro// 'od kyi drod ni bdag sgrub pa byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus la 'od 'byung ba ni drod dang po dang sbyar ro// 'don pa'i drod ni bdag sgrub par byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus bal 'dab g.yengs pa ltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro// drod kyi drod ni bdag gi sems tag tag rang rang nam mkhar 'phur snyam byed na tha ma dag sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ don dam par bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po'i nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang mo'o// de la gnyis su med pa ni sgrub pa/ rgyu byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos la 'bras bu kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems phyag rgya sna tshogs cir snang yang sgyu ma ye shes kyi phyag rgya tsam du snang/ snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste/ rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste/ thig le chen po'i ngang du ye nas ma bcos par lhun gyis grub par gnas pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste/ sgrub pa chen po'o// ru lu sgrar shes pa ni byi khung na bung ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o// ru lu dbyangs su shes pa ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren stangs kyis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho thugs dam bskul// rdo rje srin po ngur sgra yis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// 'khun cing

gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis// ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul// khong kun 'dren pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis// ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul// mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis// seng gdong la sogs thugs dam bskul// sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis// rdo rje tshig la skad mdangs med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ye shes dpal 'bar ma// o~M ni sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// ru ni gzi brjid 'phrul po che// lu ni yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ b+h+yo ni ma sring rgya mtsho tshogs// ru lu gser phreng rgya mtsho ste// phar spros pas ni sku la thim// slar bsdus pas ni thugs la thim// o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M// hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// ba~M las pad+mar gyur pa'i dbus// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// sha da pa la sogs pa yi// bskul ba bdag ni tshul bzhin du// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'o// sgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po// yum ni pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gyi sbyin pas bstim// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sku// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gsung gi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// thugs kyi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi thugs/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// shar phyog stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang badzra he ru kar byin brlabs nas// badzra he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ kun kyang rat+na he rur byin brlabs nas// rat+na he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten// nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang pad+ma he rur byin brlabs nas// pad+ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang karma he rur byin brlabs nas// karma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gnas rab gnas ni bsam mi khyab// dur khrod chen po gnas kyi mchog/ bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog/ yum gyi mkha' dbyings gnas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gnas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// zas rab zas ni bsam mi khyab// rdo rje dri chen zas kyi mchog/ rdo rje ga bur zas kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga zas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// skom rab

skom ni bsam mi khyab// rak+ta dri chu skom gyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skom// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// skyogs rab skyogs ni bsam mi khyab// b+han d+ha gsar rnying skyogs kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skyogs/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// yab rab yab ni bsam mi khyab// kun tu bzang po yab kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yab// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// yum rab yum ni bsam mi khyab// kun tubazang mo yum gyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum// o~M ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku// ru lu 'di ni sku yi gsung// ru lu 'di ni sku yi thugs// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi gsung// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi thugs// ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi sku// ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung// ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs// skur gsal gsung gsal thugs kyang gsal// sku don gsung don thugs kyi don// ru lur ma gyur gang yang med// stong khams thams cad ru lus bkang// ru lu dngos grub dus 'dir gsol// ru lu dngos su snang ba ni sku// de nyid ma skyes pa ni gsung// snang ba dang ma byung ba gnyis su med pa ni thugs so// ru lu sku gsum gsung gsum/ thugs gsum/ dgu phrugs kyi don to// o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M ni dpal chen he ru ka yab yum mo// ru lu gong ma brgyad ni ke'u ri ma brgyad// ru lu 'og ma brgyad ni sing ha ma brgyad/ hU~M ni sgo ba yab yum brgyad/ b+h+yo ni dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ hU~M ni sdud pa byang chub sems// lha re re la snying po grangs brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad dbul lo// khro bo rnams ni kro d+ha ni ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro gnyer snying po chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Di ma hA kro d+ha ma/ ha na ha na/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hU~M dru?~M bri bri/ bra ma ya bra ma ya/ bi dwa na sarbA ba ra na sarba duSh+tAM/ ma ta ma ta/ mo ta mo ta/ hU~M bri tra~M tra~M/ bri hU~M tra~M tra~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes/ bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo// pad+ma dza la ma hA kro d+ha pad+ma ba mu ka kha kha/ sarba duSh+tAM/ kha hi kha hi/ sarba dusta ba/ dusta na ma/ da ma da ma/ badzra sho da ka/ ta ma tha ma tha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha/ badzra kha ra tsa/ pa la du ru/ ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya ma hA badzra pa da ba mu ka/ pra ma pra ma hU~M phaT/ ti ha ha ti ha ti/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ bi phra na sha na hU~M hri/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hri// rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs ye shes kyi snying ga nas phyung ngo// o~M badzra be ga ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+tAM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra sa k+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen po mngon par sprul nas mche ba chen po 'khyil cing zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab tu za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku// dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag cha ma'i keng rus khrag dang sha dang lud pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pa rnams g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi mgo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang/ glang po dang/ bong bu dang/ rnga mo dang/ ma he dang/ phag dang/ ce spyang dang/ ra dang/ khyi dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rog dang/ bzhad dang/ byi la dang/ gzig dang/ stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gdong la sogs pa brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba/ zhal rnam par bsnyen pa/ 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang/ zhal rdo rje mche ba cher gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad stong gi g.yog dang/ shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khro gnyer can mang po brgya stong g.yog dang bcas par gnas so// nub phyogs su yang rta gdong khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so// byang du yang 'ur 'ur chen po khro bo brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shin tu khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/ he ru ka'i khro bo tshogs chen po de dag dang/ khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed byung nas nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad gang bar byas so// shin tu dgyes pa'i khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ o~M b+ho b+ho/ ma hA ba re ba da ra ba/ ma hA d+hi/ ha ra ha ra/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ ma ra ma ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ k+Shi kra na ma hA badzra tsaN+Da d+ha/ sarba duSh+tAM du ku/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jigs byed chen po dbul bar byed pa/ rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul du byed do// khro bo brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa// zhal brgya stong mang po me lce bzhin du 'bar ba'i sku/ o~M ma hA badzra ang/ ha sa ha sa/ ha ha ha hU~M ha/ o~M ti o~M ma hA/ be ra ba be/ shing shing/ tra tra tra~M tra~M/ ha ha i ti/ de nas

'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to// rdo rje he ru ka'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi byin bskyed nas/ 'khor thams cad thul skyabs 'og tu yang btsud nas dam tshig la gnas te yang dag par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzhad pas bzhad cing/ o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti ha na ha na/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+na/ ma ta ma ta/ ki na tsa ri ya/ si su ra ma hA sa/ sra ti re ke ba su+u ra dza la na la ra tshi pra ti dza li ta/ ma su ra ta~M/ A ka ta Ta A ka ta Ta/ a phya wa/ a phya wa/ kr-i Sh+Na tsa kra be ra brti da ya na hU~M bri/ de nas khrag 'thung gi sngags// o~M badzra sUr+ya b+h+r-i ku Ti/ khro da ma hA kri te/ da ra ba da ra ba/ su ra du ra ti/ o~M sa me dad ma ni tsa na/ o~M bra bra bi bra~M ba// de nas rta gdong gi khro bo chen po'i sngags/ pa hri/ o~M ma hA badzra ba da/ ba mu ga kha kha/ khA hi khA hi tsa du+u ra mu khang/ ba ba bi ba/ a ru ti ram/ ma kAr+ya hr-i da yan/ dra na/ dam de'u/ badzra ba daM ba mu ka/ hi hi/ sha hi sha ma hA she sha hi hi/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rta gad chen po mdzad cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te/ o~M gu lu gu lu badzra ma hA kro d+ha A ka ra Sha ya/ A ka ra Sha ya/ sha kra hr-i da yA na ma hA badzra daM Sh+tAM ya/ hU~M b+hak+Sha ya shriM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rol cing/ rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun du longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du+u ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba mdzad do// o~M ma hA sU ra ta/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha pa saM ha ra pa saM ha ra/ sarba kro d+ha ma sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba kro d+ha uts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma dre le sta ma ya/ sarba duSh+ta pra duSh+ta pra duSh+ta kro d+ha ma ba ba ya/ dzra la ya sha kra pA daM/ bai sha ra ma yi/ sha ra ma hA/ b+ha ga ban+d+ha/ su ra ti/ sarba ta thA ga tA sA dA na/ sa ma ye na tsa hoH/ su ra ta/ sa ma i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH TAk+ki hU~M dza hU~M TAk+ki hU~M TAk+ki hU~M/ o~M ga ta she hU~M dzaH/ A kar Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ ba shi ku ru/ sarba kro d+ha sa ma ya/ dzaHhU~M ya~M~M hoH/ TAk+ki hU~M dzaHdzaHhU~M/ TAk+ki hU~M de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po 'di phyung ngo// o~M sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i

dbang mo 'di phyung ngo// o~M badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/ uts+tsha badzra a mr-i ta hU~M AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun du khros te/ ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rig pa phyung ngo// o~M a mr-i ta sa man tsi pa ni a mr-i ta su mu te/ pra be sha ya sarbA na badzra/ pad+ma ma sa/ yo ga ni ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsi/ bi ta bi ti mur+t+ti ya/ rdo rje khro bo'i dbang mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga tA ma he shwa ri sarba duSh+tAM/ su ta ni ma hA prA la yA na/ sma shA na ba sha tsi/ ma hA badzra kro d+ha daMSh+tA kA ra le bi kr-i ta/ de ba na/ sarba sha du bra ma N-i hU~M hU~M ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/ khro bo 'di rnams phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang/ tho ba gcig khang pa dang/ thod pa dang/ mdung dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa dang/ rtse gsum dang/ be con dang/ mu su dang/ 'khor lo dang/ ka na ya dang/ to ma dang/ mda' dang/ gzhu dang/ shak+ti dang/ gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba mgul rgyan du byas nas nyi ma brgya'i me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i dbus mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o// o~M badzra ma hA d+ha ra/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA sma shA ni/ pi sha ni la dz+wa la ya/ ma hA pa pra pra dz+wa la te/ mu ti da ra/ ka pA la mA la/ bu shi da/ ma ku te/ ma ra ru d+hi/ ra dra ra ba/ tsi pu ri ta/ ka pA la ha ste/ kha T+wA ng+ga badzra/ tri shU la gan+d+ha/ ma hA kro d+he hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he ru ta muta pra ye hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gzi brjid mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rdo rje nyi ma nyid kyi khro bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M hU~M tra~M AH sur+ya badzra kro d+hI shwa ri/ da ma da ma/ gra sa gra sa asta ma hU~M phaT/ a~M hU~M bra~M dra dra dra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen mo rang gtong zhing// shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba che// dpung rgyan thod pa brtsegs pa byas// spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad cha byad cing// yi dwags chen po stag la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// pad+mo'i khro mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M hrIHbadzra pad+ma ba mu ke// kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho di ra/ bi go be hU~M/ he hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hrI ha/

sha ti sha ma tha ba/ badzra pa da pa na lam hoH te to hU~M hU~M hi hi hU~M/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// 'di ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro bo chen po dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur pa'i mi sdug gdong// mi lto stan la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pa brtsams// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing// g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes gdon ma za ba'i rdo rje khro bo gnyis su med pa'i 'dul pa'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba a mo g+ha ma hA byi shwi shwa ri hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M ha~M ma hA kro ti gra ma khe/ ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ri Ni sarba duSh+ta pra sha ma ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du// g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig gzhag bya ste// sna tshogs pa dang khyad par ldan// kun du yongs su bskor nas gnas// bskyed pa dang ni bcum pa'i gdong// rab tu drag pa'i ro byang zhing// gdong gnyer thod pas rtse mo byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gdong gsum la// za byed me bzhin lta ba yi// de yi ri bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang// rang gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de ni cho ga ci bzhin du// 'byung mo phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun du yongs su bskor// bzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung// de ni de yi stan la gnas// bzhin mi sdug la dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas// de la sogs pa rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sngags rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba badzra b+ha ra a nu rA gi nI ma hA ti sha traM hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra A kar+Sha Ni/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M dzaHdzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M badzra b+ha ra ku la ma nu rA gi ni ma hA badzra kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M ha he phaT hoH// o~M sarba badzra b+ha ro gra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M sa sa hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra b+ha ra ma hi ha tsa a be sha ka hU~M tru~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra b+ha ra ma hA su ta pri ti ka ro ke dra tha ta tha/ o~M sarba badzra ra ma hA badzra he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/ ma hA bi tsa ya tsa ra ba ye/ hU~M hU~M hU~M dru~M dru~M dra~M dra~M tha/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha a ta ha si ni/ hU~M hU~M driM driM tro Ta ya tro Ta ya hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra b+ha ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha b+hak+Sha Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hU~M hrIH/ o~M sarba badzra ma hA/

badzra d+ha ra badzra tik+Sh+Na krod+hI shA ri/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M badzra tik+Sh+Na ha ste/ ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya/ hU~M hU~M ma tha ma tha/ o~M sarba badzra b+ha ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha ri ni hU~M ma hA gra du bI ni/ hU~M hU~M pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma hA badzra tsakra Na tsakre Na tsUr+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA ke ra bA tsa ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ma ta ma ta/ o~M sarba badzra ma hA d+ha ra mi ta pi sha mu kha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ o~M sarba badzra ma hA d+ha ra ma ya pa ri hu du haM haM haM phaT phaT phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra yak+Shi Ni hU~M hU~M/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a bi ba bI hU~M phaT// o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra pa ni di ni ma hA kro d+he bin+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya/ bi d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra da ha ni/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra kro d+hi mA la ni/ hU~M hU~M/ gru~M gru~M gru~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badza kro d+ha gan+d+ha gra sa ni// hU~M hU~M gru~M gru~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ri ma hA/ kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA ma hoH/ kA la d+ha ri Ni ti pa ya/ ho da ho da/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA la si hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri mA le d+ha ra Ni hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI ga ti ni hU~M hU~M he he/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ni ri te ke hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA ka ra shi na/ dzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M dzaH o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha d+ha ra ma hA badzra pA sha hU~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra kro d+he/ ban+d+he ban+d+he/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya hU~M ba~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he pa she/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ho ho ho/ a~M hU~M tra~M hri hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra d+ha ra/ o~M badzra kro d+ha g+h+r-i Ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha TAk+ki ni/ ma hA he ma pa ti pa hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ku mA ri ye hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni dra sha mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra muSh+ti ni/ bi d+ya bi d+ya/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM sarba TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra kro d+ha ra li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra kro d+ha tsakra Ni/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA mi thod pa ti ke hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni se mya kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra d+ha na te hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ma ri Ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA a mr-i ta ka pA li ha ste hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA se n+ya kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni mr-i tu daN+Da ri hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni badzra sri ga li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni pi ba pi ba ru d+hi ra ma ma hA badzra pa li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra pA sha ba pa sha k+Sha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra sha ni bi phe hU~M phaT// o~M badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA badzra bi she hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni A na ya A na ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA badzra be ka ni gu gu ma ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni badzra dz+wa la ya/ b+hasmi ku ru hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra mi ka te hU~M phaT/ o~M

badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra ha ste hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra ke li pra be sha pra be sha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA su ma sA sha ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ka ra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ka ra sha ni mi ta ka la mu ki hU~M dzaHdzaHhU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma bi sha ni hU~M phaT/ khro bo spyi'i bsnyen pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// o~M ba hU~M bi bi ta ro// dra san ti ta/ yi ni shai she/ sarba bi dA na ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta dza le dza le/ pra dza le pra dza le/ gur bi gur bi/ k+Sham sarba ma ba pra Ni/ b+h+yo hU~M hU~M/ o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ bsnyen pa'i grangs brgya dang stong dang 'bum mo// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i khro bo'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rol pa rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// khro bo rdo rje mgyogs pa'i dbu lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ phyag brgya rtsa gnyis pa phyung ste/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ban te/ ba~M ba~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA do sha na sa ye hU~M pha Ta/ a a/ o~M badzra ma hA rak+Sha sa ma ya sa ru ti/ ra ma ti da pri ya/ ma hA ku ma ba kA ru na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ k+Sha o~M badzra ma hA rak+Sha/ a gat+ta ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba badzra ga la/ ba shi na b+han da/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra rak+Sha b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ bi sha ya/ bi sha ya/ bi be sha na sarbA na/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ma hA ra sha sa/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ sarba ma hA bi kr-i ta nan/ da sha grI ba hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka'i sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// smu?g nag sngo nag/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT/ zhal re re nas hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra mang po phyung bas/ khro bo 'bum du gcig tu phyung ste/ hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra mang po 'byin cing 'jig rten gyi khams dus gcig tu gang bar gyur te/ dregs pa thams cad brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa ma dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ ma dang mkha' 'gro ma 'bum chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// ma mo 'bum gyi rgyal mo dbyings nas bzhengs// khyod ni ye shes lha mo 'bum gyi gtso// zhing

lpags rlon pas sa gzhi 'gengs mdzad ma// zhing chen rlon pa g.yang gzhi ral pa can// gzig lpags rlon pa stong gi sku smad bklubs// sbrul nag 'bum gyis yan lag rgyan du sgril// thod rlon thod skam thod tshal mgur chu dpung rgyan se ral kha// khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yas pa las// ye shes lha mo tshogs ni brgya yang 'tsher// khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yon pa la// las byed lha mo brgyad cu gnas// nyin zhing rgya mtsho gting nas bzhugs pa'i tshe// klu rgyal 'bum gyis dkris shing mchod pa 'bul// mtshan zhing ri rab rtse la bzhugs pa'i tshe// gnod sbyin bu mo khyod kyi pho nyar gtong// bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag tu gnon// gshed ma don du gnyar zhing dgra snying tshal par 'gas// bsur chen dud pas 'jig rten ma lus 'gengs// sha chen ro la rngam zhing dpal chen zhal du stobs// rang yang za zhing grogs la bdar bar byed// ma dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bskul bskyod la// las la 'khril zhing chos kyi dbyings su bsten// mkha' 'gro za byed mgyogs ma gshog pa can// mkha' 'gro 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can// mkha' 'gro rngam pa'i zhal gdangs mche ba can// mkha' 'gro 'byung ba 'dzin pa'i sder mo can// mkha' 'gro khams gsum rngub pa'i mchu rings ma// mkha' 'gro dug gsum za byed 'bar ba'i sku// las kyi mkha' la 'gro ba'i shugs can ma// don gyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i ye shes yum// de nas mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi las byed par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba rtse gcig ma'i ting nge 'dzin du mdzad do// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum la skyes pa'i bdud bag chags kyis mtshams sbyar te// bdud ru tra nag po sems can dang rnal 'byor pa la 'tshe zhing gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pas pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// til mar sna tshogs kyis lus bskus pa'i rdo rje mche ba can dang/ nag mo mi thod thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ba can dang/ rnal 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang/ mgo bo cod pan legs spras rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang/ lag na mtshon thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ma dang/ dgra bgegs dbang du sdud pa'i rdo rje g.yul zlog ma dang/ sbrul gyi ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung thung ral gri thogs ma dang/ zhing lpags rked par dkris shing khrag gis myos ma dang/ mig rtsa dmar por gyur pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang/ mtshan mo dur khrod du rgyu ba'i 'byung mo sgrol ma dang/ ko rlon smad dkris thod pa se

ral khar thogs ma dang/ mi ro rgyu ma tshems kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang/ khrag gi thig les brgyan pa'i rdo rje dri tshor ma dang/ zhing chung 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang/ rdo rje zhag gi tshom bu can chen mo dang/ rdo rje mi ro sha la chem chem za ba'i rdo rje mche ba 'dzin ma dang/ drag po 'dul ba'i rdo rje drag mo chen mo dang/ ma mo skrag par byed pa'i khams gsum dbang du sdud ma dang/ zhing la rkom par byed pa'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang/ nag mo lus mdog gnag pa'i rdo rje me stag 'phro ba mo dang/ zas su khrag tshil za ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang/ kun la dbang mdzad rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ zas su sha rlon za ba'i rdo rje rnga mo dang/ e ma ma tshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang/ dpal ldan chen po rdo rje lcang lo can ma dang/ kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skems ma dang/ lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang/ nag mo mig gcig rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang/ sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can dang/ lcags kyi bya khra khyung gi g.yu mig can dang/ thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje 'byug ma dang/ rdo rje ral gcig chen mo za byed ma dang/ rdo rje tri shul thogs pa'i zhag gi tshom bu can dang/ tsham ngam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang/ rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje gzugs can ma dang/ cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdo rje rdzu 'phrul can dang/ khro gnyer spyan bgrad rnal 'byor sngo nag chen mo dang/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i ral pa 'khyil ma dang/ thod pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun tsa la dang/ dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba dang/ sti ra chung ngu mang po brgyus nas brgyan te rdo rje brjid ma dang/ tsham ngam brkyang bskum rdo rje 'jig rten skrag ma dang/ bdud bzhi gnon pa'i rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa dang/ stir chen glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang 'jigs su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i rnge'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra can dang/ log par lta ba'i rdo rje bdud rnams 'dul ba dang/ ro la rngam pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang/ gsod cing sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor sngau nag ma dang/ khro gnyer spyan bgrad rdo rje mche gtsigs ma dang/ tsham ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri shUl mda' 'phen rdo rje 'gengs ma dang/ dgyes par byed pa'i rdo rje se gol rdebs ma dang/ 'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang/ rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang/ tsham ngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stabs tshul can dang/ rnal 'byor mthing nag rdo rje stir chen za ba mo dang/ bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa klad 'gems ma dang/ gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ljang ma dang/ khro gnyer

'jigs pa'i dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang/ rdo rje tri shUl rnge'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs ma dang/ 'ching zhing sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ser nag dang/ gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen za ba mo dang/ zhing chen nang grol 'byin cing rdo rje tsham ngam can dang/ sgrol bar byed pa'i rdo rje mthing nag dang/ spyan bgrad mche gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang/ sti ra 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung zhal du stobs ma dang spu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje b+han d+har ldan ma dang/ zangs gris 'debs shing kha T+wAM 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha za ba mo dang/ ro la brkam pa'i rdo rje za stangs chen mo dang/ rdo rje ser nag seng ge mgo can dang/ mche gtsigs spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rje sdang mig can dang/ mche tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje zhe sdang 'joms ma dang/ mthing nag rdo rje seng ge ral pa can dang/ rdo rje ye shes sku'i cha lugs 'chang ma dang/ mi 'jigs sti ra'i g.yang gzhi gsol ma dang/ srog chags mang po'i snying 'byin rdo rje klad 'gems ma dang/ dmar mo chen mo sti ra mgo can dang/ ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang/ mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhi se ral khar thogs ma dang/ bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang/ b+han d+ha rak+tas bkang nas gtso la stobs shing dgra sdang klad 'gems ma dang/ gsod byed sngo nag dur bya'i mgo can dang/ mche tshogs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang/ thal chen rak+tas rdo rje sku la brgyan ma dang/ spu gri mgo gcod b+han d+ha 'thung zhing gsod la dga' ba mo dang/ rdo rje zhags pa 'ching zhing khrag 'thung zhal du stobs pa dang/ mthing nag 'gying stabs rdo rje shwa na khyo mgo can dang/ glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang/ phrag dog 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba dang/ dmar nag 'gying ba'i bya rgod mgo can dang/ zhing chen rgyu 'dren gti mug 'joms par byed ma dang/ gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thod rlon 'dzin ma dang/ ser nag 'gying ba'i pho rog mgo can dang/ klu rnams 'dum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang ma dang/ mthing nag 'gying ba bya rog mgo can dang/ ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang/ sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro dbu gsum ma dang/ lcags kyus 'dren pa mi 'jigs sbyor ba dang/ rdo rje bka'i pho nya spyan gsum mche ba can dang/ rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can dang/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang/ snying rje phag gi mgo can dang/ rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang/ rdo rje gzig gi mgo can dang/ rdo rje byi ba'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje pha bang mgo can dang/ rdo rje dred kyi mgo can dang/ rdo rje dom gyi mgo can dang/ rdo rje sdig pa'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje

wa'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje stag gi mgo can dang/ rdo rje rta'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje spyang ki'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje pu shud kyi mgo can dang/ rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje spyin gyi mgo can dang/ rdo rje phag gi mgo can dang/ rdo rje rnga mo'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje bya rog mgo can dang/ rdo rje spang ti'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje ske ka'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje khra'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje spre'u mgo can dang/ rdo rje khu byug mgo can dang/ rdo rje seng ge mgo can dang/ rdo rje pha bang mgo can dang/ rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje srin bya'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje sre mo mgo can dang/ rdo rje zer mo mgo can dang/ rdo rje dmag pa thang gog gi mgo can dang/ rdo rje nyi ma'i zhags pa can dang/ rdo rje me lce glog phreng 'dzin dang/ rdo rje srin mo mdung thung 'phen pa dang/ rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang/ rdo rje klu mo thog 'bebs mo dang/ rdo rje 'jigs byed ba lang gi sna dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin khyung gdong ma dang/ rdo rje lag na khrag thogs ma dang/ rdo rje zla ba skar mda' ltar gtong ba dang/ rdo rje dam tshig bsrung ma dpal phreng ma dang/ rdo rje lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang/ rdo rje ri rab bsnyil ba'i rngam stangs can dang/ rdo rje dmar mo spyan gsum shin tu mi srun ma dang/ rdo rje cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can chen mo dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang/ rdo rje smug nag gtibs pa'i me dbal can dang/ rdo rje keng rus 'cha' ba'i tshems rnon ma dang/ rdo rje bzhad ma'i shin tu gad rgyangs chen mo dang/ rdo rje nang grol 'dren ma kang ka'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma dang/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen char 'bebs ma dang/ rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje sgrol ma dang/ rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje shan pa spu gri rnon po'i so can dang/ rdo rje go cha sra bar byed pa dang/ rdo rje sprin tshogs mang po sdud par byed pa dang/ rdo rje 'ur 'ur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang/ rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang/ rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT sgrogs ma dang/ rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon ma dang/ rdo rje zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan pa dang/ rdo rje drag po'i nga ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang/ rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang/ rdo rje seng ge stabs su mchongs pa'i nga rgyal can dang/ rdo rje sprul pa mang po 'gyed pa'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje sti ra gnas myul bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje phyi nang mtshams myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje de bya'i sbyor myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje 'dod

chags ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje dur khrod ro za 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma dang/ rdo rje ser mo sbrul gyi ska rags can dang/ rdo rje gnam lcags 'ur mo thog 'bebs ma dang/ rdo rje brgyal byed dngangs par byed ma dang/ rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brgyal bar byed ma dang/ rdo rje kha nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang/ rdo rje dbu stong phyag stong bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar byed ma dang/ rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro chen mo dang/ rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsugs 'khyil ma dang/ rdo rje sku yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang/ rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed ma dang/ rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul mnga' ba chen mo dang/ rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul dbang phyug mo dang/ rdo rje rin chen sku'i dbang phyug ma dang/ rdo rje pad+mo dbang phyug ma dang/ rdo rje dbyings la sbyor zhing stan byed ma dang/ rdo rje mgyogs ma dbu dgu ma dang/ rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang/ rdo rje tsher ma dang/ rdo rje myong ma dang/ rdo rje reg byed kun la 'khyams dang/ rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang/ rdo rje sngo nag ral pa can chen mo dang/ rdo rje ljang nag dbu brgya ma dang/ rdo rje ljang sngo dbu drug ma dang/ rdo rje ba lang gi mgo can ma dang/ rdo rje ser nag dbu bcwa lnga ma dang/ rdo rje smug nag dbu brgya ma dang// rdo rje ljang ser khro gtum dbu dgu ma dang/ rdo rje ser mo dbu gcig ma dang/ rdo rje dkar mo dbu lnga ma dang/ rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang/ rdo rje bsnyems ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje ser mo bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje mda' bsnyag ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje skul byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje rlung 'byin ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje rjod byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje 'jigs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje 'phrog ma brlag byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje yid 'phrog ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje khrag 'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje tshe 'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje rmugs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje srin mo snying zan ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje skul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje 'bebs ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje rkan 'jib ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje sgrub pa tshe 'dzin ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang/ rdo rje thod

rlon dang sbrul nag 'khyil ba can dang/ rdo rje zhing chen stod g.yogs chu srin smad g.yogs can dang/ rdo rje za byed kha 'bar ma dang/ rdo rje nam mkha' lding dang/ rdo rje khra dang 'ug pa dang/ rdo rje bya rgod chen mo dang/ rdo rje byan lag dang/ rdo rje kang ka'i lus la chu srin gyi mgo can dang/ rdo rje gshog pa gtams pa dang/ rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ma dang/ rdo rje mchu rtse gcig ma'i gdong can ma dang/ rdo rje so gri can dang/ rdo rje kha gdangs ma dang/ rdo rje karma mud ka ra dang/ rdo rje 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can dang/ rdo rje smigs bu'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje khwa'i mgo can dang/ rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdun pa mo dang/ rdo rje myos pa mo dang/ rdo rje dra ba mo dang/ rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje byed pa dang/ rdo rje dang ba mo dang/ rdo rje kha spu can dang/ rdo rje ral gri spu can dang/ rdo rje lcags kyi pags pa can dang/ rdo rje zangs kyi kha spu can dang/ rdo rje ka li pi ka'i dbyings can dang/ rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ched du 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rab tu gtogs pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gzugs kyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje sgra'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje dri'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ro'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje reg gi tshogs dang/ rdo rje khro mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gos gyon pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje bza' btung gi tshogs dang/ rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje klu mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje dbye bar byed ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje pad+mo phreng ba ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje bde ba mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sprin sdud ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje mnyam pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje nyi zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje zhing 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje nga rgyal can gyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje thim par byed pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ngo mtshar chen po'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje 'khor lo ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje pad+mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje bka' nyan sprul pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje spyod pas cila'ang thogs pa med pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rigs su thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sdug bsngal

sel bar byed pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rigs su skyes pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sems ma ye shes su snang ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje snyom las med pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sgyid lug med pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje the tshom med par bsgrub pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gsang ba ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rnam par spros pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rgyan bkod pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje bstan pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje nam mkha' la rgyu ba mo'i tshogs dang/ snying rje skyon dag pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gdul ba mo'i dgongs pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gab pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sbas pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje shes rab 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje bde ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje drang snang mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rang 'byung mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje kun du mang ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje kun bzang longs spyod gnas pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rmongs par byed pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje srog za bar byed pa mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje za ba mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje khrag za ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje tshil za ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rkang za ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje bsod nams gter 'chang ba'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sgra mtha' yas pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje yon tan phrin las kyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje lhun gyis grub pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rgyu las 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gtum bag can dang/ rdo rje gdug pa gtong ba sbrul gyi chun po can dang/ rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad pa dang/ rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje lus stong la mgo bcu pa dang/ rdo rje lus brgya la mgo gcig pa'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje lus sna tshogs dang/ rdo rje yan lag 'bum yod pa dang/ rdo rje gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ rdo rje lus brgya la mgo stong yod pa dang/ rdo rje lus brgya la mgo brgya pa dang/ rdo rje lus bcu la mgo gcig pa dang/ mgo brgya pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang/ mgo dgu pa la rkang pa gcig pa dang/ de'i 'khor gyi yang sprul gyi pho nya ni lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po dang/ long ba rgyab sgrel ba dang/ nag po mgo dgu pa'o// shar gyi dkar mo sbyang dung gi khyi mo chen

mo dang/ lho'i sbrul gyi zhags pa can dang/ nub kyi dmar mo zangs kyi mche ba can dang/ byang gi ser mo dril bu can dang/ 'di rnams kyi pho nya mo ni shar gyi rdo rje sder mo dang/ lho'i nag mo dung gdub ma dang/ nub kyi dmar mo seng ge'i mgo can dang/ byang gi ser mo las kyi bdag mo dang/ rdo rje rus chen phreng ba can dang/ rdo rje zangs kyi phreng ba can dang/ rdo rje lcags kyi phreng ba can dang/ rdo rje ral gri so can dang/ rdo rje nam mkha'i gung gcod ma dang/ rdo rje nyi ma'i zer zhon ma dang/ rdo rje chu bo'i gzhung 'dral ma dang/ rdo rje rgya mtsho'i gting dkrugs ma dang/ 'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o// drag byed bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pho nya'i las 'di gsungs so// o~M hU~M pho nya sum brgya drug cu rnams// yud tsam gyis ni kun 'dul zhing// yud tsam gyis ni phyogs bcur 'phro// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po ldir// mgo gsum po la lcags sder can// mi sha za zhing bdud dpung 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing// klu yi khyim rnams rab tu 'joms// rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni// 'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'phros// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan// glog 'gyu ma dang 'dra bar grags// chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdud// ye shes thugs rjes 'brel bas kun la khyab// phrin las dra bas 'gro ba rlabs kyis grol// de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma// o~M dz+wa la badzra hU~M/ ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod// skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye bsal byed// phrin las glog 'gyus 'gro ba yud kyis sgrol// dra bas sdud la glog 'gyu ma yis 'dren// badzra a ma ka hU~M/ 'od zer dud ka 'phro ba ni// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs ma rlung dang mtshungs// mig gsum yo la lcags sder can// mgo gsum po la rkang gsum pa// mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing// klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms// 'di rnams khro bo pho nya ste// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi// khro bo thams cad nges par 'jig/ na mo byi tsir b+h+yo// ha ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po// lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad// lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin// rta mgrin gnas kyang nges par 'joms// mgo drug po la rkang drug po// lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod/ rkang pa gsum ni phur bu

'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud kas reg pa ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig/ lag pa g.yon pas bskyod pa ni// phra men 'khor bcas ral par 'bar// lcags kyus dgra sta rab thogs shing// zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog bas nges par mgyogs// skad ni 'brug pas shin tu che// rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus kyang gnag la 'od phung gnag/ yan lag gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan// ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyang gnag la lag nag po// mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang// maM sa za zhing ri lu sgrol// mig kyang med la cang mi smra// yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro// 'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// dung gi khyi mo chen mo la// dung gi ba lang sna khrid can// dung gi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la// lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na zhags pa sgril ma thogs// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// zangs kyi khyi mo chen mo la// zangs kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na lcags sgrog sgril ma thogs// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la// gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dril// 'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka pho nya bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa// sku mdog mthing nag dbu sum brgya phyag drug brgya pa zhig dgod/ shar du rdo rje til mar dgod/ lhor stag gi mgo can dgod/ nub tu g.yag gi mgo can dgod/ byang du sbrul gyi mgo can dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma la brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum la pho nya sum brgya bcu dgod do// de'i phyi rim snam bu la pho nya lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dgod do// de'i phyi rim snam bu la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do// de'i phyir rim sgo ba bzhi// pho nya las byed bzhi dgod do// ci bgyi dang/ bka' nyan dang/ bka'i pho nya dang/ sprul pa dang/ yang sprul pa dang/

'di rnams yang dag pa'i bden du nges par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las rdo rje pho nya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo// bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa// thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol// yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las// 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khro// gnyis med dag las phrin las snying rje snyoms// dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing// brda can yan lag len pa'i don go la// lha brgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'grel// bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os// zhes bya ba'i don to//// lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum// lung gi spy-i gcod man ngag gdeng du bya// spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phub la// bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa gcad de// khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad// 'di ni khrag 'thung rngam brjid rgyal po'i lung zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo'i sde zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ lung gsum gyis sna grangs te rde'u bya'o// man ngag gsum gyis mjug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to// spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad do// spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbub po// bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba btsam mo// rtsis mgo drug gi sa gcad do// khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas ni gol sa dang ni sgrib pa spang ngo// yon tan kun rngom pas brjid gzhan la snang phyir rngam brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan te/ rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyal por gsol lo// lung gis spyi dril de bshad do// de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas/ de ni phye byang ngo bstan te gses nas bshad pa/ de la lung gsum ni zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram/ gdod bcas don dang bstun de 'tsham par bshad// ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du nges// de la man ngag gsum ni bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thong// yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings su gcig/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag/ de la spyi don gsum ni/ med rgyu btags chags sgrub 'grub bltas par snang// spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dbal sos

'dul// rtog 'joms sman rdzas dngos len dngos grub rgyu// 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad// de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni// gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro// gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// ngang khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcas so// rtogs pa thugs rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang// gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas// las dang 'bras su sems can sgrub pa'o// las bzhi sgrol mdzad 'bras su sku gsung thugs// ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni// dus gsum mi yang sha rus khrag la rol// gang gi ro ni hU~M dang ha he phaT// gnas na lta 'og mkha' stong ye shes thugs// bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro bo'i sku// 'bras bu dpal chen phra men tshogs kyis bskor// phra men las drag 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni// tsham ngam drag pos lha chen 'dar 'gyel brdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig/ dus gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za// rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs// rtsis mgo drug ni dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang// dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang// ye shes dang ni nan tan dang// drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro// de la dbang ni chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ni// mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul// dran med thod pa kham por g.yang gzhi ni// kha dang rgyal mtshan me dang lha chen gnon// de la dpal drug ni/ byams las khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs// gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal// khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin// de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste// de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba// bka' khyab sprin 'dal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun// ting 'dzin bsam yas bo d+his thogs pa de// bsam yas bsam khyab mkha' la gza' skar gsal// klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa// mang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang pho nya'i dbang// dug lngas gdos bcas 'du byed rgyan byas pa// khrag sbrul g.yang gzhi kha ta dregs pa 'joms// de la gzugs rnam pa gnyis ni/ mi thung bus pa'i gzugs 'dra la// a gon la ni rkang lag gtams// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la// shin tu mkhrang zhing skems bags bri// gnod sbyin snying bags mi mthun gzugs dang ni// 'dul dbang yi dwags srin po drang srong 'dra// de la grags pa ni bud d+ha bo

d+his bstod dam sras spun dgongs// gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags// de la ye shes ni/ rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral// 'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das// gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang// mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin// de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'du// nan tan phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas 'don// bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson// nan tan mchog gis mchog tu shes par bya// da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do// de yang mi 'da' brgyan gyi lung dang/ che mchog yon tan gyi lung dang/ yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do// de la mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung ni/ glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa// bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung// stag ni dpa' rtun za byed rgyan zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje'i phrin las ngang du bstan// sbrul ni mnyen lcug phrin las rgyan zhes pa// 'jigs tshul dug gnon 'khril pa yum gyi rgyan// thod phreng dbang sgrol 'chad pa'i rgyan zhes pa// sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang chad sgrol// g.yang gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa// byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya// rak+ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje'i spyan// gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam kun du 'ong// thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa// yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog/ me ni 'bar 'phro 'du sreg klong dkyil zhes// ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul phrin las te// zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya// me sgra sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa// chos sku khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa// ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ma ni// de nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro// sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya// 'dul dbang mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpogs// zhes bya'o// de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad do// de la dpal he ru'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang ma nges par 'byung ste gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub bo zhes bshad do// de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang// de la dngos byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub ces 'byung ngo// 'o na yang 'di'i gnas skabs su// he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad de/ de yang yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang/ mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so// de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni dbu gsum

dug gsum sku gsung thugs lhun grub// lta spyod rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags// spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste dgu// bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa// rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' yangs dbu ma'i spyan// shangs gsum srog la mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum// de bzhin nyid du kun du snang zhes bya// sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin snyan// zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub// ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags// mche bzhi phrin las mthar phyin zhi ba'i tshul// ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste// pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs bzhi lam bzhir bgrod pa med pa thob// de la mdzad pa rtags zhes bya ba ni/ spyan dgu sa dgu 'dul pa'i bye brag gzigs// spyan gsum srid gsum mgo rgyud so sor mkhyen// shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs// snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan// dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs// zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad par rngub// ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs ngar sgrogs// khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin mo lce// mche bzhi skye shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad// phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhir phrin las rnam bzhi bgrod med sgrol// yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dag bshad// rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni// rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms// chos sku rdo rje rtog dang bag chags bsreg/ ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya// b+han d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtog zhen khrag thugs rje skyed// mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngags bzod pa'i mchog/ kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// dug gsum dga' byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms// stong gsum srid pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// spyin pa'i za bas mkha' 'gro tshim par byed// rdeg pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po bshig/ rtog pa chos nyid dran med shes lnga bzung// ci ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya// thong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs tha ba thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing// ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags// thabs kyis sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro// brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul med ma skyes chos sku rnga sgo la// 'dzin

pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs// gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan// pad+ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan// mi zad par ldan spyin pa'i pha rol phyin// ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis gcod// rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad// dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams// rang gnyer las kyi brda tsam chos sku rtogs par bstan// de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dril te bshad pa ni/ yon tan gyi brjid la phrin las kyi rngom sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la nam mkha' ri mo phyag rgyar rngom/ cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom/ zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ tsham ngam chen po'i stobs rngom pa dang bzhi'o// de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med pa la nam mkha' la sprin dang ba'i tshul dang/ lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang/ smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang/ srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri med pad+ma nyi zla 'od yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang/ stobs chen bcu'i tshul dang/ rnam pa ni 'og nas 'chad do// gsung gi rngom bzhi la hom lnga 'brel par 'byung ba'i zhal rngom/ zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags rngom/ skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom/ gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngom pa'o// de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang/ gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang/ rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang/ mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i tshul dang/ 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do// thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/ phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi dba' rlabs ltar rngom/ yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rngom/ mdzad pa rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o// de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang/ zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin las zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang/ zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang/ zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed pa'i

tshul lo// mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bcos pa'i gnas rngom/ lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom// rtogs 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/ de yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang/ gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang/ zhing khyad par can khams gsum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang/ spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu bcom pa'i tshul lo// rngom tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad do// de la brjid chen po la/ sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid che/ bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o// de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sku che/ thugs rje dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul rags/ sems 'du byed dang mnyam par 'byung pa'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang// smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs dang mthun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong/ rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ gsung gi brjid bzhi la gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid che/ tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la cher ston snyam pas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid che/ de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che/ sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang/ sgra dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis go bas myur/ nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas the tshom gcod/ byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/ thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston/ shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/ tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas 'dul/ thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/ yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid che/ gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/ thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o// de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ spang blang med pa'i sgo nas re dogs med/ lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mar gsal/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas gnyis mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar 'byin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa sel/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams thabs kyis 'dul/ yon tan gyi brjid pa bzhi la/ med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig la 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che/ gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che'o// de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/ ye

shes kyi sgo nas gcig/ sems kyi sgo nas 'dod dgur ston/ sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor// grub pa rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad// shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos/ phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ mi mnyel nyams phag rol pas brjid che/ 'khor ba yun ring mi mnyel bar brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pa'i brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o// de yang sgyu mar gyur pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol/ spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun rings por bzhugs/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ mthu yi sgo nas mgon skyabs che/ dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad/ rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs/ nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub// brjid nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu ste spyir drug cu'o// de la rin po che sna bdun ni 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur ro// btsun mo rin po ches ni yul gyi rgyal po la mnyes par dbul lo// dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so// khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhis rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to// glang po rin po che'i stobs bcus pha rol du bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do// rta rin po che'i myur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i gnas sleb par byed do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi re 'dod skong ngo// lung rnam pa gsum ni mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis mgo spyir sbyar bar zad/ de nas 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcu ni/ skye bzhi skur ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad pa// lha mi sdig sbrul mche ba bzhi ru ston// yo byad brid pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni// rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol// ci ltar mos bzhin 'dod dgu gzugs ston pa// gar dbang 'thad dga'i tshul du rol pa mdzad// rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas phra men 'phro// lus ni ci rdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston// gad rgyangs gdangs ngar sgrogs pa sna tshogs kyis// mche ba zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston// shes rab thabs ldan spyan gnyis dbu ma'i ngang// dbyings las ma g.yos cir yang sa le mkhyen// sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dad 'phro// bsam gyi mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad// rdo rje sder mo pags pa spu phreng brgyan// 'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i tshe la dbang// lta ba rnam bzhi spyan zur gyis bskul bas// phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad// smon lam dbang gis drag po skur ston pa// dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med// de la btsun mo rin po che'i dbang ni/ ma chags rdo rje

gzugs kyi yum gyis 'khyud// zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor// thogs med shugs 'chang don grub yum gyi bskyod// lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis mnyes byed 'babs// 'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha mo ste// bde ba chen po'i sku la mnyes par dbul// dmag mi rin po che yi tshul dgu ni// bsgregs pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul// nyam nga med pa'i mdza' spyod dpa' bo'i tshul// gdug rtsub gdos bcad brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log par ltar ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul// shin tu gdul dka' la khro snying rje'i tshul// smon lam dbang gis mi shom rngam pa'i tshul// nyon mongs grub pa'i gyur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul// de la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni/ khro gtum tshad med byams par snang// bsod chen snying rje bdag nyid che// bsgral zhing bstabs pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni/ thugs rje chen po'i stobs ni dregs chen bsnyengs phyir gnon// chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog/ mi 'byed stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun// ma spangs stobs ni gdos bcas sku+u la brgyan// ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i brgyan// smon lam stobs ni bskal par yongs grol mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan phra men 'phro// phrag dog log lta 'khor bar gcig mi gtong// 'dod chags yud tsam 'phral 'dod spyan bzlog dmar// de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ chos dbyings med bzhin cir snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par bkram// ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du bdal// sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// ro la cig car 'babs snod bye brag phye// de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni/ 'gro rnams ci ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skong// mi zad bdag nyid gter chen nam mkha'i mdog/ srid gsum mun nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron// dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rin chen phreng// lung gsum ni rtsis mgo spyir sbyar ba yin no// da ni lha rgyud kyi rtogs pa so sor bshad par bya ste/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pa dga' rgyud ston// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha he ru ka/ ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms// thabs 'dzin mchod pa'i dngos po bshig/ zhe sdang tshul

gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje badzra he ru ka/ rin chen dbyig ltar kun skong zhing// bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing// lhag mthong me chen 'bar bas thams cad sreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// sra brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// lhag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// sbyin pas mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ngar 'dzin bro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// bdag med zhi gnas dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// bzod pas mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// thogs med las la dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs// 'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yi dbyug to can// dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs gau ri ma// sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs// mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tsau ri ma// gsung gis thams cad zil gnon rmongs pa'i tshogs// dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi yong chu srin ni// mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par lta// stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo ha// thal ba byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs/ kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin// sa dgu rtog 'joms shi ba slong bar gzigs// 'jig rten thal byed rnge'u thogs be tA li// 'byed med shes rab mi rtog lbos mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las// khro

gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol// bde mchog dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka si// zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum ma'i tshogs// myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs// snod bcud dkrugs nas skongs mdzad g+hasma ri// chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha can// ma ni rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags// mtha' gnyis spangs bas rnam par g.yengs tshul bzhugs// 'bar ba stong gsum stobs byed tsaN+Da li// thams cad 'byung ba'i lhun 'gyur ma tshogs ma// kun gyi las mdzad chos kun snying po 'dzin// kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan// thugs rje 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha ni// 'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yul// gnyen po stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don// sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sing ha ma// dpa' brtun za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don du// thugs rje ye shes rtse gcig so sor gzigs// nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad bya khra ma// mdzes byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum// thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la gtang// 'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma// mi ma byed spyod pas mchog rigs kyi yum// g.yer ba'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srung// chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// phrag dog las grub za byed shwa na ma// yid kyi ye shes so so kun la rtog/ rnam shes kyis bsad god 'brang tshul khrims srung// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod rgyud 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin// mgyogs mas snyags byed khrag 'thung kyi gya ma// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid
