'grogs mtshan ma 'joms// gsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pas pha rol phyin// mtha' 'das chos sku gzugs 'dzin spangs tshul bzung// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal che 'phrog ka ka ma// bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag cing// mi mthun gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos sku thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kang ka ma// dbyings la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs// gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin// dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin las 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rngam tshul ka/ bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dpal chen bcu drug sa la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku// thogs ma med cing yon tan zla ba med// sbyin pas rigs pa'i klung du mtsho drang ltar// 'khor

bas 'jigs nas thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dren// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin don mdzad pa// thugs rjes shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// don dang mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad// byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyun 'dzin cing// rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong// yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma// gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don// shes rab sgrol mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel// don nyid mi 'da' dga' ba'i mchog/ kun gnyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan// snyan par smra bas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed// btang snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don du// phab nas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho// chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril 'khrol ma// da ni srin mo'i lha rgyud bshad de/ bcwa brgyad spyan gyis bco brgyad khams la gzigs// bcwa brgyad shangs nas bcwa brgyad sprul pa 'byung/ bcwa brgyad khams la bcwa brgyad skur ston cing// bcwa brgyad thugs kyis bcwa brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'// bcwa brgyad snyan gyi bcwa brgyad khams gsan cing// bcwa brgyad ljags kyis gsung rab bcwa brgyad 'chad// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dgongs pa bsam mi khyab// sa dgur thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan// brjod gnod zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon// ci ltar rol yang spyan dgur dbyings mi g.yo// 'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing// rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs// rnam thar gsum las sku gsum phrin las 'byung// spyod pa rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs// ral gsigs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol// bcwa brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad rtsa bting ma// brjid pa'i stobs kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing// phra ma'i skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// chos la dbang mdzad ha ya grI ba dpal// 'dzin tshul stabs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing// log lta'i nyes spangs yang dag lha dang ldan// tshul khrims mthar phyin drang srong spyod pas tshe// skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon// shugs 'chang stabs kyis rlung lha tshar gcod cing// 'khyal ba'i spyod spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'dod pa kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i tshul// sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal// 'tshir ba'i stabs kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan// ngag rtsub skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtse// las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN+Da li// gnon pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing// gnod sems nyes spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug

che// mnyen pa'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing// rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che// rdegs pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing// bden dang bral ba'i brdzun spangs skyon sel ba// mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzad pa// ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can// 'debs pa'i stabs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing// brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// bzod pa sa gzhi lta bu gzhir 'gyur ba// smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN+Da li// zlog pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cing// 'dod chags skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal// skye bzhi mos pas dbang mdzad hU~M ka ra// rol pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod cing// ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che// rab tu shes pa'i shes rab mthar 'byin pa// yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// 'jigs byed stabs kyis 'chi bdag zil gnon cing// srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan ngang la gnas// tshe la dbang mdzad 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed// ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching// thugs rjes zin pa'i srid las grol// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsnyems// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad la se ki// rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin// thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor ba mi gtong zhing// shes rab thabs kyi lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin// gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad dra ti ru// ye shes mtshan sdud thugs rje khrod 'byung zhing// sprul pas 'gro bsgral sku dang ye shes 'phro// shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye// sta na pa tis khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes// dbyings su mtshan ma shes rab tho bas brdungs// thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms// dbu mar ye shes snying rje mi rtog dang// mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu ha la// rdo rje gtum mo mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom// thugs rje rngam tshul srid pa thal bar brlag/ gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs// ha ya grI ba mnyes mdzad tsaN+Da li// phra mor 'bigs pa'i ye shes dbyings su 'phen// 'bigs pa'i ye shes gnad du thugs rjes rdeg/ ma khyogs dbu ma chen po'i don ston pa// gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed sha ya ti// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra// dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra// de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa// bdud rtsir 'khyil pa sha ya ya tis mnyes// bdag rtog log lta'i mtshan ma kun bcom zhing// za byed mche bas skye bzhi rtsad

gcad de// sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa// pad+mo 'khyil pa mnyes byed ma ra na// thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul// thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// gnyis med mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs// ma ha ha la mnyes mdzad tsun da ma// bskyod pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod// thugs rje shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor// thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spor// ba ya ba tis khams gsum hU~M mdzad gnyis// sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod phrin las dpa'// yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtan// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mthar thug sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed bya khra ma// sdang mig mi 'gyur thugs rjes zhi la gnon// mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung bzlog/ tsham ngam ral gsigs gdangs ngar 'jig rten 'gengs// de phyir 'gyur med phra men tsa sa ra// rtog pa'i dgra spangs dran pa'i dgon par gnas// 'khrul skyon dri med shes bzhin rdzi mtshor spong// 'gro don dus la bab na thugs rjes 'jug/ de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i ha ri na// chos dbyings gnas mal rtog pa'i skyon sel zhing// thugs rje spu ris sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad d+h+ya ma// yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan// mi 'dul zing thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs// dus la bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// de'i phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i rtsa la ma// ye shes dbyings la 'jug pa shes bya za// dbyings nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon mongs za// gnyis med ye shes phrin las 'khor ba za// de phyir za byed pu ka mu ka pa// rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul// phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// stong nyid sgra bsgrags mu stegs wa tshogs 'jigs// de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sing ha ma// dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rje rmi// lhing nag nag po drag po sku ston pa// thugs mchog rnam dag chos nyid dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir rmi byed phra men ri k+Sha ma// ye shes thugs rje stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon// tsham ngam ral gsigs sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms// las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs kyis rol// de phyir stobs ldan phra men ha k+Sha ma// lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas rlan gyis brgyal// thugs rje 'khor bar smon lam stobs kyis myos// rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang sme med par rol// de phyir phra men myos byed u ka ra// yid g.yo las can sems par gyur pa ni// ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo//

don mdzad god 'brang ye shes dbyungs su mkhyen// de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi kya ma// bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni// dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pa za// thugs rje 'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags sbyong// de phyir phra men za byed don ka ma// dbyings la sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur// ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pa nyin mo nyal// 'gro mdongs rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldan// ye shes thugs rjes drangs pa'i u lu ka/ brtags pa'i dngos la rtse gcig ting 'dzin 'gyur// mnyam nyid mtha' bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba// rtog ge spyod yul byis pas mi mthong ba// de phyir sbed byed phra men ba ya ta// las 'bras bden la yid ches dad gyur tA+e// mnyam nyid dbyings su ye shes thugs kyis mgyogs// zhi gnas spyan rdzi lhag mthong bgrod tshags chung// de phyir phra men mgyogs byed b+hag shi ta// nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa'i mos pa gyur// lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur 'dzin// zhi gnas gces par 'dzin pa mi 'phrogs pa// de phyir phra men 'dzin ma tsa ta ma// 'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran par gyur// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ma brjed dran// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor gsal// gnyis la ma rmongs zin ma ti ti la// chos rnams 'byed pa'i byed par gyur pa ni// mnyam nyid ngang du log lta sel byed cing// rig pa skyed pas som nyi the tshom gcod// de phyir phra men gsod byed na ku la// 'jug pa rang dbang med pa'i gnyid gyur pa// bstan pa'i chos sgrogs log lta myos byed cing// mnyam dang mi mthun log lha myos byed phyir// thams cad myos byed phra men 'u shi ka/ gsum 'dus gcod pa'i reg pa gyur pa ni// phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad cing// phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyings su bros// de phyir phra men 'bros byed ka si ka/ 'khor ba'i rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das/ chos sku rdo rje brjod pas mtha' gnyis spangs// rjod byed brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral// de phyir rjod byed badzra ba sha ma// chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig/ ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs// phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud bcom// de phyir 'joms byed badzra be ra be// 'chi med bdud rtsi yul sems skye 'gag med// grub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras bu thob// thugs rjes 'gro bdud rtsi gtong bla med bsgrub// rtsi mchog ye shes badzra a mr-i ta// ye shes 'phrog byed yon tan rgya mtsho bsgrub// thugs rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du sdud// ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ub// de phyir brlab byed badzra ma ra na// da ni pad+ma dbang chen dang/ dbang phyug ma lha

rgyud brjod par bya'o// bcwa lnga spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge bcu// ye shes lnga dang so so cis 'dul mkhyen// snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan// shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'phros pas// rgyud lnga'i mgon mdzad brtson ldan rta dbu lnga// dug lnga zhal du shar te rngub mdzad cing// ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chang// skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol mdzad shog bzhis skyod// bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dren// phyogs brgyad 'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad bcom// rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis// phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan// che ba che ba yang che bla na med// bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa lta// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas bcu drug sa la zhugs// phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu// mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzigs// tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// dbang chen yongs su 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ye shes lhun grub pa// dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal// thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa skyon mi gos// mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad pad+ma he ru ka/ rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo gzugs 'dzin cing// thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zas su za// srid pa'i sems can chags pa'i snying khrag gsol// dbang drag las mdzad ma bu rak+Sha si// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtogs tshangs pa'i gzugs// tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan// zhabs bzhis smra 'don gling bzhir bkra shis brjod// gti mug yid bzhin rin chen pra ma ti// thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma// ma rig dug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal rtse bsnams// bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad bka' zlog ma// chags pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma// thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel pa'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs// phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhed chen can// 'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo po sna be// 'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen// rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs// nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i mdung thung 'phen// gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad go'u ri// rdo rje las mdzad kun gyi bla na med// lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing// mtshon sbyin brgya mdzad mi dmigs sku dkar mdog/ gsod byed rdo rje 'bebs byed in dra ma// byams dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar// b+han d+ha snod yangs bcud kyi khrag mtsho la// rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma// sdug bsngal dbyings su skyongs mdzad pi ka lam// sems can

gdul thabs khro bo mchog tu mkhyen// mun sel sgron 'bar bdud kyi nad gsos mdzad// 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs kyang// chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad a mr-i ta// zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen// zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku// gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing// gtan mchog thams cad stobs byed se'u mya la// dbyug pa 'tshog pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen// thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las ljang gu'i mdog/ nan dbang drag shul 'tshog pa'i dbyug to bsnams// dregs byed spy-i nas 'joms mdzad d+ha na ham// log par lta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/ skye ba 'phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mtsho gsol// las mdzad chags pa gser gyi rked chings can// drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu rak+Sha si// phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes// snying rje rgyun skad ba su zhags pa yis// chags med zhing du khams gsum kun 'dren ma// rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol mdzad bak+Sha si// 'tshog pa dbyug pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mkhyen// gtum bus gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad ma// yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma// stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral gri ma// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen// chos rnams gnyis med don rtags rtag tu myos// nyon mongs tha ba bzlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing// dge ba'i lo tog skyed mdzad ru ti ram// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad cing// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pu spyod// gsod byed 'dra mdzad e ka ra tsa ma// bud med chags pas 'gro ba dbang du byed// thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las// 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum yid 'phrog ma// thugs rjes zhen pa'i ma no ha ra ma// khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing// gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad sgo gtong can// mi zad nor gyi gter ldan bum pa 'dzin// sdug bsngal re skong thag thug si ti ka/ reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbugs kyi srog sbyin tshe 'phel ma// bde gshegs ras rgyus sems can sgrol mdzad cing// khams gsum gnas nas skyon mdzad ba ya be// snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// gsad pa nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad// sdug bsngal dbyings su gsol mdzad ma ra na// gzi brjid can de me yi khams te mchog/ 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsregs// za byed bskal pa dus mtha'i tshul ston pa// lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro ag na ye// mche ba dag pas skye bzhi rtsad gcod

bzhugs// nyan thos tha ba zlog mdzad phag gi dbu// 'og gi phyogs nas srid gsum stobs kyis spor// skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed ba ra ti// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos mkhyen// thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad// dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'chi bdag zlog mdzad cing// lung gi dur khrod dbang mdzad dza mun ti// 'jigs las lhags pa'i grags ni gzhan med mkhyen// stong phrag brgyad cu grags la mnga' mdzad cing// sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi gi'u wang mthong// sdug bsngal nad gsos mdzad pa'i pu ta ma// chu las lhag pa'i nor ni gzhan med mkhyen// nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrogs mdzad cing// gdug pa 'dul phyir dug gtong sbrul zhags bsnams// zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud ba ru na// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shUl gdengs po bsnams// thugs rje shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams// 'khor bar thugs rjes shar ba'i ka ma la// chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo can// byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing// gang la ci 'dul de la des ston pa// yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka lam// ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam bca' gnyis// mi 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs// dam tshig sgrog gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing// ma rig nub mdzad kum pa ka rnam 'phrul// sku gsum yon tan phrin las mtha' klas pa// stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs// so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa// ma chags byang mdzad lam po d+ha ra ma// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las bzlas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang 'di bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ pad+ma'i lte ba la rag ta'i maN+Dal byas te/ dbus su badzra he ru ka/ shar du bud d+ha he ru ka/ lhor rad na he ru ka/ nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/ byang du karma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma bzhi// de'i phyi rim snam bu la go'u ri ma brgyad// de'i phyi rim la sing ha ma brgyad/ sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa/ zhing gi rgyal mtshan/ ras chen gyi 'phan gdugs/ tsit+ta'i thog/ maM sa'i bla res de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims te// yum kun tu bzang mos rang gis mtha' la byang chub kyi sems blangs te/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskur ro// de nas

bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// byang chub sems nyid sgom pa'i dbang// dbyings dang dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// sems nyid rtogs pa'i thig btab ste// de ru slob ma bskur bar bya// chos rnams thams cad brtag par dka'// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das// da ltar sa gsum gnon pa ni// sems can nang na mi yin te// sangs rgyas mis ni bsgrub thag nye// byang chub sems de'i don rtogs nas// 'bras bu yang dag mngon du 'char// de las kyang ni ma gtogs pa// de las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// sems nyid dngos po de las med// bstan cing yang ni rtogs par dka'// bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi'ang de las med// sems kyis brtag par dka' na yang// tshig gis 'di yin bstan dka' zhes// sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'di// de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// bo d+ti tsit+ta hU~M/ phyi yi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na// sems la srid pa thams cad chub par 'gyur// nang gi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na// sems la sku gsung thugs kyang 'phrugs par gnas// gsang ba'i tshul du snang ba thams cad ni// yum chen kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya// sems ni snang ba shar ba'i ye shes yin// gnyis su med par rtogs na chos kyi sku// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ mngon pa'i sangs rgyas che ba yum chen kun tu bzang// bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po ni// yab yum gnyis su med par gyur pa las// byang chub sems nyid bde ba chen po yin// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas bde ba chen po ni// yum dang sems nyid gnyis su med pa yin// rdo rje sems ni ye nas mi 'gyur te// skye 'gag med pa'i sems nyid don yin te// sems dpa' yi ni bdud bzhi med pa'i don// kun du khyab cing bdal ba dpag tu med// thams cad man ngag la ni thams cad rten// gdod nas 'tshang ni rgya ba'i che bar gsungs// phyi ni snod kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na// 'byung ba lnga las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// nang ni bcud kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med ces bya// rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' las 'das// sems la dngos po med cing gzung du med// gnas ni yum gyi b+ha ga ya ti ste// rnam par mi rtog chos nyid stong par gsal// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rig pa rnyed pa dag la shin tu gsal// byang chub sems kyi dngos gzhi ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas gzhan na med ces 'byung ba yang// mi rtog pa'i lta ba mi bslad

pa'i ye shes te// mi gtong ba'i spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i sems nyid yin// mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig mi 'bral ba'i gzungs// mi g.yo ba yi chos nyid dbyings dag pas// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// mnyam par shes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// mtho ris srin mo na rag dmyal ba kun// mnyam pa'i don dang rig pa gnyis med pas// 'di dang phyi ma'i don du bsgom par bya// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// mdzod gsum ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas// nang gi tshul du gnas ni rtogs 'gyur na// sku gsung lus ngag yid gsum gnas gyur na// de yang gsang ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya// kun gzhi yid dang rnam shes yid dang gsum// gsang ba'i mdzod gsum yin pas bskur bar bya// de la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ba// tsit+ta'i dbyings nas 'od ni tshon gang 'phro// dkar ser snum la 'dril ba gcig tu gnas// las 'phro len las gzhan ni len pa'i tshe// sems ni rta dgug nyid rgyu ba yis 'dus// mi chags mi 'khor ba yi don de ni// 'od dang bcas pa tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rtag pa chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod pa ni sems kyi mchog/ bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste// bdag gi gsung ni 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi sems ni mi bskyod pa// sems nyid dus gsum 'gyur ba med par gsungs// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// thig le chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa// man ngag gnyer chen rnam shes tshogs dgu ste// yid kyis rnam shes las 'phro len pa'i don// rnam par shes pa'i byang chub sems nyid 'di// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// med pa'i phyal pa dang ni gcig pu lhun gyis rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las// gzhan nas sangs rgyas btsal gyur kyang// btsal kyang rgyal ba mi rnyed do// thams cad 'gyur med byang chub sems dpa' las// ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar gsungs// byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab bdal te// bdag dang gzhan du med par rtogs pa la// de ltar sus rtogs skyes bu gcig pu yin// lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// dran pa'i sems can sems kyi rang bzhin ni// dkar 'tsher snum la 'dril bas byang chub sems// mdzangs pa zin po sems shes de la bya// blun po byol song sems ni na bun dud pas 'dres// sems gnas phung po tsit+ta'i dbyings dkyil na// 'od kyi thig le

dkar 'tsher gnas pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems de ni// ti dang ra dang nas btags zhabs 'khyud rnams// gu gu zla tshes dag tu gnas gyur te// mi las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi sa bon 'di// bdag gis ma yengs brjed bral med par 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la// mgon chun de las gzhan med do// rnal 'byor dam nyams gzhan gyis mi skongs kyis// bdag gi sems nyid kun tu bzang po'i ngang gyur na// bya tsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yang// nga dang bdag tu 'dz-in pa dbyer med mnyam pa chen po dang// de la sangs rgyas gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas rnyed par ma gsungs so// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// glang po dpal gyi thugs ka nas// lcags kyi zer chen bzhi 'phros te// glang po dpal chen he ru ka'i// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// 'od zer dgu 'phros gdug pa ma lus bcom// 'gro ba mtha' dag rnams kyi don byas te// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang// kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka/ de ltar lags pas rtogs na byang chub sems// gang nas btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// bdag med khams kyi snod gang du// rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste// re dogs med par phung 'gro yang// nyam nga med par lam gyi mchog/ gza' gtad med pas don du bde// de bas rang sems bgrod pa'i sa// byang chub sems ni yangs zhing rgya che ste// de bas bdag gis lus rtogs na// snod bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog rnams// shes gsal blo ldan rnams la ye nas rnyed pa gsal// bla ma'i rgyud mchog de la yod ces gsungs te rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bsgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ma bsgoms stong bral med// thugs nas zhal du byung ba 'gro ba'i don du gsungs// rna rgyud ston pas thugs brtol te// lus dang sems las ma gtogs bsgom du med// bsgoms nas sems nyid gzhan nas btsal yang rnyed par ma gsungs so// dus gsum rgyal bas ye nas ma bcos te// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi sku// chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang med// man ngag shes rab sbyin chen des gsungs pas// lus dang sems las ma gtogs na// bdag gi sku gsung thugs la tshang bar gnas// gal te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi yod na ni// don

rdzogs sgom pa po yang yod par gyur// lus sems skye ba med bden pas// bsgom du med par 'jog pa gang// don kun rdzogs shing chub par der gnas so// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung ka lci// zla ba shes rab gsal ba thabs chen te// thig le byang chub sems nyid dkar la 'tsher ba yi// dmar ba yug gi rak+ta byang chub sems// rlung la shor du mi rtsal thig le sgrom du sba// de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// man ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzugs yin te// gsang ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam shes nyid kyang zla ba yin// thig le sems kyi rang bzhin snum la 'dril// man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi thig le yin// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rang 'byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la// chos nyid rang gis gnas pa'i rang bzhin la// dmigs bral ting 'dzin rgya mtshor rab sprul te// yid ni 'phags pa'i lam ni gnas pa ni// phra zhing zab pa bstan dka' rgyal ba'i sku// dran pa byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags gsum// kun gzhi pad+ma'i yig 'bru+u gsal bar byed// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rgyu ni skye ba med pas rnam par dag/ 'bras bu 'gags pa med pas byang chub sems// byang chub sems de skye med ye shes dbyings// skye med mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don// sems la rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// nam mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs rgyas so// sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so// me rdo rje chos nyid rin po che'i sangs rgyas so// chu rdo rje snying rje chen pos brlan pa'i sangs rgyas so// rlung rdo rje 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas so// 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ro// dngos grub stsol ba rnam gnyis te// nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings las mnga' brnyes nas// gang ltar bsgrub kyang dbyings kyi don// chos kyi dbyings la 'char ba dang// dbang chen dbang sgyur 'chi ba med// sprul pa kun tu bzang po nyid// sgrib dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang chen ni// de yang sa gser zla ba me// gser dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni sa zhes bya// zla ba me dang 'dra ba yin// byang chub sems nyid kun tu bzang// gsal zhing dro la nyon mongs sreg/ byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin// yab yum gnyis med rol pa yi// rak+ta byang chub sems dkyil

na// ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// gsang ba'i don gyis dbang bskur ro// gsang ba yum chen kun tu bzang// rak+ta byang chub sems dkyil na// ma hA su kha'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// sems kyi thig les thig btab ste// dkyil 'khor zlum po 'khyil ba la// chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i sku// don gyi dbyings nas lha dang lha mo dgod// nges pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ro// nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po ste// lhun gyis rdzogs dang spros pa med pa yi// thugs kyi dkyil nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sras// kun tu bzang po yum dang don gyi thabs chen las// man ngag dang bcas pa yi ye shes snying po'i don// bcom ldan gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// dpal chen kun tu bzang po ye shes te// gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// dkyil 'khor ma hA su kha'i gnas// ma hA su kha'i dbyings nyid na// byang chub sems nyid de kho na// ye shes chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas gnas// ma hA su kha gsang ba chen po 'di// don dang ldan te kun tu bzang po yin// ngang las ma g.yos kun tu bzang po ni// gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// yum gyi nags tshal chen po 'dul med du// rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du bzhugs// ngang ni dus gsum bzhugs shing rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin// bdag nyid 'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub// gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// srid pa byang chub sems su ma bcos thig ler zlum// sngar 'das dang ldan bzhugs dang phyis 'byung ba'i// sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// nyon mongs dri ma ye nas med pa'o// ye nas sangs rgyas ma skyes lhun gyis grub// byang chub sems nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// dpal chen kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i don// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa mang po 'phro// lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'du'o// phyag rgya 'gyur ba med pa rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o// sku ni thams cad chos kyi sku ru 'dus// lam ni thams cad rol pas chub pa'o// yum gyi dbyings chen rang bzhin rnam par dag/ zas ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga yi don// spyod pa bya ba med pa chen po'o// thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga' sa le ba'o// ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi don// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rnar brgyud ston pas thugs brtol te// nges pa'i lung dang don yang sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro ba zhes// byang chub sems ni kun tu rtag pa'i

don// rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po nyid// dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// sku rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal// lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang// ye shes sangs rgyas de las med// lta ba 'di la gnas shing rnal 'byor skal ba bzang// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs dam byang chub sems kyi don// don dam dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// dbyings nas gsal shar bdal ba la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byam re yas// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yid la thim// 'greng ldog spyi'u tshugs gar 'gyur yang// gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don// thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// mun nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal// ye shes khrus kyi rdzing bu ru// dri la dag pas rdul mi 'go/ dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid las gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i phra men ma dang/ khro bo rdo rje bka'i pho nya rnams la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang// de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams su grub bya'i phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya 'dzin// rnam grol dag pas gsung skad sgrogs// dril bu 'di ni sgra snyan gyis// phyogs bcu kun du sgrogs par byed// dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// rak+ta'i mgo ma yin gyi sa byugs la// de ru dpal chen dgod par bya// phra men 'khor dang pho nyas bskor// de ru slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum gyis bka' stsal to// phyi'i dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te dbang rdzas lnga bcu rtsa lngas dbang bskur ro// nang dbang dpal chen po yab yum dang/ khro bo dang phra men rnams kyi phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro// gsang dbang thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo las dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sku gsung thugs mnga' ba'i rtags su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgom mo// de nas kun mkhyen ye shes kyis thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes go shag gis phye la kun du snang gi ting nge 'dzin du bsgom mo// de nas

rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du yi ge hU~M mthing nag las sku smug nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ gsung gi drag shul spyod pa'i sngags/ thugs ting nge 'dzin hU~M mthing nag las 'phags pa'i skur bsgom mo// de nas he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'khyil ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mnyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang// grub pa rdzas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bdud rtsi btung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ lha'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdzogs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dgyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ don yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun du 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa 'joms pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ tshul khrims chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbu ma chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bden pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgra sgrogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin dang/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'bar ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gtum po rngam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ khrag 'thung chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lbos pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ seng gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzhad gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi ting nge 'dzin dang// bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ brgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rngam par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ glo snying nang grol 'dren cing za ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ cho 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin dang/ byin gyis brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i rgyud gsang ba zab mo las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje

las phyung ngo// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// thog mar rtog bsgoms bdag nyid bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya// 'khril ba'i 'jig rten mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mchod par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// bza' dang btung dang bca' dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya// mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod// sha chen dang ni dri chen dang// ga bur rak+ta dri chu dang// ma he rta dang khyi sha dang// na ge ge rgya gshog pa can// 'di dag 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbul// pad+ma can dang dung can dang// ba lang can dang ri mo can// 'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dbul// zhing gi rgyal mtshan sha chen tog/ ras chen dag gi bla res dang// zhing gi dbyug pa tsit+ta'i tog/ til mar dag tu bcas pa rnams// 'di dag mchod par dbul bar bya// mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na// thams cad ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// phyi yi mchod pa dang nang gi mchod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las mchod pa gsang ba'i le'u stai dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// bla med mi spang ba dang/ bla ma bkur ba dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang/ gsang ba'i don du mi smra ba dang/ rtsa ba lnga dang sgrub pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ gti mug dang/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang nga rgyal dang/ phrag dog dag mi spang ngo// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri chen sha// dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// ye nas ma nyams rtogs pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spong mi 'dor gnyis po ru// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyaur ba ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob gyur nas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa nyams pa yi phyal ba dang// gso la nye bar mi brtson dang// skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed// nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// bsgrub pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung// dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis

la// gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su med// bsrung bar bya ba dang mi spang ba brgya nyi shu/ dang tu blang ba brgya nyi shu/ spyad par bya ba brgya nyi shu/ spyir sum brgya drug cu'o// dam tshig 'di rnams ma nyams na 'tshang rgya'o// nyams na dmyal ba yin par shes par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// blang bar bya ba'i snod ni gang// spang bar bya ba ci lta bu// mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis// spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis// gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang// drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang// dum bu brgyad pa rab tu grags// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang// dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges// dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang// sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste// thal ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug/ kha dog bdun du rab tu grags// nyi rim dang ni glang po'i rgyab// 'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes// dung sngo gcig dang dung gnyis dang// chag pa dang ni mtshams ky-is pa// 'di dag thams cad rab brtags te// rab tu brtags te spyad par bya// shin tu mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam// snyi ba'am yang na dul ba'i sar// sngags kyis btab ste gnam du bskyur// ltung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya// lho phyogs kha bltas bram ze med// srin po'i phyogs bltas glang po snyol// nub kyi phyogs bltas rigs ngan te// rlung gi phyogs bltas gsang mi thub// byang gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur/ dbang ldan phyogs bltas sngags grub ster// shar du bltas na bdag nyid gsod// me yi phyogs bltas she'u shing med// 'og tu bltas na rkun por spyod// steng du bltas na bud med gsod// glor bltas de ni rigs ngan te// snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams so// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// dge ba sprul pa'i snod dag ni// dum bu gcig pa sa la dbang// gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur// gsum pa de yang nor la dbang// bzhi pa de yang sngags sgrub 'gyur// lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrub// drug pa de ni slong ba yin// bdun pa de ni brtul zhugs so// brgyad pa yongs su spang bar bya// dum bu gcig pa bram ze'i rigs// gnyis pa de ni rgyal po'i rigs// gsum pa rje'u rigs yin pa ste// bzhi pa de ni dmangs rigs so// bu gu med dang mang ba ni// mkhas pas shin tu spang bar bya// bong chung ba dang srab ba dang// gang dag ser po 'gyur ba ni// bud med yin par shes par bya// bud med rab tu smad pas na// de dag rab tu

spang bar bya// ser skya dang ni dkar ba dang// kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya// dung med pa dang dung gnyis dag/ lha mo sprul pas mi blang ngo// dung sngo ba dag sdug bsngal te// bya rog rjes ni 'thab rtsod 'gyur// nyi rim gyis ni gsod par 'gyur// glang po rgyab ni nad du 'gyur// 'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste// gsang ba sgrub thod mtshan nyid ni// yan lag che phra mang ba'i bdag/ dpag bsam shing ni yod gyur na// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te// sngags pa de la the tshom med// dbus na gshong bu bzhi yod na// 'di ni 'dod 'jo ba zhes bya// mdun na gshong bu gnyis yod na// yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o// de yi mtshan nyid ldan pa'i snod// su dag rtag tu 'chang ba ni// longs spyod thar pa thob 'gyur te// de la lha mo the tshom med// de nas rigs ni rnam bshad de// snod rnams kyi ni bye brag dang// dung dang kun zla 'dra ba'i mdog/ snum la mnyam du sdug pa ni// sngags rnams thams cad 'grub ster yin// dbang phyug chen por shes par bya// thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che// pad+ma'i dbyings su 'dab mar brgyan// tshangs pa'i skud pa gsal ba yod// 'di dang tshangs par rig par bya// sbrang rtsi ser skya'i mdog 'dra ba'i// zhi ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan// khyab 'jug pa yi snod yin te// zug rngu dgra rnams 'joms par byed// kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa la// pad+mo dmar pos brgyan pa dang// zlum pa shin tu rnam pa ste// snod 'di gzhon nu ma zhes bya// cung zad ser zhing zlum la zab// gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa// de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa// dbang phyug chen mo rigs chen yin// phag mo'i gdong dbyibs 'dra ba la// rab tu mkhregs shing mu tig 'phro// sha yi dri dag mnam pa yi// snod ni phag gdong ma zhes bya// thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che// thig le chen pos rnam par brgyan// khrag 'dzag pa yi dri mnam pa// 'jigs byed ma yi snod ces bya// snod kyi khyad par shes byas nas// sngags pas 'di dag rtag 'chang na// bdag bka' byed na bzhin bzangs ma// de la bgegs kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// snod kyi dngos po khyad par ni// tshangs pa bram ze bcang bar bya// rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed// sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu// khyab 'jug dang ni 'byor kun la// rtag tu las rnams 'grub par byed// rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma// pha rol yul ni rnam par 'joms// rje'u rigs kyis ni dam chen mo// blo dang ldan pas bzlog phyir bshad// gsad dang bsgral dang bstabs pa'i phyir// dmangs rigs kyis ni phag gdong bcang// las dang rigs rnams thams cad dang// 'jigs byed mas ni

dngos grub ster// re ba med pas bdag nyid mas// grub pa'i khyad par 'di shes pas// 'du ba med pas bdag bsams te// rtag tu 'di dag spyad cing bcang// bdag gi dngos grub skye ba yi// sngags pas de nas bshad par bya// o~M na ba ba to// ba du ba ya sma sha na/ ba si ni i tang ka pA la/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ thal ba dang/ me tog dang/ chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad snod la btab ste blang bar bya// ri mo rdo rje 'khor lo dang// mchod rten dang ni rin po che// pad+ma dang ni ljon shing dang// dbus na bu ga gnyis yod pa// mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis// gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod gnas so// srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis dang// srubs gsum pa dang srubs bzhi pa// lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad// dgu dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// bcu drug pa dang nyi shu drug/ 'di dag rab tu spang bar bya// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa snod brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas dbang phyug chen po bsgral ba'i thabs 'di bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// ma hA ru dra'i rgyud dur khrod ma hA ru dra brgyud pa'i dbang du bsdu ba'i mchog/ phyi rol phyogs gar bde ba'i sar zhing chen stan gar 'os pa gcig tu maN+Dal byugs te/ gnas chen po dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i cha lugs ci ltar nyal tshigs bcad las byung ba bzhin tshon gyis bris/ yang na thal ris dang/ yid kyis bkod kyang rung/ sta na'i dkyil 'khor bsham/ de'i dbus su hom khung gru gsum pa zhig bkod/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bca' ste/ mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sngags la/ a sa ma hA tsa la d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba Ad+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M zhes cung zad bsgoms pa'i rjes la// mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po dang// chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa yi// gnyis med phyag rgya rol pa yis// dus la bab bo sa ma ya zhes brjod nas/ rnal 'byor gzhan gyis 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mkhas pa gcig gis las 'di bgyi/ dbang gi gtam rgyud bshad/ rgyud kyi gtsug lag chen po dang bden pa'i tshig gis bsgrags nas// 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson// 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig/ thugs rje dad dang shes rab dang// thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad spyod par mdzad// 'gro ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog/ gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// bcom zhing gsang ba'i gnyen po ni// 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi khro

bo des// srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa dang// thod dbyug drag po mi mdzad pas// gshin rje bcom ste bsad nas kyang// ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du// bor nas sa gzhi dur khrod kyi// bdag po gdol pa drag po yis// ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// de yang cung zad bsnol ba'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon mkhrig ma la// khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod do// thal ba'i mdog la sku sgreng ba// de yi lus snying yan lag ni// ma mo chen mo rnams kyi gnas// dur khrod chen po 'di dag go/ de yi snying ni ma hA'i lto// dur khrod chen po bsil tshal na// ma mo chen mo gau ri ma// mkhas ma snying stobs che ba'i gnas// de yi mgo ni lho phyogs kyi// sing ga la yi gling phran na// ma mo chen mo tsau ri ma// mthong thos rngam pa'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'// lag pa g.yas ni shar lho mtshams// bal yul na ni puk+ka si// 'khor dang longs spyod sna tshogs ldan// lhag par zas kyi 'byor ba che// lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams// sa yi tshal na be ta li// phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas// de nas mthu dang dbang yang che// rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams// li yul na ni tsaN+Da li// shang ka na zhes grags pa de// de yang 'khor dang longs spyod ldan// rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams// skad ni skad sna mthun pas na// ma mo chen mo pra mo ha// bde skyid ldan pa'i sa la gnas// pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na// u rgyan yul na g+hasma ri// sbyor bas longs spyod 'jug pas na// dngos grub can yang de na mang// de nas sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bris te bsams nas dgongs pa ni// dur khrod bdag pos 'dus pa dang// dbang du sdud pa'i las brtsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs zhes brjod do// de nas 'geng la rdo rje khu tshur dku g.yas su gzhag cing/ mig gis phyogs bcur bltas te// 'dzam bu gling gi 'jig rten 'di// skye shi gnas ni dur khrod kyi// rang bzhin yin no rnam gzigs nas// sa gzhi dur khrod gnas su bstan// bdag gis yid ches par bya zhing// sta na'i dkyil 'khor bsams la gar bris pa'i sar bltas te/ de'i bdag po la sdigs pa'i phyir ldan pa g.yas byo zhing sdang mig drag tu bgrad// mig gi 'bras bu dril la/ sarba ba pa ka ra he ru ka/ byista na ma ha~M ka ru dra hU~M phaT/ rigs lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa khro ba'i ngang du gyur te/ bdag dang 'dra bar bsams la// de nas 'gying rngam pa las ral pa bsigs la/ lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng sor mo gyen du bgrad la ba ya ke rtsi ta dza la hU~M phaT ces brjod nas lag pa sta zur du bzhag cing lag pa g.yon pa rngam pa bzhin du skra gyen du bteg la/

pradz+nya ke shi tsi ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT ces brjod la rngam pa'i nga ro bgyi/ mche ba 'dar rkan sgra drag tu gtogs la rngam brjid chen po'i tshul dang ldan par bsam/ o~M pradz+nyA su pa ya na hU~M phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa bskum/ o~M badzra kro d+ha e sha ya hU~M// de nas slar go cha'i phyag rgya snying gar bcings la btang ste/ o~M badzra ka ba tsa zhes brjod nas go bgo bar bsams te/ gnas lngar bsrung zhing/ o~M na ma d+hu ba bi/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ sarba bud+ha mu dra sa~M ha ra na/ a b+hi shiny+tsa hU~M phaT ces brjod pas sku cir yang 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/ rkang lag bzhi'i tshogs bskum mgo mgrin 'khril cing bsgril la hU~M zhes tshig 'bru drag po g.yas g.yon du lta ba'i tshul drag po re re bgyi/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M zhes drag tu brjod do// rdo rje dril bu gsil te/ brkyang bskum bsgreng la 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la/ khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas kyang// de dag bdag gi lus la gzung// spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi// sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya// thar pa'i bla med dkyil 'khor 'dir// brod pa can rnams dar ba ltar// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// bde bar 'ongs pa legs pa 'ongs// rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir// bo d+hi tsit+ta'i gnas nyid du// khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las// dbyings su thim pas gnyis su med// kun gyi ngo bo mnyam nyid de// thams cad snying po byang chub las// ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig/ bdag nyid med pas mnyam pa'i sku// thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad// sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos// bdag dang bdag gis so sor phye// log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings// 'khor ba rgyud lnga yi kha brims/ mya ngan mi 'da' yun rings te// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye// gsung gis mtha' yas sems can sgrol// thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan// sku gsum 'gro ba'i tshul ston pas// dus la bab pa'i sems can dag/ las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// yang dag nyid la yang dag grol// yang dag bsgral nas bde chen thob// mi ldog sa la nges par phyin// phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong// rgyud drug gnas su mi skye phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// 'khrug pa'i bag chags bag la nyal// bde 'gro lam la sgrib pa rnams// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// mtshan nyid med par stong par

'gyur// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis phaT// gsang ba'i dbyings su hU~M gis bsdu// skur bskyed ye shes skur bsdus pas// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa ru// chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing gshegs// stong gsum ma lus gdon pa ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// skyes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal pa 'bar zhing snying rje'i mchog/ nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang// sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod// de nas 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la// ma tang gi gnas dang lung gi tshul du smos pa bzhin gsal bar bsgoms te/ de'i 'khor 'byung po mang po yang mngon du bkug par bsams te/ rkang pa gnyis bsnol ba'i drung du phyin nas byang shar mtshams su kha bltas te/ bdag nyid brkyang bskum gyi tshul du 'greng la/ mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rka lag bsnol ba'i sgo// yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis phye// de nas hU~M phaT bra be sha hU~M phaT/ rkang pas shag gis phye bar bsam// de nas lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa'i phyag rgya bya// g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo snying gar bsgreng ste/ o~M shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ zung mthar byed kyis gzung/ las mthar byed gang gis mnan nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te/ brkyang bskum du bsgreng la a a zhes brjod la/ lcags kyus snying gar sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas nas rgyab tu bskor te/ lus kyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu rkang pa gshibs te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te/ hU~M zhes sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas rgyab kyis bskor bas 'bod par bya/ e h+ye hi ma ha ka ru sha dra~M karma badzra hU~M phaT/ ma ha de ba ma ta ru dra dza/ zhes rdo rje gar gyi gom pa 'dor zhing lte ba'i phyogs su song la/ shin tu dmar po bzhi lte ba'i phyogs bzhir dgod do// yi ge hU~M mchog tu brjod cing/ g.yas g.yon du lan gcig tu gar gyis bskor bar bya'o// de nas snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// d+ho tse phya d+ho tse phya/ ma nu d+ha ra~M/ a ma d+ha ra~M/ shrI ma hA ka pA la/ d+ho tsa phya~M/ pad+ma rak+ta d+ha ra~M/ badzra d+ha ra~M/ badzra ma hA ma~M ba d+ha ra~M/ zhes brjod do// de nas gar gyi tshul du snying ga phyogs su song la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas ci ltar bde ba gtor ma sbyin par mkhyen pa ni shes rab mkha' dbyings dang/ ma tang gi lus su dbyer med par gzhal yas khang 'bar ba'i nang du khro bo he ru ka phyi'i phra men la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bkod de/ spyan drang ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyings nas yi ge dza las lcags kyus gsal bar phyogs bcur 'phros

te/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dgug cing spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gsal ba las 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ngo// mi gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po chos nyid kyis bsgral ba dang/ sku gsung thugs che ba'i yon tan gyis bsgral ba dang/ bdag nyid chen po lhun gyis grub pas bsgral lo// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo'i don bdud 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ste// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro zhing gdug par gyur// shin tu khro drag gtum pa yang// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yis// khro bas de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal// hU~M bzhis he ru ka bsgom/ has he ru ka la sogs pa bsgom/ hes sing ha la sogs pa bsgom/ phaT kyis sgo ba la sogs pa bsgom/ hU~M ha he phaT kyis ting nge 'dzin bzlas/ sngags 'dis spyan drang ngo/ sarba duSh+taM na sa ma ya mud tra pra b+han tsakra hU~M phaT/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ ru lu ru lu/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ e h+ye hi tri sha ho sa ma ya ho/ e h+ye hi a ra li d+hing ng+hing/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka// chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs// o~M shrI he ru ma hA badzra/ sarba duSh+ta~M sa ma ya mu drA pra be sha ya shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+ta?M sa ma ya mu tra pra b+han tsakra hU~M phaT/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang// 'khor bcas rab 'bar gshegs su gsol// o~M shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+taM kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra hU~M phaT/ sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing// ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang// mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog gi rnams// bdag cag stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// o~M shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+taM sa ma ya mu tra a ma ba sta ma b+ha ka hU~M phaT/

o~M gu+u h+ya tri sha sa ma ya/ gu+u h+ya tri sha sa ma ya ho/ o~M badzra gu+u h+ya tri sha sa ma ya hU~M/ dam tshig sa la bzhengs pa yi// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam// grub pa mchog dag ma stsal na// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba'o// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+taM sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han tsakra b+hak+Sha ya bAk+Sha ya bi to ga sa ya bi to ga sa ya/ he b+ha ga ban/ bud+d+ha k+She tra~M pra ti stam b+ha ka hU~M phaT/ sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas bsdus pa'o// o~M shrI badzra ka ra mu ka sha ra yA ya na maH/ o~M badzra ra ga sa ma yA ya na maH/ o~M shrI badzra kha T+wAM ga pra ma yA ya na maH/ o~M shrI gan d+he dza yA ya na maH/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ ta thA b+han d+ha na~M ka ro ya mi ma hA yo gi ni/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing// byams dang snying rje sgra zun mi mnga' yang// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing// 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma sring byams pa'i tshul gyis 'grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ya hA i dan pu ya ti ba lin ta/ pra ti dza ho/ shrI ban kha kha khA hi khA hi dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra a be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ hU~M khA hi/ he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus gshegs shing bsnams su gsol// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma ha badzra sarba duSh+taM sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han tsakra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi da yan bi ba hU~M phaT/ nga ni za byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+taM na sa ma ya/ ma hA maM sa ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha le le hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa'o// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba'i// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi// thugs dam dbyings nyid bskul ba'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di// bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags

na// bzhes te kun du dgyes mdzod la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// o~M sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho// dpal ldan shrI he ru ka dang// yum chen kro d+hi shwa ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun du dges mdzod la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// o~M sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho// dpal chen badzra he ru dang// badzra kro d+hI shwa ri la// dam tshig gi ni mchod pa 'bul// dpal chen rat+na he ru dang// rat+na kro d+hI shwa ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// dpal chen pad+ma he ru dang// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// dpal chen karma he ru dang// karma kro d+hI shA ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// o~M sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho// dpal chen mi pham rdo rje dang// ma tshogs dbang phyug 'khor gyi rkyen// gau ri la sogs brgyad rnams dang// sing ha la sogs brgyad rnams la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang// sring mo chen mo bzhi rnams dang// mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas thams cad la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun du dgyes mdzod la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// o~M sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha ho// shrI ban khe hi// dpal chen sems dpa' 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang/ dpal chen po shrI he ru ka/ badzra DAk+ki nI 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo mched lcam dral 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol lo// deng gnas mchog dam pa 'dir 'phags pa thams cad mchod pa dang/ rdo rje mched lcam dral phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i thugs dam bskang ba dang/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa zhig yon du 'bul zhing mchis na/ thugs rjes bzung zhing bsgral du gsol lo// rgyu mchog 'di thugs rjes bzung nas ma bsgral na/ 'di la spyod pa zhig mchis te/ rnal 'byor theg pa'i gzhung las kyang tshul bzhin du ma bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad ma khyad du bsad pa dang/ rdo rje slob dpon dang/ mched dang lcam dral la ngan sems dang dpya sems bskyed pa dang// mched la 'khus pa dang/ dam las 'das pa dang/ spa lo dang sgyu gsog/ brdzun dang kha gsag/ phyi tshul dang rgyab nyan bgyis nas rdo rje slob dpon snying nas smod cing bla ma la dbang zos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul sun phyung ste/ sbyor sgrol sgo bkag pa dang/ dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag ste/ gdung sems kyi rgyun bcad pas phrag dog dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tshob pa'i bar chad kyis

da ltar ngan song gi gnas na 'khyams shing rtog pa'i dra bas ni bcings// 'khor ba'i rnyes ni zin nas dmyal khams gyi gting brgyud par nges te/ zhing bcu dang ldan pa 'di dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsgral bas/ 'di'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lnga phung gi yan lag ni kun tu bzang po mchod pa'i sprin phung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dgyes pa'i ngang du thim par smon to// smon lam brjod te bsgral bar bya'o// spyi gtsug tu o~M/ lag pa g.yas par swA/ g.yon pa la hA/ snying gar hU~M/ lus la o~M/ oM ma hA su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ o~M badzra kro d+ha shrI he ru ka a a hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha ni la dan+Da da ha da ha hU~M phaT// o~M badzra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la ba~M d+ha ba~M d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha a pa ra tsit+ta tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya b+hin da b+hin da hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ ma ma ma ma/ bo bo bo bo/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// gzugs snang rtog pa rnam par bsgribs// bag chags ma lus sbyong ba'i phyir// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// nga ni za byed chen po ste// sems can thams cad gsad par bya// ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya// rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus nas kyang// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// 'khor ba'i dra bas chags pa yi// dmar chen dag gi rgya mtsho la// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro tshogs dang rol// ma rungs gdug pas ma chags shing// dam tshig la sdang dgra chen rnams// thugs rje byams sems ldan pa yis// ngo mthon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya// pra be sha ya phaT/ tsi ta thu~M/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ badzra DA ki ni/ a yang/ s+pha ra na phaT/ badzra yu ti dza/ drag po las kyis bsgral ba'i rnams// 'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo yang gcad// rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus brngubs nas// 'og min gnas mchog bla med 'dir// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang/ khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// skad cig yud la brlag mdzad de// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun//

yud tsam gyis ni dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// dpal ldan gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad de// zhi bar gyur pas dbyings la rol// bdag cag mched lcam dral rnams kyis rdo rje slob dpon dbang zos pa dang/ phrag dog gi dbang gis mched lcam dral ngan sems dang dbye sems bgyis pa dang/ gnyid dbang gis le lor gyur pa dang/ sems g.yengs pas sngags dang phyag rgya zur chag pa dang/ dam tshig dang du len rngo ma thogs pas smad pa'i dam tshig nyams so 'tshal thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa 'di phrin las rnam bzhis bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par smon to// bdag cag mched lcam dral 'di tshogs pa rnams kyis yid la rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ shrI he ru ka bya shan/ badzra be ra ba na shan/ badzra ka ra dza li ta/ o~M badzra kro d+ha ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ u ra ta ke sha pra la ban/ sha ta sha pra dra/ sha ma pa ra na shra ma la ha ha ha hU~M/ ka ra ba~M/ badzra ka ra ba~M/ badzra ka ra na ta/ tri shU la a gu dza/ pa ra sha ra na su sho ma ma/ pra yo ma hA tsaN+Da/ su re ba ru na/ ku be ra na/ ni ra pa pri tsi ti ma hA ku ru nan/ shrI he ru ka ta na ti/ la la gan du sa ta ma hang ya kur ka te/ ku sha la dzi mo ha/ ba ra mo/ gan ta gan ta/ kar ta ka/ ga bo dza la ni/ ba bur ti ba ta/ ko sha bi sha la/ i san pad+ma tsin+d+re na ka/ mang gu na da ro// tsi ri ka ta/ tsi ta sti/ dza bi s+t+ra/ b+han d+ha he ru ka/ badzra ma rang sa na sa rang/ ba mun ka na/ tig sh+na/ tra~M stang ga ya/ dza ya ba ke dong/ bi ka ra be ra/ ma ra ma hA/ ri tsa yang sang sa ra/ ma hA ru na/ dzA la pa ni/ ho ho ha/ ro na ro hU~M hU~M/ re na ro de na/ he he ra na ro/ bzhi la bstod/ tha med tang ba ting/ ba pa ti ka ba ra many+dzu/ gri na dza la pa ra ho/ he he ro na ro/ o~M phur bu sra sti sra ho/ o~M phur bu sha sha~M ka/ phur bu ba ta ba ti ho/ phur bu ba sA sa ra hU~M/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ o~M e sha hU~M be she hU~M sa ma ya bak+Sha hU~M/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ kha ra~M pra ti dza ho/ mchod pa 'bul/ bshags pa bya/ smon lam gdab/ phyogs bcu mthas klas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang/ dpal chen po shrI he ru ka badzra DA ki nI tshogs kyi dam tshig gis sa la gzhes pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor dang/ phyi'i grub pa la sogs te// phra men gyi 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa rdo rje theg pa bsrung bar zhal

'ches pa'i 'phags pa thams cad dang/ rig 'dzin stsal 'chang du gyur pa'i mi la sogs te/ sprul pa sna tshogs su sku bzhengs nas slob dpon gyi sa la bzhengs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa la// bdag cag mched lcam dral 'dir tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas 'bul bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ye shes bla ma'i sa non/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs par gyur nas so so'i thugs dam skongs par smon to// rnal 'byor snga rabs sku tshe 'das pa rnams kyang sgrib pa rnam gnyis ni byang tshogs gnyis ni rdzogs// bdag cag gi stong grogs su gyur cig/ bdag gis snga slad dam rdzas bsgral ba dang/ sems can gyi srog bkum mo 'tshal thams cad kyang ye shes ngang gis bsgral zhing rnal 'byor gyi skal ba can du gyur cig/ bdag cag rnams kyi tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang/ rgyud gcig cing yi dam gcig pa'i thugs dam la mnyes par phog pa dang/ bdag gi snying rje chung ba'i rkyen gyis 'phags pa thugs dam bskul ba'i rtsal 'phang dmas pa dang/ gnang ba'i dbang las pham par gyur pa dang/ gti mug ma tshor ba'i rkyen gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen mi bzod de/ lus ngag yid gsum gyis sems dkrugs nas ma yin pa'i chos smra ba dang/ spyod lam mi mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis dam tshig gi lha dang/ slob dpon dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ rdo rje mched lcam dral thugs dam gyi lha yal bar bzhag nas dngos grub thams cad 'phang bar gyur pa dang/ mkhyen gsal gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i rkyen gyis mchod pa'i yo byad rgyun mi gcig pa dang/ mchod pa ma yin pa'i grogs po la brten nas rgyun mi gcig pa dang/ bsod nams 'dres pas rtsal tshad mar gyur te/ le lo dang btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas thugs rje'i gnas su ma gyur te/ ye shes lha dang srung ma rnams 'phang bar gyur pa dang/ rgyang 'phen gyi chos kyi gdungs nas bde ba'i yo byad dang bral te/ nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shas dang/ mchod sbyin mi chud pa'i sgrib pa dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las the tshom gcod pa'i bsam pa ma yin pa byung ba dang/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams rjes su dran zhing gnong ba'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags so// bshags bya 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis tshor ba dang ma tshor ba dang bag chags byang bar smon to// gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang

bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig/ lha dang slob dpon gyi dbang dang sngon ci ltar dkyil 'khor gnang ba dang/ mi skyol zhing dngos grub rnam bzhi yang thob par gyur cig/ skyon brjod pa thams cad dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams yon tan tshad ma bzhin thob par gyur cig/ de nas tshogs kyi gtor ma gtang/ o~M shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra DA ki nI nA~M/ badzra gau ri ha/ badzra tsau ri ha/ badzra pra mo ha/ badzra pe ta li/ badzra puk+ka si// badzra g+hasma ri/ badzra tsaN+Da li/ badzra sma sha ni/ badzra he ru ka sa ma ya yo gi shwa ri/ sarba DA ki nan/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dbyug pa'i brda yis mtshon nas kyang// ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// thal mo brda yis mtshon nas kyang// ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// glu yi brda yis mtshon nas kyang// ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yis// 'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na// sku ni dud kha chen po la// zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste// gnag dang mthing ga dmar ba'i dbu// g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni// rdo rjes bkug cing zhal du gsol// khyung gi khra chen 'bar ba'o// g.yon pa gsum na thogs pa ni// sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang// thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba dang// sti ra phra mo gsus pa nas// glo snying nang khrol 'byin cing za// glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sham thabs can// thod rlon phreng bas rgyan du byas// ma lus pa dag gsan du gsol// rgyu las byung bas de bzhin gshegs// ston ni ma nor don mdzad pa// mngag pa'i gnas su yud tsam gyis// thams cad kho nar dbang mdzad mdzod// srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal// thal ba bzhin du rab tu rlogs// rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin gshegs// mA ra na ta tha// 'byung po'i sha ni zan bas zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste// thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod// dpal chen he ru ka/ mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po// shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par sprul// lhing nag gcer bu ral pa can// mi lpags rlon pa gos su gyon// thal ba'i mtshan mas byugs pa ste// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan/ phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas// lag na tri shUl thod pa thogs// dug gsum

bshigs par dam bcas pa'i// rdo rje me phung 'khrug pa'i tshul// re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// theg chen rnal 'byor spyod pa la// gnod pa'i dgra bgegs gtan nas phyung// thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas kyang// rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang// sems nyid theg pa chen po yi// rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa dag bsnams su gsol// rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// de na te the hU~M// rnam pa sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs khro bo rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hU~M e sha hU~M be sha hU~M// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da d+ha badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ e h+ye hi sa ma ya/ A na ya badzra shan ting/ badzra kro d+ha na/ badzra tsa kro badzra gan/ badzra mu sting/ badzra ti ba ti/ badzra gan ti/ badzra gan da/ badzra a kring/ badzra rak+Sha/ badzra dang Sh+tA~M/ badzra shan ting/ badzra e ka ra tsa ma/ badzra ma no ha ra ma/ badzra dun ting/ badzra nI lam/ badzra na lan/ badzra gri ta/ badzra mu kring/ badzra ki lam/ badzra us sma/ badzra ma ka rad lba/ badzra bid+ya tsa ra tsa ni ka/ kha na kham/ tu ta kha/ sarba a/ sha sa kha/ sarba ma A kar+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ sarba DA ki ni nan/ e a ra li ma nu sma ra ya phaT/ mi yi srin mo tshangs ma dang/ khro bo dang ni 'jug sred mo// gzhon nu ma dang dbang po dang// rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtsi mo// zhi ba ma dang be con mo// zin mo dang ni za ba mo// rdo rje dga' ba mo dang ni// shin tu khrag 'thung mo// gcig pu spyod dang yid 'phrog mo// grub mo dang ni rlung mo dang// rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo// me mo phag mo rgan byad mo// sna chen mo dang chu lha

mo// rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang// rdo rje ra ste dmar ser mo// rdo rje sngo nag bum rna mo// rdo rje dmar ser dril 'khrol ma// ma mo chen mo khyed rnams kyis// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// ye shes thob par bya ba dang// bsgrub pa rnams kyi las bya zhes// rdo rje byin nas ming btags te// dam bcas bzhin du he ru ka/ da ltar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams// mngon par ston la grub pa 'phrul// ci snyed grub mchod ma phul zhing// khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na// rab tu sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dug la las rnams kun gyis shig/ o~M pad+ma ba da mu mu ka/ A kar+Sha ya/ A kar+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ badzra DA ki nI hr-i da yan/ o~M o~M hU~M/ gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bsgyur la kha b+han d+ha dang ras chen gyis bcad la rta mgrin dbang gi phyag rgya bcas la mchod do// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las/ khro bo bskyed rdzogs las kyi bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// zhi ba'i mchog gtan phreng ba'i phrin las rab bsdus pa/ tshad med snying rje skyed pa dang// byang chub sems dpa' dag la ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i las mchog ste// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni// ye shes gtso mo mchog nyid de// gsum pa las ni 'das pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// de ni gzugs dang byin rlabs dang// bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang// dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dag/ phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste// btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// 'das na lha yang brlags pa'i phyir// rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'// gzugs ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyings la ste// lcags dang lcags lnga seng ldeng la sogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad dam bcu gnyis par byas pa mgo mjug ma nor bar shing rtsa ba phyogs su mgo byas la/ sor brgyad la sor gcig la rgya mdud/ rked par sor gcig la rgya mdud stod zur brgyad/ smad zur gsum du byas la/ ri rab ltar brjid pa 'dug pa ni gzugs so// byin rlabs ni thog ma nyid sku gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu rgya mdud gzhal med khang du dmigs te/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar/ hU~M bsgril ma lnga bzhag ste/ dbus su

he ru ka/ shar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ lhor gshin rje gshed/ nub tu rta mgrin/ byang du stobs po che 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul te phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor ba phul te/ dam tshig rjes su bkug nas gnyis su med pa'i rgyan rdzogs par mdzad pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis brlab bo// de nas sras phur bu'i khro bo bskyed pa ni/ o~M badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya ma na phaT/ ces brjod pas lte ba yan chad mthing nag la dbu skra kham pa zur gsum pa'i thabs su bsgreng la/ brang gis 'gro chen po dang/ thod rlon gyis bcings shing bshams la/ spyan gsum sdang mig tu bgrad de/ phyag g.yon pa'i phur bu la gzigs/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ rab tu rngam pa/ dur khrod kyi me phung gi nang du lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa/ e'i nang du sum cha tsam nub pa la phyag bzhi la g.yas kyi gong ma sta re kha yar bstan te brdeg par bya ste/ g.yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stobs su 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang pos rdo rje kha T+wAM ga 'khrol zhing bdud kyi khams 'jigs pa/ 'og ma phur bu zur gsum 'debs pa'i stabs su gzas shing/ ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa/ stobs dang mthu la sogs pa khro bo thams cad 'dus pas kyang che ba gcig phyung ste// rtag pa chen po bzhugs par bstan pa ni sprul pa'i skur byin gyis brlab bo// de la rigs lngar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ 'bru lngas gnas lnga byin gyis brlab bo// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi gtsug tu o~M/ rked par hri/ rtse mor phaT bsam mo// de'i 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du phaT gsum/ ngos gsum du hU~M gzhag go/ de nas sku bltas pa dang/ rigs so so'i khro bo thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ khro bo dkyil 'khor de dag nyid phyogs bcur 'phros pa slar 'dus nas/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT kyi sgra 'byin cing/ de'i sku la bstims te/ dbang dang byin rlabs thams cad brlan par bya'o// de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang/ sngon thugs dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa lags pas des gros mdzad cing bskul ba la bzhugs pa dang/ bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid chen po yin pas phur pa yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du hU~M/ g.yon pa'i steng du a

las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du ta bsam mo// gung mo la o~M/ mthe bo la hU~M/ mdzub mo la tra~M/ srin lag la hri/ mthe'u chung la ha/ 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du gzhag ste/ su ra da sta~M zhes brjod pas thal mo mnyam par sbyar la// o~M badzra a dza li hU~M/ zhes brjod pas sor mo cung zad bsnol lo// o~M badzra ban d+ha hU~M zhes brjod pas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la bsdam mo/ sa ma ya sta~M~M zhes brjod pas phur pa blangs te chang pa'i nang du bcug la/ lag pa chang pa phye la mthe bo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang gnyis kyi bar du yang gzhug/ mthe bos cung zad bsgul zhing drud do// o~M badzra A be sha ya/ a a zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku yungs 'bru tsam par mtshams med par phur pa la bsdu zhing bstim mo// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar bya ste// sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la gung mo gshibs te/ bsgreng ba'i bar du phur bu bcug la/ o~M badzra sa twa ra dza hU~M phaT zhes brjod pas bzlas so// de nas sor mo bug bug byas te/ lag pas phur pa bzung la/ o~M hU~M hriH phur bu ba phaT zhes brjod pas de nas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa'i chang par bcug nas/ o~M ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ ha na ha na/ ti ba ta tsakra hU~M phaT ces brjod nas dril te/ bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur ba'i sku la bstims pas stong gsum gang bar me stag 'phro zhing dmigs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i byin dang/ dbang dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la e'i gdan la bzhugs par gsol nas yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brab cing gu gul sbyar bas bdugs la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad mchod par bya'o// de nas yid la brnag pa'i phrin las bcol te de'i byin brlabs so// bzlas brjod ni bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs la snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hU~M mthing nag pa gcig bsam la/ o~M badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT ces brjod pas phur bu'i khro bo'i ci 'dra ba zhig de las byung ste phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas phur bu la bstim mo// 'di 'bum mam/ bdun 'bum mam/ sa ya bye ba snyed bya ste bsnyen pa gtong bar 'dod na phur bu nyid snying ga la bsdu ste/ 'di ni bzlas brjod do// phrin

las ni thog ma nyid brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas bskrad pa dang mtshams gcad pa la sogs pa byas nas skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sdang mig dang/ mtshon cha'i char dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskrad nas phur pa bcu khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te phyogs bcur btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams gcad do// rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par bya ste/ de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas nas de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas byung ba dang/ bsnyen pa tshang nas gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum la rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang/ ske tshe dang/ lan tshwa dang zhing chen gyi rak+ta dang/ srub ma'i lo ma'i lo ma dang/ khre dang ci tse dang/ sum ma dang/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang/ bong bu'i bdud rtsi las sbrus te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na til nag po las gzhi blangs te gzugs byas kyang rung/ ri mo bris la mdog smug nag tu bgyis te shul ba la sogs pa la zhing chen gyi rak+tas hU~M che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces bris te/ snying gar glan te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rkyal du bzhag ste/ mgo bo lho phyogs su bstan te/ gdon de nyid dgug pa ni mngag gzhug gam/ khro bo sum b+ha ni sbyor ba yang rung ste/ gsang ba'i thugs ka'am snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po zhig bzhag la dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH badzra aM ku sha che ge mo zhig hU~M zhes brjod nas khro bo lcags kyu can grangs med pa rgyud ma sha stag byung bas bgegs kyi snying ga nas bzung ste/ der 'ongs pa dang/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH che ge mo mA ra ya pra be sha phaT ran tsam du brjod la/ gzugs sam ri mo la phab la lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings pa dang/ bsdams pa dang/ de'i sems ma 'khrugs par dag par byas nas e'i nang du rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam/ de nas phur pa blangs te/ las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pas drag tu cung zad bskul lo// thal mo sbyar phur bu thabs kyis gsor la rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du dril na ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang/ gdan gyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam ma reg
