par gzas la khro bo'i skye'am rked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ rdo rje tho ba'i sta re lag pas rdeg cing rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying gar btab dpral bar gcig gdab/ dpung mgo gnyis dang brla'i nang rol gnyis su yang

gdab/ lte ba khung du yang gdab/ sder mo'i sngags/ na maH sa man ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzra nan/ o~M g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+tan/ mA ra ya phaT/ kI li kI lA ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra kI li kI lA ya badzra d+ha rod/ Adz+nya pa ya ti kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT drag tu brjod do// phur pa de btab zin nas de'i steng du las kyi lha phyag rgya dang sngags kyis mnan te lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol ba mthe bo dang mthe'u chung rtse sbyar brkyang nas gzhan ni drag por rgyab tu bskyed de de'i sngags/ oM badzra karma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te g.yas phyogs su bskor te kI la ya'i mgo la lan gsum bdug go/ de nas phur pa slar mi 'byung ba dang/ sus kyang mi phyin pa dang/ lhag par yang zad cing thal phyin par bsam mo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te/ sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la bcangs nas gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar rtse mo rnon por bsgreng la phur pa'i klad du gnon/ phur pa'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig par bsgo zhing sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas so// o~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces bya'o// 'di ni sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam sor mo gnyis nang du bsnol te/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung ngo sbyar la bsgreng/ khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bskyed de phur pa'i steng du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do// o~M badzra kro d+ha ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa pa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da rba na rba na phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// stobs po che'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gi dbang du gyur nas ci bsgo ba thams cad bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro// yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg/ gur gum sbyar mas bdugs la gzhag go/ de nas lag pa gnyis sbyar la/ mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud/ mdzub mo gnyis kha gram la g.yas g.yon du sgreng/ yid tsam dgu bar bya lhag ma rnams nang du bcang la mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi snying gar mnan te lan bdun bzlas// o~M badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT ces brjod de/ de nas rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud du sbrel la mthe bong g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag/ mdzub mo gnyis ngo sbyar te bsgreng nas sdang mig tu bgrad la rdeg cing

sngags 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+haM sa ya dza Ti lam bo d+ha ra uts+tshus ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT ces brjod do// de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal po brdeg cing las 'di shin tu brtan zhing grub par bcol lo// rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis gnan par bya'o// khro bo rnams kyi spyi bo nas 'dus pa'i steng du hU~M mthing nag la rdo rje lcags kyu'i rgya gram me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge gsum gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba zhig tu gnas pa las/ o~M badzra badzra me rta hU~M sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod pa las gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye ba gru bzhi pa gcig tu gyur la de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu dbu gsum phyag drug la// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba phyar te bsnams/ g.yon dang po rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar bstan/ 'khor dpag tu med pa'i pho brang gtams pa khro bo rnams kyis shin tu gzir cing mi g.yo ba dang/ las ma grub na bskal pa mthar thug na yang gnas par bsam/ phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te gzhag go// yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam/ gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams te dam tshig can gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad la bsngo zhing dbul lo// drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig gnod byed de nyid bkug ste zar gzhug go// phrin las 'di'i dus su phra men ma dang/ gnon sbyin mo dang/ srin mo rnams kyang spyan drangs/ gtor ma dbul lo// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn bya da yak+Sha dza/ b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hU~M zhes lan gsum brjod de spyan drang/ pra tIts+tsha ho zhes brjod la gtong/ o~M sa ma ya ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hU~M swA hA zhes lan gsum brjod la a mr-i ta phul la las bcol lo// 'di'i phrin las so// dus ni tshes bcu bdun nam mar gyi ngo la nyin mtshan gyi gung du gza' dang sbyar ba dang/ bsnyen pa tshang ba dang/ rtags byung ba la sogs te 'di ni dus so// gnas ni shing rkang gcig pa dang gnod par nges pa ste/ 'di ni gnas so// bdag nyid byang chub sems la gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang/ las la mkhas pa dang/ lha nye bar gyur pa dang/ mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang/ drag cing ltos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ phrag dog med pa dang/ gzhan la re ba med pa dang/ dam tshig ma nyams pa'o// 'di ni bdag nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje

las 'di phyung ngo// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang/ mnan bzlog drug tu bka' stsal to// zhi ba'i zhi ba chen po ni dkyil 'khor 'dom gang thab khung zlum po chag gang thab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mtho gang zlum po phar sor gcig/ 'jim pa'am bong ba la 'bur du brkos te gzhag/ thab kyi kha khyer rdo rje ra bas bskor/ de'i phyi rim zlum po la pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ bkra shis kyi lha mo dang/ mchod pa'i lha mo dgod/ bsreg pa'i rdzas shu gu shug shags/ mar dkar/ kha ra/ sbrang rtsi/ 'bras can/ 'bras thug/ 'bras yos/ til zho/ nas thug/ so ba/ gro so ba/ til so ba/ sran ma sha/ yungs kar/ 'bras kyi lag pan/ gtor ma dkar po 'bras las bgyi/ yo byad thams cad dkar po/ tshon dkar pos bri/ chas gos gsum dkar po/ lha'i sku mdog kyang dkar po/ grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi/ lha ni snga ma'i steng du gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bsnan/ pho nya yang 'byung ngo// yo byad thams cad kyang ser po/ dgang gzar ser po/ phrugs su bcas pa grangs bzhin du dbul lo// dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla gam phyed par bcas pa'i tshul du bya/ las kyi lha pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dgod/ bsreg rdzas dmar po/ gtor ma dmar po/ chas gos dmar po/ lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul/ drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi dbus su gru gsum zabs su khru phyed/ gru gsum du mda' gzhu/ mtha' thod pa gsar snying gis bskor/ dpal chen po dang khro bcu dgod/ yo byad thams cad nag po/ bsreg rdzas nag po/ dkyil 'khor yang nag po/ gtor ma yang nag po/ las kyi khro bo bcu dang/ phra men ma chas gos nag po/ sbyin sreg lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul lo// o~M shan ting gan ting ti kar pra sha ma ni rA tsa ta/ a ba ba swa ba ba/ a mu ka si/ swa sti shi ba~M/ ku ru swA hA/ zhi ba'o// pa shang ku ru pra sha ma na ye ho/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa las khro bo mnan bzlog gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ thig bzhi gdab pas re'u cha dgu/ dbus su zla ba phyed par bcas pa'i tshul du bya/ de'i phyi rim phra men ma bcu drug/ sgo ba bzhi/ kham phor ri mor bris pa dgu/

snang ba'i 'od bcas pa dgram/ tshil chen dang ni tsit+ta'i tog/ ras chen 'phan gdugs la sogs pa/ dkyil 'khor rgyun tu bri bar bya/ b+han d+ha'i gnam yol/ zhing gi rgyal mtshan/ thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod/ rak+ta dri chen gyi maN+Dal bya/ yo byad thams cad tshang bar bsogs la 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang bza'o// dam ma 'dres shing mi gcig pa spyod lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang tshogs rnams phyi rol tu byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa po nyid ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi gtang/ spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyig bsgrub pa dang/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir tshul mkhas pa dang/ spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o// de la dang por sgrub pa la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams gcad do// ting nge 'dzin dang lta ba dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ rgyal mtshan dang rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gcad par bya'o// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs// rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar bya// lha'i grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o// snying po ni/ o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M zhes drang ngo// de nas bsnyen bsgrub lags pa dang/ yo byad rnams phyi rol du mi 'byung/ gnas su mi bgyer lha dang bdag mchod la sogs pa'i rjes la lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches kha bcad la sba bar bya'o// don de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o// de ltar ma byas na dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i sgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su gau ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can/ lho ru g.yag gi mgo can/ nub tu seng ge'i mgo can// byang du gzig gi mgo can/ shar lho pha bang gi mgo can/ lho nub tu pu shud kyi mgo can/ nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can/ byang shar du ske ga'i mgo can/ sgo ba bzhi dgod// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsau ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du smigs bu'i mgo can/ lhor bya rgod kyi mgo can/ nub tu sha ba'i mgo can// byang du khu byug gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir pha wang gi mgo can/ khra mgo can dang/ byan lag gi mgo can dang/ pho rog gi mgo

can dang rnams so// sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pra mo ha/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la shar du 'ug pa'i mgo can dang/ lhor spyang ki'i mgo can dang/ nub tu sbrul gyi mgo can dang/ byang du gzig gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir sre mo'i mgo can/ dred mgo can dang/ sdig pa'i mgo can dang/ wa'i mgo can rnams so// sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su be ta li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug la ye shes kyi khro mo bcu drug dgod do// mtshams bzhir ye shes kyi khro mo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su puk+ka si/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rta'i mgo can/ lhor nam mkha' lding gi mgo can/ nub tu khyi'i mgo can/ byang du spang ti'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir yang sbrul bzhi dgod do// de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su g+hasma ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/ lhor rin chen dbyings phyug ma/ nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyug ma/ byang du las kyi dbyings phyug ma/ nub tu khyi'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir phag gi mgo can ma/ byi la'i mgo can/ chu srin gyi mgo can/ ra'i mgo can rnams so// sgo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su sma sha ni/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad la shar du sti ri'i gnas nyul ma/ lhor rdo rje phung nyul ma/ nub tu mchod pa'i tshogs nyul ma/ byang du de bya'i sbyor nyul ma/ shar lhor dam tshig rjes gcod ma/ lho nub tu phyi nang gi mtshams nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas phyug ma'i lhag nyul ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje sgrol nyul ma/ bsnyen pa'i mtshams nyul ma/ dgongs pa'i don nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas nyul ma dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsaN+Da li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje sder mo/ lhor rdo rje gtum mo/ nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje sgrol ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje tib tib dang/ rdo rje teg teg dang/ rdo rje 'dzin ma dang/ rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su sing ha mu kha pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ chu srin gyi lus la seng ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su bya g+h+r-i mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ kang ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su sri la mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la seng ge'i lus la wa'i mgo

can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su shwa na mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la khyi'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskaur/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su kr-i d+ha mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang ka'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyi bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ spyang ka'i lus la kang ka'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ 'ug pa'i lus la pho rog gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las phra men ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// sku dang gsung dang thugs las sprul pa'i he ru ka/ chos dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs// phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// ye shes khro rgyal sprul pa mang po 'phro// phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don mang por mdzad// las byed mkha' 'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khril// ye shes khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol// phra men za byed mche gshog 'bar ba'i tshogs// dbang phyug 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can// rdo rje mchu can sder chen gshog pa can// phra men za byed chen mo dngos grub bdag la stsol// rdo rje yang sprul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar// mtshon thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad// rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las byung// phra men yang sprul chen po dngos grub stsol// smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// sems can rnams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// ye shes chos dbyings skar tshogs zla nya'i zhal// las mdzad ye shes nan tan don la bzhugs// rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// sgo ba yab yum dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum// las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma// phyag brnyan sprul pa

sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// rdo rje gshog pa thogs pa'i yid 'phrog ma// rdo rje sder mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'phro// rdo rje las byed ma mo brgya yang 'gyed// dbang phyug pho nya'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni// thugs rje can gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal// bla med byang chub bsgrub par dam bcas pa// bdag cag las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/ sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha// de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma// rtse gcig bsnyen kyang ye shes lha dang phra men khyod bsnyen bsnyen// bsnyen pa'i dus na rgyang ma ring// bsgrub pa'i dus na mthu ma chung// yang bsnyen ni yang yang bsnyen na// dpal chen phra men khyed ltar ma lags kyi// lang ka tshogs kyi srin mo yang// pha bas byams shing khu bas gdung// yang bsgrub pa ni yang bsgrubs na// lang ka'i tshogs kyi srin mo yang// ma bas byams shing sring bas gdung// gdungs pa'i mchi ma'i tshul du dku// ye shes lha yi thugs kyis bzod lags sam// dngos grub skal dang ldan par mi dmigs kyang// sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i dngos grub 'khor rnams la stsal to// 'khor rnams kyis kyang rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa por dngos grub stsal to// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dbyig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i dam pa'i don gyi gsang ba zab mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung nas sprul pa lcam dral 'di mgo mjug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis/ kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis/ mdor bsdus na don dam pa lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o// rgyud 'di'i mgo mjug gi don dpal kun tu bzang por 'dus so// kun tu bzang po sku mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang/ gsung mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang/ thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang/ sku gsung thugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems su 'dus so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang por 'dus pa'i don ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do// sku gsung thugs kyi don gsang ba zab mo 'di rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos lus ngag yid gsum rjes su yi rang skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la

bstod pa/ kun gzhi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor na// zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rgyal ba'i sku bzhugs so// sprul pa mang pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad// dpal chen kun bzang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes khro bo chos nyid dbyings na bzhugs// sprul pa'i khro bos las rnams rdzogs par mdzad// phra men yang sprul ye shes dbyings su 'khyil// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung dngos grub ya mtshan cho 'phrul can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa mang po 'phro// mkha' 'gro za byed phra men pho nya ma// mgyogs pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ las rnams drag shul mdzad pa'i khro rgyal sku// de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag gsang chen rnams// klung nas grol bar mdzad pa ye shes yum// sgo ba sgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams rjes su yi rangs te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bka' dam pa gsang ba zab mo'i tan+t+ra 'di sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do// de nas sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi bshags pa phul lo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pas na// lus ngag sems kyis sdig bgyis mthol zhing bshags// theg pa dman pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// thabs chen spyad dang ma spyad mthol zhing bshags// ma rig log pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// yang dag don ma rtogs pa mthol zhing bshags// snying rje chung zhing zhe sdang dbang du gyur pas na// 'gro ba'i don ma bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags// le lo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pas na// bsgom dang bsgrub la g.yel ba mthol zhing bshags// ser sna 'jur 'gegs dbang du gyur pas na// mchod pa lo zla 'das pa mthol zhing bshags// nga rgyal khengs sems dbang du bsdus pa na// slob dpon sku mi mnyes pa mthol zhing bshags// brtse gdung chung ba'i dbang du gyur pas na// grogs mched thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags// za rog ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// phud dang lhag mar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// phud dang lhag ma nyams pa'i skyon dbang gis// phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags// phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis// mkha' 'gro bka' chad gnas su gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// sgrol ba'i dus su snying rje chung ba yis// sems can gnas ma stobs pa mthol zhing bshags// nyon mongs gnas ma stobs pa'i skyon dbang gis// yun gyi sgrib par gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// sbyor ba'i dus su ting 'dzin ma gsal

bas// gzungs ma thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis// chags shing 'khor ba'i gnas su mthol zhing bshags// bshags nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// de skad ces bzod pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshangs pa gnang ste/ bka' dam pa 'di yang nas yang du rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do// de nas rdo rje chos kyis bka' dam pa 'di ma chags pa'i dbang gis bka' bzhin byas so// de nas 'khor de dag thal mo sbyar nas rjes su yi rang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog dpal snying rje rol pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi lots+tsha ba mkhas par lobs pa bal po shrI kIrtis gtan la phab ste/ skad gsar pas bsgyur nas sog po mchog gi snying po dang/ an bkra shis dang/ bal po bzang bkra shis rgya mtshos yon bdag bgyis nas mang yul byams sprin gtsug lag khang gi ya thog gi dbu rtser shin tu gsang ste// skad gsal bar bsgyur ro//// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza shrI a mr-i ta la li ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ longs spyod chen po'i gnas dam par gyur pa de nyid phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur te/ nyid kyi snang ba yongs su ma 'gags pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par bstod cing/ thabs dang shes rab mtha' kun nas grol ba'i mdzod brnyes pas/ yon tan rin po che'i bdag nyid kun nas sku sna tshogs dang/ gsung sna tshogs dang/ thugs sna tshogs dang/ yon tan sna tshogs dang/ phrin las sna tshogs kyis gzhan las 'phags shing cho 'phrul gyi bya ba thabs mkhas pa'i sgo thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su gsal bar ston pa de nyid/ 'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzang dam pa na bzhugs te/ 'od zer kyi snang ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa sna tshogs 'phrul zhing/ dkyil 'khor thams cad phyogs kun tu rgya cher bkod par mdzad do// de nyid kyi tshe na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa kun nas 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ snying po rdo

rje zhes bya ba dang/ rags rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang// mdzad pa rgya chen po zhes bya ba dang/ pad+mo don yod pa zhes bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang/ sa rnams gnon pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'bras bu bskyed pa zhes bya ba dang/ las rgyud sel ba zhes bya ba dang/ blo gros chen po zhes bya ba dang/ thams cad srung ba zhes bya ba dang/ las kun byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ glang po'i sde can zhes bya ba dang/ ston pa gtso bo dam pa rnams kyis snang ba sna tshogs dag rnam par 'phros te/ phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad nye bar bskul cing/ de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po nye bar g.yo bar mdzad do// yang dag don ni rgya che zhing// rol pa'i byin rlabs kun tu snang// thams cad mi gnyis las kun pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod// de tshe rgyal ba de dag gis// dgongs pa'i don kun mnyam bzhag nas// rang gi ye shes ji lta bar// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar sdud// de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa kun nas sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pas/ 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par lhags so// de dag kyang rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs shing/ nyid kyi longs spyod thams cad rnam par bkod pa dang/ rang gi gdan la thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul gyis thams cad longs spyod par mdzad do// bcom ldan mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// skal ldan rnams dang thabs cig bzhugs// thams cad don kun snang byed pas// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// 'di ltar ston pa kun snang bas// khyad par chos rnams kun kyi gzhi// rang gi ye shes gnas longs spyod// thabs mchog gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bde chen dgyes la gsang ba'i sku// kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yis// dkyil 'khor gnas longs spyod pa'o// gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na// gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe// de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang// rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshogs// nyan thos dge 'dun chen po yi// dgra bcom ming yang med nang du// kun bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dgongs pa'i don kun rnam par gsal/ thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mthus// ye shes cho 'phrul sna tshogs dang// 'od zer snang ba

kun khyab byed// phyag rgya'i tshogs kun gar bsgyur cing// 'dzum mdangs gsang sngags tshig bral ba'i// mi gnyis ye shes kun gsal ba'i// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ngo mtshar chos nyid don la sbyor// dkyil 'khor kun mchog bla na med// rigs kun mdzad pa ma 'gags pas// sems dang sems gnas rnam par dag/ zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// gnas rnams de nyid gnas kun bzhin// de dag ya mtshan chos kun dang// the tshom rgyun gyis rnam par 'jug/ gcig la gcig gis rjod byed pa// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kun snang zhing// rang gi rtogs pa ji lta bar// don mthun gsang ba 'gro bar byed// gnas kun rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// kun bzang dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul// mi mthun sku dang gsung thugs rnams// bya ba'i yon tan rgya cher snang// de dag shes pa las 'das pa// ngo mtshar yul 'di ji lta bu// de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog/ gsung bdag rdo rje chos nyid kyis// rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang// rnam kun ston pa'i gnas su 'khod// theg pa gsang ba'i rgyud ldan pa// phyag na rdo rje la gzigs te// rang byung bstan pa'i gnas rnams kun// thabs kyi brgyud pas gleng slong mdzod// 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas// de nyid mthu yi kun snang ba// thams cad gsang ba'i thig le nyid// byin rlabs ngo mtshar kun gyi gzhi// bstan pa'i mthu yis phyogs khyab pa// gsang ba'i bdag pos zhu bar mdzad// thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs// yon tan phrin las sna tshogs kun// mtha' rnams 'gag pa'i don ston pas// thams cad the tshom yid gnyis gyur// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// rang gi rigs tshogs dkyil 'khor rnams// rdo rje chos tshogs lhan cig tu// blo gros gsang ba'i gnas kun 'jug/ de nyid phyag rgya ji lta bar// mchod pa bkod tshogs rab 'byams kyis// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas gtso// rang gi byin rlabs yul bcas pa// kun tshogs rnam par mchod byas shing// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing gsol ba 'debs// mgon po dus gsum sgrib med pa'i// ye shes dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas// 'di ltar dngos grub rgya chen tshogs// bstan pa'i sgo rnams gang las byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i don// chos kun ma 'dres 'od gsal ba// sgyu ma lta bur 'gag pa med// de dag dkyil 'khor ji lta bur// phyogs rnams dus kun thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhing dag la// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya rnams// byin rlabs bkod pa'i yi ge bzhin// rnam 'phrul rnam par spyod pa'i tshogs// de dag chos rnams bstan pa'i dus// shin tu rgya chen 'dir gnas

pas// ngo mtshar gsang ba la zhugs mdzad// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin kun tu bzang po nyid// nges par bstan pa'i byin rlabs kyis// dgyes pa'i dga' mdangs rnam par ston// thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byin rlabs byang chub sems sbyor te// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i don// nges pa'i klung nas grol bar mdzad// srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// ma bcos gdod nas rdzogs sangs rgyas// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas// byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor 'char// dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs// ye nas gnyis med bdud rtsi'i phyir// dgongs pa rgya mtsho mthar phyin pa// nges don zab mo'i tshul gyis 'jug/ de nas bde gshegs thams cad kyis// rang snang dkyil 'khor la dgongs te// gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po 'di// rang bzhin mi gnyis bstan pas grol// de tshe 'khor gyi gtso bo'i mchog/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// ye shes mnyam nyid nyams rnyed da// rang gi rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral rnams 'khod// mtha' yas stobs rnams zad med bde// rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas te// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i gnas// dus gsum kun tu ston par dgongs// rigs tshogs byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bstan pa'i don gyis ngo mtshar skyes// e ma ho lha klu 'gro tshogs kun// rang gi rtog pa mtha' yas snang// kun gyi bsam pa shes rung zhing// thams cad skad rnams go 'gyur zhing// theg mchog snying po byin rlabs 'di// phyogs rnams kun nas spyod par dka'// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba// kun tu ma 'gags sgo mtha' yas// rgyal ba kun gyi lam nyid ni// theg chen bdud rtsi'i gnas rgyas pas// phyag rgya gsang sngags zab mo'i tshogs// de dag mtshan nyid ji lta bu// de tshe snang ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor ma 'gags rnam sprul zhing// rang bzhin gnyis med bdud rtsi'i mchog/ sgrub pa'i thabs 'di nges par gsungs// bstan pa'i phyogs rnams kun spyod pa// bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung// chos rnams ye nas bdud rtsi mchog/ nges par ston pa'i sgo 'di spyod// sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba dang// 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag ni// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung// snying po bsdus pa'i nges don 'di// thams cad byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas// lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang// dam tshig mchog tu phrin las dang// nges par sgrub dang bsgrub bya'i phyir// zab mor bsdus pa'i lung 'di gsungs// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang// brgyad khri bzhi stong bsam yas kyang// theg

pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs// gsang nyid theg par 'dus dang bzhi// ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang// bkri ba'i don de sangs rgyas yin// rna brgyud bstan pa thugs brtol te// thig le chos skur khyab pa'i phyir// nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas sa// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su grol// ye nas gnyis med lhun grub pas// gsang ba chen por rnam spyod cing// thig le byang chub sems kyi gnas// 'di dag rang gi rgyud bzhin 'jug/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i sangs rgyas che// byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya// ye nas bya byed bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i sgra// mi rtog sbyor ba'i yul med na// de lta'i yul dang rtog 'dzin gyis// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin// nges 'byung chos sku chen po la// b+ha gar ji bzhin bzhag pas na// byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med// bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang// 'bangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul// khyad par rtsal 'phags thag ring yang// gcig la gcig brten gcig gi dang// dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin du// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyi med// gnyis med ngang du rtogs grol na// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// de bas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ khams gsum rnam par spyod pa'i gzhi// sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang// lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal// lnga bzhi'i nang du 'khor ba las// ye shes sangs rgyas gzhan na med// dbyings su gyur pas mnyam pa'i ngang// de ni sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// bdud rtsi bde chen mchog gi sku// dus gsum 'gyur med dbyings kyi rgya// dbyings gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas// rnal 'byor chen po'i ngang tshul bzang// lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor mchog gyur skal bzang po// ci spyod ci bsgom ci bsgrubs kyang// bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog/ bde gshegs kun gyi thugs dam nyid// byin rlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung// thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di// spros med thig ler gnas pa las// mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'// de dag dngos grub rgya mtsho'i gzhi// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos// thams cad rang byung bdud rtsir gnas// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ston pa'i byin rlabs la snang ba// rnal 'byor thabs mkhas rnams kyi yul// rang bzhin ngo bo gcig nyid las// byin rlabs mthu rtsal rnam spros pas// thams cad dag cing grol ba'i mchog/ bdud rtsi

chen po'i rang bzhin te// thabs mkhas rnam par spyod pa'i sgo// rang bzhin ngo bos ston byed pa'o// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// phyi nang snod bcud rnam dag tshogs// rang grol 'jug pa'i spyod pa yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas mthong 'gyur// de dag rab tu dbang bskur zhing// blo bur dri ma dag pa'i mthus// rang bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed de// dam tshig gsal ba la gnas pas// thams cad kun tu mnyam sbyor cing// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par spyod// de nas bsnyen bsgrub kun rdzogs shing// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur// tha dad min la tha dad pa'i// brtan g.yo mnyam dang mi mnyam tshogs// rab grol gnas pa'i chos kun nyid// ye shes bdud rtsi chen po'i don// zhes gsungs so// de tshe 'khor tshogs rgya chen po'i// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// rang byung don gyi bdud rtsi 'di// gnas rnams kun tu rgyas par rtogs// byin rlabs ngo mtshar chen po'i yul// mi gnyis dga' ba mngon gyur cing// thams cad chos kyi gnas spyod pa'i// yang dag don ni spyod par byed// e ma ho gsang chen nyid kyi dbyings// rnam grol ye shes dkyil 'khor nyid// byang chub sems nyid rnam spyod pas// rin chen bdud rtsi rgyas par snang// phyogs rnams mtha' dag grol ba yi// rigs kun ngo mtshar skye ba'i gnas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// rang byung ye shes gnas phyag 'tshal// thams cad min la thams cad snang// de dag ngang gi dkyil 'khor nyid// phyogs dus kun tu ma 'gags pa'i// yon tan kun 'byung gnas phyag 'tshal// ngo mtshar zab cing rgya chen chos// rigs tshogs theg pa grangs med kyis// de dag tshul rnams zhi mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor kun 'byung ston pa'i mchog/ khyod nyid byang chub sems kyi zhing// gsang chen dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid/ gang zhig mthong bas rnam grol zhing// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun spyod mdzad// byin rlabs theg pa'i gnas chen 'di// rgyal ba kun gyis bstan pa'i don// phyag rgya'i rol pa rgya chen por// thams cad 'dud cing bstod pa'i gnas// zhes kun gyis rgya cher bstod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par sbyor zhing/ rigs thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po la 'dud par gyur to// de dag gi bstan pas zhing khams de nyid gsal bar byas te/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi byin rlabs kyi gzugs brnyan las// bdud rtsi'i grong khyer chen po rgya cher gzigs so// de'i tshe zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa kha cig ni nyon mongs pa'i phyogs nas rnam par spyod cing/

kha cig ni snying po ye shes kyi tshogs kyis rab tu grol bar gyur te/ 'di ltar grangs med pa'i snang ba kun kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi sgo nas spyad par snang ngo// gdod nas ma bcos sangs rgyas kun// rang gi gnas na longs spyod mdzad// de la grangs med rgya chen tshogs// zhing khams bsam gyi mi khyab grub// skye 'gro kun gyi gnas spyod de// tha dad gnyis kyi chos snang ba'i// 'di ltar kha cig rtag pa'i rgyun// nyon mongs rgyu las de bskyed cing// nga rgyal chen pos gnas pa la// nga rgyal tshogs bcas rags par spyod// de dag gnyis dang gsum bcas pa'i// dregs pa'i mtha' kun don du gnyer// de yi rgyu dang rkyen dag dang// 'bras bu nyid kyis gnas rgyas 'gyur// de las nyon mongs tshogs bskyed cing// lha min grong khyer la sogs pa'i// nga rgyal dregs pa'i mtha' gnas pa// rang rgyud rtag pa'i mthu dang ldan// 'gro gzhan de dag gnas mos pas// de nyid bstan pas bzung bar byed// zhing khams kha cig gti mug gi/ log pa'i rgyu bcas kun spyad rmongs// rgyu 'bras don kun 'khrul pa'i mthus// rtag tu mun pa'i 'jig rten gnas// de dag mthu yis khams gsum 'dir// rgyu 'bras kun tu rnam spyod pas// byol song 'jig rten la sogs snang// chos rnams kun tu rab gsal ba// de dag gti mug chen pos bsgribs// de mtha' bstan pa la gnas pa'i// rmongs pa'i tshogs rnams kun tu 'jug/ rang gi las bcas rnam spyod pa'i// sdug bsngal nyon mongs tshogs kyi rgyun// zhing khams snang ba kha cig tu// 'dod chags nyid kyi rnam spyod bdag/ de dag chos rnams kun 'dod par// nyon mongs tshogs bcas 'phel bar byed// rang gi las bzhin 'jug byed cing// rtag tu chags sred len par gnas// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i sgo mthun pas// yi dwags 'jigs rten la sogs snang// de nas de las der rtogs pa// bstan pa'i tshul de gzung bar byed// zhing khams chen po kha cig tu// zhe sdang chos kun rnam spyod de// de nyid kun nas zhen pa'i mthus// nyon mongs chos kun skyed par byed// de dag rgyu bcas 'bras bu nyid// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten la sogs snang// rgyu rkyen goms shugs mthar phyin pas// rtag tu rang gi las bzhin spyod// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis// bar mtshams med par kun tu rmongs// de nyid rkyen gyi gzhan dag kyang// de yi bstan pa la 'dzud cing// kun nas nyes pa'i blta ba yis// mtha' rnams kun tu rnam par myos// zhing khams gzhan dag kha cig tu// phrag dog las kyis 'khor gyur te// bdag cag chos kun rnam brtags pas// de dag mya ngan sdug bsngal bskyed// rang gi lta ba rnam 'dzin

pas// thams cad chos las rab tu nyams// yon tan 'dod pa'i dngos po la// kun tu 'dzin pas bdag sgrub byed// gzhan rtogs gnas kun phrag dog nyid// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyud bcas pa'i// yan lag gzhan tshogs rnam bskyed pas// rtog pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas// de las rtsa ba yan lag go/ rgyu dang bcas kyi ming sogs gnas// rang gi mthu yis kun tu snang/ dus kun mngon par zhen pa'i shugs// gzhan dag bstan pa la gnas byed// mngon par 'pho ba'i las kun gyis// lha la sogs pa'i 'gro ba kun// rang gi las dang las kyis 'khor// de las sdug bsngal kun snang bas// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur// de ltar nyon mongs tshogs 'phel zhing// rtsa ba mngon bskyed 'byin byed pas// yan lag cha shas rnam rgyas te// 'gro gzhan gnas kun rgyas par 'grub// kha cig de dag kun 'dzin cing// kha cig de dag cha la gnas// las kyi 'khor lo rnam rgyas pa// sangs rgyas nyid la 'khor ba'i gnas// zhing khams chen po gzhan dag na// spyod bcas de las grol 'dod cing// de nyid rgyu rkyen las kun spyod// de dag brtags pas gzhan gnas te// de dag zlos pas gzhan du 'khrul// de nyid tshul las grol 'dod pa'i// thabs kyis ma zin gang zag dag/ theg pa dman pa'i lam spyod cing// mya ngan mi 'da' rtog kun 'dzin// thabs gzhan theg pa'i rim pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen blos// zhing khams chen po rnam sbyangs shing// rnam grol mya ngan 'das lam bsgrub// de nas rigs rnams kun gyi bdag/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dpal// rang byung ye shes gdan bzhugs te// de nyid chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i don// thugs rje dri med spyan ldan pas// zhing khams chen po bsam yas pa'i// gdul bya'i rgyud rnams dag par gzigs// de nyid thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun snang bas// zhing khams chen po bsam yas kyi// chos rnams 'od gsal mnyam par sbyor// rigs kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor 'phrul par gsol ba gdab// de ltar rtog pa'i mtshan gnas pa// rgya cher bstan pas gdul 'gyur zhing// rgya chen theg pa sbyang ba'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// thabs mkhas kun tu rnam spyod mdzod// gtso bos 'khor gyi tshig gsan te// thugs rjes phyogs rnams sgrib med par// chos rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor zhing// gzhan dag rnam par bde bskyed de// ngo mtshar yul kun 'gro ba'i phyir// mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor don bzhin bstan// dkyil 'khor chen po nyams dga' ba'i// 'og min gnas su rnam

bkod pa// de dag dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku// rdul phran grangs med rigs kyi tshogs// dkyil 'khor chen por grol 'gyur yang// zhing khams mtha' yas bsam 'das pa'i// 'gro rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor 'di// thams cad kun tu ston par mdzad// yon tan chen po'i byin rlabs las// snang ba'i 'od kyis kun khyab cing// rab tu sbyangs pa zung 'jug pa// snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid do// rigs mchog gtso bo bzang po nyid// zhal gsum zla ba mdangs bzang gsal// g.yas sngo g.yon pa dmar ba'i bzhin// phyag drug rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes// rang gi gsang sngags kyis rdzogs pa// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// 'chi med bdud rtsi bum bcas phreng// kun tu bzang mo'i gnas sbyor zhing// dbu skra rin chen dbu rgyan mdzes// na bza' rgyan bcas rnam grol ba// thabs dang shes rab skyil krung gis// lha yi rgyal po'i khang bzang gnas// rin chen nyi zla pad dkyil bzhugs// rin chen 'bar ba'i khrir bcas pa'o// khang pa gru bzhi mu khyud ldan// re cha'i phreng ba bzang po dang// 'khor lo bcu drug bar khyams bcas// sgo khang rta babs ldan pa la// twa ra Na bzhi bkod pa dang// sna tshogs rgyan gyis nye bar spras// pad+ma rdo rje phreng ba dang// 'dod pa'i lha mo kun gyis bklubs// de nas rin chen sa gzhi la// khri steng pad ma nyi zlas brgyan// thams cad rnam par bkod byas te// gnas mchog bla med gzhan snang ba'o// rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskyed cing// phyogs rnams kun tu spros byas te// de nyid gdul bya'i gnas su snang// ye shes byin rlabs che las 'byung// kun tu bzang mo zhi ba'i mdangs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen 'dzin// dkar mo rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'phreng ba can// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed byas pa'i// yig 'bru phyag rgya'i mtshan ma kun// rang gnas 'od zer 'phro 'du'i stobs// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bzang po'i tshogs// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa// 'khor los sgyur rgyal rin chen sku// btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra las// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can// zhal bzhi dkar dmar sngo ba dag/ phrin las bzhi yi mdangs bcas pa// phyag rgya g.yas kyi bzhi dag na// rin chen spungs pa'i bum pa dag/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dzin// g.yon na pad+ma'i phreng ba dang// 'chi med bdud rtsi zla ba'o// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis bklubs// rin chen dbyings kyi yum dang 'khril// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma dang// sna tshogs rgya gram rtags kyi rgya// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i don spros te// rang bzhin kun tu bzang po'i

gnas// dbang bskur mtshan ma las byung ba'i// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan pa// lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// sgyu rtsal gur gum bzang po'i mdog/ bdud rtsi'i bum bcas phreng bas mdzes// sna tshogs dar gyi na bzas bklubs// gnyis med 'khril ba'i byin rlabs kyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'phro bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' chags bcas bdag/ bde gshegs thugs kyi rnam 'phrul zhing// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor// de bzhin phyogs rnams kun tu yang// rang rigs byin rlabs sngags kyi mthus// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad// 'od zer dpag med don yod grub// mthing ga dkar po dmar dang ljang// rdo rje rtse lnga 'khor lo dang// pad+ma rgya gram dril bus mtshan// rigs sku mngon par snang byed cing// 'od mdangs rgyan gyi phreng bas mdzes// lha mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma// bde gshegs dbang phyug chos dbang phyug/ sna tshogs dbang phyug gtso bzhi dang// chags pa'i rgyan bcas mnyes 'dzin cing// rin chen bum bcas phreng ba 'dzin// mnyam pa'i rol stabs 'khril pas gnas// rigs kyi bde gshegs che rnams kyi// zhal gsum g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar// mthing ga ljang ser khyad par can// tha ma'i phyag bzhi bdud rtsi'i snod// rang gi gsang sngags phyag mtshan kyang// 'phro 'du sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// byams pa stobs ldan dga' ba'i dpal// mya ngan mun sel blo gros mchog/ mkhas mdzad brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang// chos kun skyong ba'i dri med dpal// bzang po'i rgyan can las stobs rdzogs// mi g.yo phyag rgya'i gtsug phud can// chos kyi snying po gzhan brtse ba// dri med grags pa rin chen tog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdzes pa'i mdangs// rin chen rgyan tshogs na bzas mdzes// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// rigs kyi mtshan mas brgyan te gnas// shar na dkar gsal rdo rje che// lho phyogs gser gyi 'khor lo nyid// nub tu dmar ser pad ma rgyas// byang na ljang ser rgya gram brtsegs// rigs kyi mtshan ma kun spyod cing// mkhas mchog 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas// rang 'od yum dang 'khril sbyor cing// sprul pas 'gro ba'i don brtson pa'i// phyi yi dkyil 'khor de rnams su// rigs kyi mchod pa'i lha mo dag/ rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams dang/ kun tu 'khrigs pa'i rnam par gnas// sdul byed 'brel dang sngags dag dang// yo byad rnam par 'phrul bya bas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod mdzad cing// bkod pa kun nas rgya chen spro// sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar// dkar mthing dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ me long

phreng ba pi wang dang// gar gyis phyogs bcur mnyes mdzad ma// bdug spos me tog mar me dri// sngo ser dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ rang gi mtshan mthun phyag rgyar rol// phyogs rnams kun tu spro byed pa'o// sgor gnas khro bo'i rgyal po dag/ 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis yum dang bcas// dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ zhal gzhan de las rnam 'gyur zhing// phyag drug tho ba dbyug pa dang// pad+ma ral gri rdo rje che// 'khor lo dang bcas rnam par bsgyur// spyan gsum khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i zhal// phyogs bzhi 'byung po'i gdan steng du// dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brjid// yum bzhi lcags kyu zhags pa dang// lcags sgro dril bcas yab la 'khyud// de dag rang gi bdag po yis// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs bcas pas// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas rgyas shing// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul ste dang po'o//// gzhan yang rnam par bkod pa yi// zhing khams gnas gzhan sbyang ba'i phyir// rab 'bar gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas 'jug pas// kun tu sku dang gsung nyid dang// thugs mchog yon tan phrin las kyi// byin rlabs bstan pa kun spyod pa// thams cad chos nyid de bzhin nyid// gsang ba'i don gyi rnam 'phrul zhing// phyogs rnams kun tu ston byed pa// yang dag chos sku chen po la// thugs rje'i shugs kyis snang mdzad pa// de dag khams gsum ji lta bar// rab tu sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ye shes dbyings las snang ba yi// khang pa gru bzhi sgo bzhi mdzes// sangs rgyas theg pa kun 'dus pa'i// rin chen ta la'i phreng bas brgyan// pad+ma rdo rje sna tshogs dang// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo'i tshogs// rta babs bzhi bcas rin chen tog/ 'khor los mtshan pa'i ka ba dang// gdung ma shar bu'i rgyan gyis mdzes// dbus kyi re che'i gnas nyid la// 'khor lo'i phreng bas mdzes byas pas// gru chad bar khyams rnams kyis brgyan// rin chen sna lnga'i sa gzhi la// ji bzhin rin chen khri gdan dang// mi 'jigs seng ge la sogs gnas// nyi zla pad+mas mdzes byas shing// chun 'phyang dar la sogs pas bklubs// de nas rigs kyi bdag po nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul zhing// rigs rnams mnyam pa chen po'i chos// thams cad chos kun sbyor mdzad pa'o// 'gro rnams rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// gti mug nyid kyis 'khor ba yis// bag chags gnas tshogs nyon mongs rnams// rgyu 'bras thabs rnams sel byed cing// 'gro ba mtha' dag de gnas nyid// yang dag chos dbyings ye shes che// rtag tu rang gi gnas spyod pa// thabs

ldan rnal 'byor kun gyi yul// de dag rgyu 'bras sel bar mdzad// pho brang rin chen kun gyis mdzes/ yon tan gnas kyi dbus bzhugs pa// rang sngags phyag rgyas bskyed byas te// zhal gsum dkar sngo dmar ba'i mdangs// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad mchog/ phyag drug nor bu rin chen bum// 'khor lo ral gri 'bar ba can// rdo rje dril bus mtshan byas pa// rang 'od shes rab rigs kyi yum// bde gshegs sems ma dkar dmar mdangs// g.yas pas pad+ma g.yon phreng ba// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyar nas// 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis// yon tan tshogs 'joms mnga' brnyes shing// phyogs rnams thugs rje chen po'i dngos// kun tu ye shes 'phro mdzad pa// de ltar nyon mongs khyad par dang// thun mong rtog tshogs 'dul mdzad cing// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing// rang gi yon tan phrin las spyod// phyogs bcur rnam spros don byas nas// rigs bdag sku dang gnyis med sbyor// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag kyang// rang gi phyag rgya gsang sngags mthus// phyogs rnams kun tu spros byas te// rang gi gdan la rdzogs par gnas// mthing gi mdangs ldan mi bskyod sku// dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal gnyis mdzes// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen bum// pad sdong rin chen phreng ba 'dzin// rin chen 'byung ldan gser gyi mdog/ dkar zhing dmar zhal phyag rnams na// rin chen nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang// pad+ma ut+pal 'phreng ba 'dzin// kun tu mtha' yas gur gum mdog/ mthing ga dkar zhal phyag rnams na// pad sdong 'khor lo rin chen mdzes// bdud rtsi bsil g.yab 'phreng ba 'dzin// don grub mar ka ta yi mdangs// ser dmar zhal gnyis phyag dag gis// sna tshogs 'khor lo rdo rje bum// rin chen pad+ma 'phreng ba 'dzin// zhi ba'i rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// dbu rgyan rin chen na bzas bklubs// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer skyong// rang gi phrin las rnam spyod pa// sems ma rdo rje rin chen ma// rdo rje chos ma las dang 'khril// de dag dkar ser dmar ljang mdog/ rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// sna tshogs mtshan mas yab la 'khyud// 'od bcas rgyal bas dbang bskur ba'o// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul tshogs// bde gshegs rdo rje rin chen nyid// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje che// 'od zer rnam lnga'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul// de bzhin rigs kyi sems dpa'i mchog/ rang sngags phyag rgyas rnam bskyed cing// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas kun tu// sprul pa'i rigs bcas tshogs kyi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de bzhin chags dang legs pa gnyis// mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// rdo

rje dril bus mtshan byas pa'o// rdo rje rin chen nyi ma dang// de bzhin rgyal mtshan bzhad pa dag/ gser mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// rin chen mtshan bcas dril bu 'dzin// chos dang rnon po 'khor lo dang// rdo rje smra ba zhes bya dag/ pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs ldan zhing// pad+ma'i rdo rje dril bus mtshan// rdo rje phrin las gnod sbyin dang// rdo rje srung ba khu tshur dag/ in+d+ra nI la'i mdangs ldan pa// sna tshogs rdo rje dril bus mtshan// rang 'od yum dang mnyam sbyor zhing// rang gi phrin las rnam par spyod// rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// dga' bde'i longs spyod rnam par rol// phyogs rnams sprul pa mtha' yas pa'i// mchod pa che la longs spyod cing// mi 'jigs bsnyems pa'i sgyu rtsal can// de dag gnas kun sbyor mdzad pa'o// ye shes che gnas snang byed cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun snang bar// las kun snang ba ston mdzad pa// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin pa'o// khyad par bde gshegs rigs kyi tshogs// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la phyogs pa// sgron ma ye shes chos ston rgyas// gnyis med byang chub mkha' spyod pa// thams cad don kun rigs kyis brgyan// de dag phrin las kun spyod mdzad// bde gshegs snang gsal kun sdud dang// rab chags dga' ba'i dbang phyug mo// rigs kyi bde gshegs bskyed mdzad yum// phyag rgya'i cha lugs kun gsal ba// 'khor lo rgyal mtshan rdo rje dang// rin chen pad+ma bdud rtsi'i rdzas// dkar mthing dmar zhing ljang ba'i mdog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// phyi rol phyag rgya rol pa'i tshogs// mchod pa mtha' yas rnam bkod pa'i// sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs gar bcas// bdug pa me tog mar me dri// dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ mthing ga ser skya dmar zhing ljang// rang gi lag cha kun 'dzin pa'i// tshogs rnams dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// sgo bzhir khro bo'i rgyal po kun// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gshin rje 'joms mdzad stobs po che// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dag/ dkar dmar mthing ga g.yas g.yon zhal// phyogs kyi snang ba ji bzhin 'bar// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma la// rgya gram bdud rtsi'i snod thogs shing// lcags kyu la sogs yum bcas rgyas// rang gi gdul bya mnan par mdzad// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing// phyag rgya'i cha lugs rdzogs pa las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis// rang gi zhing khams rgya cher sbyor// sku'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul te gnyis pa'o//// de nas rigs kyi bdag po nyid// sangs

rgyas dkyil 'khor kun bkod pas// phyag rgya'i cha lugs gsal byas nas// bde gshegs gsung gi byin rlabs kyis// 'dod chags mtha' gnas dag mdzad cing// zhing khams kun tu rnam spyod pa// de ltar lhag pa'i phrin las kyis// mtha' dbus 'od kyis khyab mdzad cing// thabs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub// ye shes rgyas pas kun khyab byed// de nas gzhal yas khang chen te// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// twa ra Na sogs logs bzhi mdzes// pad+ma rdo rje'i phreng ba can// 'dod yon lha mo kun tu 'khrugs// phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pas mdzes// dbus ni re'u cha dgu pa la// pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan byas pa'i// phyi rol pad+ma bcu drug pa'o// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud mdzes// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri steng la// nyi zla 'khor lo pad+ma'i gdan// gtso bo bde chen chags pa'i rgyal// pad+ma'i gnas kun las spyod pa// zhal brgyad phyag rgya bcu drug ste// 'od mdangs dmar po'i rgyan gyis mdzes// pad+ma rdo rje mda' gzhu dang// ral gri bum pa phreng ba gos// 'od zer sna lnga'i tshogs dag las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun ston mdzad// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan chas dang// dbu rgyan dar gyi na bzas bklubs// 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis// rang gi longs spyod kun nas sbyong// lha mo pad+ma bde chen ma// dkar dmar chags pa'i mdangs ldan pas// pad+ma bdud rtsis mtshon byas shing// thabs dang shes rab sbyor bar gnas// rdo rje rnam 'phrul la sogs pa'i// phyogs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa// rdo rje bde ba chen po dang// rin chen pad+ma las rnams kyi// bde chen yum dang gnyis med sbyar// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// phyogs bcur spro dang bsdu mdzad cing// dkar mthing ser dang ljang gu'i mdog// rdo rje rin chen 'khor lo dang// rgya gram dril bu bdud rtsi'i snod// bum pa rin chen phreng ba dang// bzang po'i gnas su brgyan byas la// zhal gsum g.yas g.yon rnam par bsgyur// chags pa'i rgyan cha kun gyis brjid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// rigs kyi phyag rgya'i tshul du bzhugs// phyi rol pad+ma'i gdan dag tu// bde ba'i lha mo bcu drug nyid// bkra shis lha mo dpal ldan 'phreng// rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang// pad+ma'i phreng ba nor bdag mo// dbyangs can lha mo'i rigs kun ming// don yod nor bu dpal chen ma// pad+ma'i dbyangs sgrogs rin chen 'chang// 'od zer chen mo nor gyi rgyun// kun tu snang ba'i bsil ba ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid pa'i mdangs// 'od zer cha lugs kun gyis mdzes// dkar mthing ser dang ljang gu'i mdog/ rdo rje rin chen 'khor lo che// rgya gram bdud rtsi'i bum pa can// rang byung

rig pa dang bcas pa'o// phyi nas mchod pa'i lha mo kun// gnas rnams kun na rnam par 'khod// sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs mkhan gar// bdug spos me tog mar me dri// rang gi rigs bcas rgyan kun dang// kha dog mtshan mar rnam par gnas// sgo bzhir khro bo rnam brjid pa// 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha 'phreng bas 'khrigs// rang gi yum bcas skur sbyor zhing// lcags kyu zhags bcas tshogs spro mdzad// de dag dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs 'phrul// zhing khams chen po sbyong mdzad cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul ba'i tshul te gsum pa'o//// de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i mchog/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan snang bas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun sbyong zhing// thabs dang shes rab rnam par spyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// phyag rgya che mchog ston pa yi// 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas sgo// rab tu ston pas rdzogs byed cing// de gnas 'gro kun dag par mdzad// yang dag chos sku chen po las// thugs rje'i shugs kyis snang mdzad pa// de dag khams gsum ji lta bar// rab tu sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// zhe sdang nyid kyis 'khor ba yi// bag chags sna tshogs nyon mongs rnams// rgyu 'bras mtha' rnams sel byed pa'i// don mthun ston pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// rang gi gsang sngags kun spros te// brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus kun// dkyil 'khor rigs bcas gzhal yas khang// khang pa gru bzhi rta babs rgyan// rin chen dra ba 'phreng sogs kyis// phyogs mtshams kun tu rnam spro zhing// nyi zla phreng ba rdo rje dang// nor bu pad+ma sna tshogs kyis// phreng ba kun gyis yang dag brgyan// de dbus re cha'i steng rnams su// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba dang// rin chen khri steng mi 'jigs sogs// nyi zla pad+ma 'khor los brgyan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsang yum dam tshig nyid kyi mthus// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// dkar gsal zhal gsum phyag drug brjid// sngo dang dmar gyi mdangs bcas pa// rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu dang// pad ma ral gri mdzes pa'i phyag/ kha dog lnga yi 'od gsal bas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrol// phyogs rnams kun tu spros byas te// gsang sngags rdzogs pa'i gnyis med 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun nas dbang bskur cing// rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mdzes// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mthus// rigs kyi bde gshegs thams cad kun// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzogs byas te// phyogs rnams rang gi gnas su sbyor// shar gyi rnam snang gser gyi

mdog/ zhi la zhal gsum sngo dang dkar// phyag drug 'khor lo sogs 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas spyan dang 'khril ba'o// lho na rin chen kun 'byung rgyal// baiDUr+ya mdog zhal gsum pa// dkar dmar rin chen sna tshogs brgyan// phyag drug rin chen la sogs kyis// mtshan ma yum bcas rgyal po'i tshul// yon tan gnas kun rgyas mdzad pa'o// nub tu mtha' yas dmar gsal mdog/ zhal gsum sngo dang dkar ba'i bzhin// pad+ma'i rgyan chas rnam dag mkha'// chos rnams thams cad rdzogs par byed// phyag drug pad+ma la sogs pa'i// mtshan bcas rang gnas yum dang 'khril// byang du don yod ljang gu'i mdog/ zhal gsum dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// kun tu phrin las rnam spyod pa// rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad// phyag drug rgya gram la sogs pa'i// rgyan bcas yum dang mnyam par spyor// rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag/ phyogs mtshams phyi rol dkyil 'khor la// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon rgyas pas// gnas kun spyod pas yongs su brgyan// sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang// kun tu gzigs pa gsang ba'i bdag/ byams pa sgrib sel kun tu bzang// 'jam dpal chos kyi sems dpa' che// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas// yum bcas rang gi gnas spyod cing// phyag rgya'i tshul kun nye bar mdzes// dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ dkar sngo ser dang dmar ba nyid// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang// rdo rje bum pa zla dkyil 'khor// nye ba'i rin chen rdzas ldan pa// bdud rtsi bdud sogs rnam par rgyal// rin chen snyems ma bkra shis rdzas// rigs kyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur cing// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu rgyan mdzad// ye shes bdud rtsi'i bcud rgyas pa'i// phyogs mtshams dkyil 'khor kun spyod pa'o// phyi nang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams// rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskyed cing// sgeg mo phreng ba gar dang dbyangs// bdug spos me tog mar me dri// kha dog mtshan ma rigs rnams kyis// mtshan mthun phyogs bzhir gnas pa dag/ kun tu mchod pa rnam spro mdzad// de dag rang gi dkyil 'khor sbyor// sgo bzhir sgo nga'i rgyal po rnams// gshin rje la sogs gdan la gnas// shar du gshin rje 'joms byed pa'o// sngo skya zhal gsum dkar dang dmar// rdo rje rtse gsum lcags kyu dang// dbyug pa phyag gnyis yum dang sbyor// lho phyogs stobs chen rgyal po nyid// ser skya zhal gsum dkar dang dmar// phyag drug ral gri gtun shing dang// zhags pa rin chen yum dang 'khril// nub tu rta mchog rol pa nyid// dmar skya zhal gsum sngo dang dkar// phyag drug pad+ma rdo rje dang// lcags sgrog gri gug yum dang 'khril// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa

nyid// zhal gsum ljang nag dkar dmar mdangs// phyag drug rgya gram rtse gsum dang// dril bu thod pa dbyug pa'o// de dag khro rtags 'dzin pa'i tshul// rab 'bar 'od zer chen pos brjid// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bur// rang gi gnas la longs spyod mdzad// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rigs kyi lha mo'i tshogs bcas las// 'di dag dkyil 'khor gnas spyod cing// rab 'bar khro bo bzhi gnas sbyor// de dag dkyil 'khor grangs med tshogs// sprul bcas kun tu snang ba dag/ gsang sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs sbyor bas// zhing khams rgya chen dag par mdzad// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul ba'i tshul te bzhi pa'o//// de nas rigs rnams bdag nyid gtso// bcom ldan bde ba chen po nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas spyod cing// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar mdzad// dus gsum phrag dog chen po'i rgyun// log pa'i stobs kyis rnam rgyas pa// kun tu phrin las rnam spyod pa// kun tu gnas tshogs bsgral ba'i phyir// gsang sngags phyag rgya rnam 'phrul zhing// zhing khams kun spyod dag par mdzad// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// phyogs bcu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// ra ba rgyan bcas sgo bzhi mdzes// rta babs phyogs kyis rnam par phye// phyogs bcur phyi nang kun khyab pa'i// 'dod yon mchod pas kun nas 'khrigs// rin chen tshogs spungs shar bu dang// dra ba dra phyed snyan pa'i sgra// ba dan rlung gis bskyon pa las// gsung rab yan lag kun sgrogs shing// legs par kun nas rnam sbags pas// nyi zla me long rgyan gyis mdzes// sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram gyi// phreng ba rgyan bcas tog gis mdzes// rin chen sna lnga'i sa gzhi nyid// re cha dgu gnas rnam byed pa// sna tshogs rdo rje pho brang nyid// bcu drug gru chad bar khyams bcas// rin chen khri steng sems can tshogs// nyi zla rdo rje rgya gram brtsegs// gtso bo rigs kyi bdag po nyid// zhal gsum ljang ser 'bar ba'i mdog/ ljang dkar dmar mdangs zhal gyis mdzes// phyag drug 'khor lo 'khor ba dang// nyi zla bdud rtsi phreng bas brgyan// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan bcas pas// 'od zer sna tshogs phreng bas brjid// phrin las rnam par spros pa yi// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun ston mdzad// thams cad mthar gnas dag pa'i mthus// stobs chen sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// las kyi dbang phyug dpal chen mo// dkar dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan// nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi'i snod// sna tshogs rgyan mdzes rnam par 'khril// thabs dang shes rab spyod mdzad nas// phyag rgya sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis// thams cad dkyil 'khor gnas bsdus te// rang rig rgyal ba'i

lha rnams kun// mchod pa'i yan lag rdzogs par bskyed// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung ldan nyid// mtha' yas rnam par snang mdzad nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gdan bzhugs shing// mthing ser dkar dmar dkar po nyid// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug par// dkar dmar mthing ga ser po brjid// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// 'khor lo bum pa bdud rtsi'i rdzas// nyi zla rin chen phreng bas mdzes// sna tshogs rgyan dang gos kyis bklubs// bde ba dpal chen lha mo rnams// sngo ser dmar skya ljang gu'i mdog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// 'od mdangs phreng bas gnas spyod cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gtso mnyes mdzad// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gnas rnams kyi// pho brang gdan la mngon phyogs par// bde ba'i mkha' 'gro sems dpa' che// rang gi sngags kyi rnam par 'phrul// yang dag rdzogs pa mngon rgyas dang// gnas kun rol pa mi gnyis mchog/ mkha' mdzod kun tu rdo rje nyid// nye bar ston te bdud rtsi mchog/ mi pham bshes gnyen glang po ste// dpal gyi blo gros chos kyi bdag/ lha yi dbang phyug phreng ba can// mya ngan gnas skyob 'jug sel ba// gar gyi kun skyob mnyes pa che// dregs pa 'joms byed rigs ldan mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// rang gi gnas kun longs spyod mdzad// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// rgya gram rtse gsum bdud rtsi'i snod// rin chen bum pa gang ba'i rdzas// rang 'od yum dang gnyis med sbyor// na bza' rgyan bcas 'od gsal 'phro// rigs kyi dbu rgyan kun rdzogs pa'o// phyi nang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams// rigs kyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste// sgeg mo phreng ba gar dang dbyangs// bdug spos me tog mar me dri// sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs rnams kyi// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang mthun par gnas// mchod pa'i longs spyod kun sprul zhing// grangs med rdul tshogs bkod pa mdzad// sgo bzhir khro bo'i rgyal po dag/ sna tshogs rdo rje brag ri la// rang gi phrin las gdul bya'i tshogs// don bzhin mthun par tshar gcod cing// mnyes pa'i lha mo kun dang sbyor// rigs kyi rgyan tshogs kun gyis brjid// gshin rje 'joms byed stobs po che// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dag/ dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// 'khor lo 'bar bas sku bskyed cing// rin chen bum pa bdud rtsi'i rdzas// 'jigs byed rtsa gsum dgra s+t+wa thogs// khro bo'i cha lugs rnam sprul pas// stong gsum sprul pas 'gengs par byed// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs pa'i mthus// rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar gnas// 'di dag rang gi gnas kun nas// zhing khams thams cad khyab par spro// phrin las kyi dkyil

'khor 'phrul pa'i tshul te lnga pa'o//// de nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po nyid// dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas spros shing// grangs med rigs kyi kun snang mdzad// la lar zhi dang khro bo dang// la lar rgyas dang dbang gi tshul// grangs med sku rnams kun ston cing// rigs bzhi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad// de dag ston pas 'dul mdzad cing// theg pa'i don rtogs rgya chen po// bde gshegs kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las ji bzhin pa'i// gsang ba rgyud chen rnam bshad cing// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams kun spros te// rigs kyis sangs rgyas gnyis med mthus// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas brgyan par// bdag po'i sku dang gnyis med gsal// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing// de nyid de tshe 'gro gnas mtha' dag kun// kun tu bstan par 'dul gyur cing// ra sA ya na'i gnas spyod pas// skye shi mtha' bcad rnam par grol// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi rol pa zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems de kho na nyid bstan cing dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phrul pa ste rim par phye ba dang po'o//// de nas kun tu bzang po dpal// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsol btab nas// rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i gnas bzhugs te// ra sA ya na'i tshogs rgyas mdzad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gnas 'di dag/ bde gshegs byin rlabs rol pa'i tshogs// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi spyod// bdud rtsi bcud chen rgyas pa nyid// thams cad kun tu khyab pa las// cho 'phrul rmad byung yul kun snang// de nas tshangs pa'i gtso bo mchog/ dung gi thor tshugs khong seng can// tshangs pa kun sgrol chen po dang// drang srong chen po ljang sngon bu// tsa ra ka dang nab so skyes// tha skar bu dang lhar bcas nyid// rgyun shes gnas dang g.yon phyogs lha// thang la bar dang me bzhin 'jug/ rkang gnyis spyod dang ka na ya// shing khyer dang ni ljang sngon bu// nyi ma zla ba klu ru bcas// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun// 'di kun 'khor dang bcas pa yis// kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal nas// sman gyi dbang dang dam tshig mnos// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i mchog/ dus kun 'gyur ba med pa'i gzhi// bdag cag 'jig rten pa rnams la// gtso bos bka' gros mdzad par 'os// bcom ldan thugs rje'i gnas gyur cing// nam mkha' bzhin du kun khyab mdzad// yang dag sangs rgyas ma thob pa'i// 'jig rten spyod bcas rnam grol mdzod// thams cad bdud rtsi ra sA yan// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i rdzas// 'jig rten lha bcas 'gro gnas dag/ dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur zhing// bdud

rtsi dam tshig mchog 'di zung// de dag dus bzhin sbyor byed cing// kun tu bsnyen dang nye bsnyen dang// sgrub dang sgrub chen brtson pa yis// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sbyor byed pas// de dag ji bzhin goms pa'i mthus// thams cad chos kyi tshul rgyun snang// rigs mthun gzhan gyis mi shigs pa'o// dam tshig chen po rdzogs byed chos// thugs rje nyi mas kun skyob mdzod// de nas kun bzang bde gshegs kyis// thams cad bdud rtsi'i don dgongs te// nyid kyi snang ba ma 'gags pa'i// cho 'phrul kun tu bkod par mdzad// de tshe thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul gyis// sa rnams rab tu g.yos nas ni// stong gsum 'jig rten gnas kun tu// thams cad sman chen bcud kyi len// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// de dag ma 'gags las rdzogs pa'o// de ltar smin par gyur pa yang// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med las// rnam dag 'byung ba'i sprin khyab pas// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel tshogs par 'gyur// sprin chen glog gi phreng ba dag/ phyogs bcur sgrib med rgyun bcas pa'i// bdud rtsi 'dod pa'i char 'bab cing// thams cad thugs rje snyoms pa'i mgon// bskal pa'i bcud rnams tshogs pa las// phyi nang 'byung rnams tshims par gyur// bdud rtsi rgya mtsho'i gnas rgyas pa// phyi nang ma lus bdud rtsi kun bskyed cing// ri rab rtse dang ri sul kun// sman ljongs gnas dang nag tshal dang// lcang lo can gyi gnas kun tu// thams cad bdud rtsi'i char gyis brlan// bcud du thams cad ro gcig ste// 'byung ba'i bcud las skyes pa ni// dpag bsam shing dang gel pa'i shing// 'dzam bu'i shing rgyas tsu ta'i shing// rang rang rgyud kyi tshogs rnams dang// yon tan tshogs rnams 'phel bar gyur// sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang// rtsa ba sdong bu shun lpags dang// snying po yal ga lo ma dang// 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// de bzhin 'bru tshogs rnam grangs kun// thams cad bcud rgyas smin par gyur// de dag longs spyod kun gyi mchog/ so so'i yul dang gnas dag nas// mdog dang dri dang ro dang mthu// rang gi sa bon bden gnyis las// de dag rang bzhin 'byin par byed// der gnas skye 'gro thams cad kun// ra sA ya na'i rdzas la spyod// 'gro ba drug gi gsos su gyur// bdud rtsi'i sgo dag rnam par 'phel// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang// nyid kyi dgongs pa'i don bzhin du// 'khor ldan tshogs la bka' stsal zhing// de dag byin rlabs ngo mtshar skyed// 'jig rten khams snang sna tshogs kun// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis snang// de dag phyi nang snod bcud kyi// rten 'brel mthur bcas kun tshogs pa'i// rang bzhin gnyis med ye shes che// dag pa'i thugs rje

kun spyod pas// thams cad sman chen ra sA yan// rnam par 'phrul pas gnas kun rgyas// de dag gnyis med chen po yis// spyod bcas bdag gis rab tu 'grub// rang bzhin gnas pa'i mthu rnams la// sbyangs shing bsgrubs pa'i stobs dag gis// dngos grub chen po mchog thob cing// brten par bdud rtsi'i gnas 'phel 'gyur// lam 'dir sngags dang phyag rgya yis// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi bcad rnam par dag/ dang por bsgrub pa'i yul gnas ni// rang gi yid mthun dben par brtsam// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan pas// dbang bskur dam tshig mchog la gnas// sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i mthus// thams cad don sbyor 'bras bu'i tshul// phyi nang 'byung ba las skyes pa'i// bdud rtsi'i rdzas rnams gang rung zhig/ dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i gnas bzhag ste// rang gi rten 'brel tshul bzhin spyad// grub pa'i dngos grub chen po nyid// las kyi dngos grub la brten pas// thams cad don kun gsang ba'i gnas// las kyi sgrub pa ji bzhin du// brten pa'i stobs gyis mngon par sbyor// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// tshul 'dis thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing// las bcas tshogs rnams dag 'gyur te// gnyis med thugs rje chen po'i dbyings// thun mong sbyor ba la brten pas// mchog gi dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// de dag cho ga ji bzhin mthus// yang dag mchog gi 'bras bu rdzogs// de tshe bstan pa'i lung bzhin du// 'jig rten drang srong che rnams kyis// bdud rtsi'i rig 'dzin mngon bsgrub ste// bsnyen bsgrub phyag rgya bzhir gnas pas// la la thang cig yud la 'grub// la la nyin zhag gcig gis 'grub// la la nyin zhag bdun gyis 'grub// la la nyi shu rtsa gcig na// la la zla ba lo yi dus// de dag the tshom med par 'grub// 'di dag mi yi 'gro gnas bzhin// dus tshigs gzhan du nges med bstan// de dag sman gyi mtshan nyid ni// rtsa ba sdong bu yal ga dang// lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang// shun lpags me tog 'bras bu snying por bcas// ro drug mthu stobs kha dog las// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag brgyad// de dag rnam par phye ba'i grangs// sna tshogs yon tan stong du 'gyur// rang bzhin sbyar dang sgrub pa'i rdzas// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing// bdud dpung nges par 'joms byed pa'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po sman gyi mchog/ nges bsgrub 'bras bu gsal bar 'gyur// drang srong che rnams stobs ldan zhing// mngon shes lnga dang ldan 'gyur te// rig pa'i gnas mchog bco brgyad shes// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin 'thob/ stegs bu khru gang tshad mnyam par// ba yi rnam lnga dri gtsang chu// yang dag maN+Dal ji bzhin par// kha dog rgyan ldan rdzas

rnams bkod// gtsang ma'i gos sogs nyer brgyan cing// khrus kyi cho ga rnam gsum gyis// phyi nang legs sbyangs rdzas bsags te// sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya// dbus kyi bum par sman gyi mchog/ bdud rtsi cong zhi rnam gsum dang// ser skya ba las byung ba yi// 'o ma legs btsags sman ldan pa// a shwa gan d+ha'i phye ma dag/ legs par bskol te 'dres par sbyang// lcags las byas pa'i snod nang du// mngar gsum dri bcas gdab par bya// byin brlab brtan pas bsrung bya zhing// sbyang zhing 'phro 'du'i sngags kyis gdab// oM badzra a mr-i ta sid+d+hi be la lig tsa d+ha sa d+hi tu swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong rtsa brgyad// byin rlabs sngags kyi 'od tshogs kyis// dag pa'i bcud rnams bsdus byas te// bstims las dngos grub rnam par 'phel// oM a mr-i ta sid+d+hi bi tsu na ya swA hA/ dngos grub mtshan ma kun ston pa// de dag tshul bzhin rnam par sbyor// de nas lha rnams mchod byas te// byin rlabs brtan pas bza' bar bya// de yang snga dro'i dang po'am// nyi ma'i gung la bab dus su// phyogs rnams khro bos gnas bsrungs shing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor longs spyod rgyas// don dam thig le bden pa las// yon tan gnas kun sna tshogs ston// snying po med las snying po nyid// 'bras bu rnam smin rig 'dzin mchog/ de dag byin rlabs phyag rgya sngags// don bzhin spyod par mi ldan yang// bdud rtsi za ba'i thabs rnams kyis// nad med lo brgya mtsho bar byed// drang srong chen po mchog rnams kyis// ji ltar phal par spyod pa las// de yi nus mthu mtha' yas tshogs// sna tshogs rnam par snang ba bzhin// de dag legs par sbyar ba'i mthus// mchog gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang// phyi yi sman 'bras gsum sogs pa// so sor sbyor dang gcig bsdus pa'i// byin rlabs ngo mtshar mtha' yas te// rang gi rten 'brel mthu ston cing// las kun myur bar g.yo bar byed// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// rnam rgyal gso byed 'phel byed dang// skyes bu bdud rtsi gser gyi mdog/ las kun rnam par ston par tshogs// rang gi yon tan rdzas ldan pas// legs sbyar ra sA ya na'i mchog/ de bzhin mar nag lcags phye dang// dngul chu gze ma la sogs pa'i// mthu dang ngo bo mtha' yas te// bdud rtsi'i gtso bor dang sbyar bas// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang// 'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi dgra// dus min rnam rtog phyi nang rkyen// gcig la bye brag mtha' yas pa// de dag rab tu zhi byed pa// phung po'i bdud dang nyon mongs bdud// lha yi bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud// thams cad sel bar byed pa la// bdud rtsi 'di las gzhan med do// shar lho nub byang

bye brag gi/ phrin las so so'i bye brag bzhin// brag las 'dzag pa'i khu ba nyid// rin chen sna lnga'i rdzas bzhin 'gyur// de dag rab tu sbyar ba'i bcud// bdud rtsi'i gtso bo mchog ces grags// a ru ro mchog brgya rtsa brgyad// gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa gcig sogs// ba yi chu sogs rim bzhin du// skam po rlon pa'i tshang lta bur// gnyer ma sul dag drangs byas te// dri zhim sman tshogs bcud dang sbyar// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po ji lta bar// rim bzhin bstan pas rdzogs par 'gyur// zangs lcags 'khar ba'i snod rnams su// bkang ste stegs bu'i steng du bzhag/ byin rlabs sngags dang phyag rgya yis// 'od dang dri sogs 'byung bar 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste bkan// mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug/ lha yi dngos grub kun bsdus nas// rigs dang ldan pas btung bar bya// oM a mr-i ta si ti bi tsUr na ya swA hA/ de yi yon tan brjod mi langs// rdo rje'i srog dang ldan 'gyur te// nad med rtag tu dar la bab// grub pa'i rig 'dzin dam par 'gyur// srid pa chags nas srub shing gis// bsrubs pa'i 'bras bu rin po che// me shel chu shel kun snang 'od// de dag thabs dang shes rab po// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor longs spyod dus// bdud rtsi 'dzad las smon lam stobs// rigs pa'i bu mo bzang mo gnyis// gtsang ma'i gnas su skyes shing rgyas// lha dang dri za gnod sbyin dang// rin chen sna tshogs 'byung khungs gnas// legs ldan gangs ri gnyan gyi shod// ri rab chu klung bgegs bral ba'i// bdud rtsi chen po ra mnye ba// nye'u shing mchog ces rab tu grags// gser mdog bdud rtsi kun gsal ba// star bu mchog tu gyur pa yis// nyi ma'i rigs las kun skye zhing// gzugs mdzes tsha ba'i ro dang bcas// tsher gnon dbal las 'khrungs pa yi// bdud rtsi shing mchog dri dang ldan// gzugs bzang mdzes pa phun sum tshogs// rgun 'bru 'byung ba kun gyi bcud// de bzhin zla ba bdud rtsi'i chu// dug rnams 'joms shing slar yang bzlog/ sna tshogs nad rnams sel bar byed// nyi ma'i 'od rnams zla ba'i mdog/ ro rnams rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// lha rdzas dge ba dbang po lag/ de bzhin mchog gyur ru rta nyid// rang gis dus bzhin bcud rdzas bskos// legs sbyar gtsang ma'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor gnas bzhag bsgrub pa'am// gong bzhin legs par spyod pas bza'// rten 'brel rten gyi mthu byas la// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan par 'gyur// nyi ma zla ba'i dngos grub thob// ra sA ya na'i gtso bo yin// 'jig rten gnas kun rgyal byed pa// 'byung ba'i dngas ma kun bsags nas// mkhas pas gcig tu sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khor bzang

po'i gnas bzhag go/ rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin brtan pas byin gyis brlab// bdud rtsi shing mchog 'dzam bu'i shing// lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// yon tan bcud rdzogs ro kha ba// bkra shis dpal rnams rdzogs byed rdzas// seng lding yan lag brgyad ldan pa// dri snang bzang po sman dang sbyar// de bzhin rtsa ba yan lag dang// lo ma me tog 'bras bu sogs// rang gi bcud rnams rgyas pa'i dus// de yi phyogs bzhin mkhas pas gleng// se ba gzhon nu stobs ldan pa// de bzhin kan ta ha ra dag/ kaN+Da ka ri yin nam// dkyil 'khor gnas su legs spyad pa'am// bcud len bsten pas bcu rdzogs 'gyur// de dag lha rnams kun gyis kyang// dngos grub rdzas su byin brlabs te// dus bzhir phyag 'tshal mchod byed cing// dngos grub rdzas su nye bar sbyor// ston zla tha chung dpyid zla 'bring// yar ngo'i brgyad dang nya dus btsal// byis pa lo drug bdun du brgyad// gtsang mas khrus byas rgyan gyis mdzes// bdag nyid rnal 'byor dang bcas pas// shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas te// sems can kun la tshad med blos// kun bzang dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bskor byas te// smon lam rgya chen gdab par bya// phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi mchog khyod la// phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi las byung ba// stobs dang bkra shis 'phel mdzad cing// rab byung ston pa'i bka' rgyas shog/ lha mo khyod ni dpal 'gyur zhing// ra sA ya na'i rdzas rnams kun// dngos grub mchog tu nyer spyod pas// tshe dang stobs mchog rgyas par gsol// de ltar rtsa ba la sogs rdzas// gang gis bcud rgyas de nyid gzungs// shun lpags dang ni rgyus pa bsal// thor to bsnyil te gnas su sbed// blang bya'i sman rnams gang yang rung// gtsang ma'i gnas su legs par bskam// 'di dag dkyil 'khor gnas bzhag ste// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus la// rang nyid khrus byas rgyan gyis mdzes// dri gtsang me tog phreng bcas pas// bdud rtsi'i lha la gsol btab cing// bdud rtsi'i bcud rnams bsdus te bsgrub// rang nyid lha yi ting 'dzin gyis// brgya stong 'bum sogs ci nus bzlas// grub pa'i rtags tshang gsal ba'i dus// rang gi phyag rgya mngon par blang// bsrung sbyang byin rlabs brtan byas te// ba yi 'o ma dag dang sbyar// bza' ba'am yang na btung ba dang// phye ma'i mchog dag 'gam pa las// sngags kyis thog mtha' rgyas par bya// oM na ma ra dza a ka dza du swA hA// de nas bsnyen dang bsgrub pa dang// sgrub chen las kyi mthar dbyung zhing// sems can kun la dmigs pa'i stobs// dkyil 'khor gsal bas longs spyod do// gang zhig rdzas la

brten pa'i mthus// bcud len rtsal du spyod byed pa// zhag gam za ma'i grangs bzhin du// srang re'i cha nas bskyed cing bza'// ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar// 'ju ba'i stobs dang sbyar bar bya// legs par rdzogs pa'i cha rnams kyis// lus ngag yid gsum dbang po gsal// ji ltar lha rnams 'chi med ltar// klu rnams la ni sman bzhin du// shing rnams la ni chu bzhin du// me tog dag la nyi zla bzhin// tshe lo lo brgya'i bar gnas te// bcu drug mdog gi gzhon nu'i sku// nad med rtag tu dar la bab// stobs rnams gang po che mnyam zhing// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// 'o ma sbrang rtsi ka ra mchog/ mar khu dri sna lnga dang btung// zhag gcig zos na yon tan bcu// bcu na yon tan brgya 'phel zhing// nyi shu rtsa gcig zos pa yis// rtsa brgyad stong gi dngos grub thob// bud med stong la khyab par sbyor// sa bon mi zad 'bras bu yang// bu phor 'phel zhing dpal dang ldan// mi rnams kun gyis mi gsod pa'o// zla gcig zos pa'i yon tan ni// ngo yang zla ba nya rgyas bzhin// gnod sbyin srin pos mi 'jigs pas// lha rnams kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// zag pa zad nas mkha' la 'gro// rdo rje khros bcas mkha' 'gro 'dul// rig 'dzin go 'phang 'thob 'gyur zhing// gang zag dngos grub 'phel bar 'gyur// 'di dag rten 'brel mthu yin te// mi mthun gnas kun spang bar bya// lug mig me tog chen po ni// ra sA ya na'i rgyal po ste// ba yi 'o ma dag dang bskol// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya bskyed// rngub cing 'thung pas ba spu langs// mdog dang byin rlabs kun gsal zhing// rngub gnyis 'thungs pas yon tan mchog/ rim dang nad sogs zhi bar 'gyur// mig rtsa dmar zhing mdog kyang gzhon// glang po che yi stobs dang mtshungs// phyi ma dri mar skam pa dang// ma do la ni khu ba dag/ dgra yi gzugs brnyan la bskus na// lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// oM su tri ha na ha na hU~M/ mA ra ya mA ra ya// tse ta ya tse ta ya su tri gri ba phaT// bdud rtsi ra sA ya na'i gtso// chu dag dkar po ru rta yi// phye ma byas te blud byas la// rgyal po bud med dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin gu gul la sogs rdzas// gi waM sman dang sbyar ba'i mthus// thams cad don kun ston byed de// tri ya yo ga'i rig 'dzin 'grub// de ltar sbyor ba rgya chen rdzogs// thams cad rab tu sbyar pa'i mthus// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// yon tan chos kun rdzogs par byed// rak+ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa// ra sA ya na'i gtso bo ste// rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu rnams// rigs mthun bzang zhing dmar ba'o// 'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam// gyen

du 'greng ba'i snye ma mchog/ ston zla ra ba'i nya la btsal// khrag gi nyung ma zhes bya'o// rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba dang// pad+ma raka ta cha mnyam bsre// oM na mo rA ga raka ta mu la bu na swA hA/ 'gro ba dbang byed dam pa 'di// chags pa'i bdud rtsi chen po yin// me tog tha skar gzhon nu nyid// sa bon khu ba kun 'phel byed// snye ma zur gsum til gang 'dra// rdo rje brag kyang 'joms par nus// byang chub sems dang rus pa yi// sbyor byed stobs kyis kun rgyal ba'o// rus pa sra mkhregs rdo rjer 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu dang mnyam// dbang po'i lag dang gnod sbyin lag/ lnga dang bzhi gsum bye brag gis// sdong bu yal ga mdzes par byed// snye ma zur gsum mda' sgro 'dra// dbyar zla tha chung nya la brko// sgrub po'i lag mthil g.yon du bzhag/ dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya yin// lus las byung ba'i dri chen dang// dzA ti nyung dkar cha mnyam pas// phyi nang dug rnams sel byed cing// bdud rtsi chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur// srin po 'joms byed rna ba gnyis// mchog chen lnga yi rna bar sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas// rna ba'i mngon shes thob par byed// ba hu mig gi me tog dang// mkha' lding tshogs kyi mig sbyar bas// rdo rje an 'dza' nag po bzhin// mig gi mngon shes rdzogs par 'gyur// tsi tra ka dang snying zho sha/ mi mchog snying dang sbyar byas pas// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub dang// bde gshegs thugs kyi ye shes skye// gi waM kun tu ma nyams pa// go ro
