tsa na'i rigs kun sbyar/ de dag ban glang rigs can gyis// dngos grub thams cad ston par byed// go ro tsa na'i rigs rnams dang// thang la ha yi rtsa bar sbyar// mdangs kyi dngos grub sku thob cing// dus rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur// me tog kha 'bar lce bzhi dang// lce rnams kun tu sbyar byas pas// dbang po ljags kyi dngos grub dang// spyan ras gzigs kyi las rnams 'phel// me tog rma lo 'khri 'khri dag/ ga na rigs gnyis 'bras bur sbyar// cha snyoms btags te phye mar byas// zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe// yi dam lha la mchod byas shing// de dag chang dang sbyar te btung// skad cig yud kyis 'grub pa ste// rta mgrin dbang gi dngos grub thob// sems can rnams kyi lce dang sbyar// ra sA ya na'i gtso bor 'gyur// sna dang rna ba'i me tog dang// legs par sbyar te bsgrub byas pa'i// ri lu rang gi rnal 'byor na// tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs sgrogs par 'gyur// dung dang 'brug rus tha kar dang// sems can rus pa gang rung sbyar// lus kyi rdo rje mngon shes 'thob// ra sA ya na'i gtso bo yin// rgya mtsho lbu ba 'dus pa'i chu// sna tshogs chu dang gangs kyi rlan// lan tshwa sna tshogs dri chu

rnams// rdo rje chu yi bdud rtsi ste// phrin las 'gro ba'i don 'grub bo// de dag ra sA ya na'i mchog/ phyi nang sna tshogs sbyar nas 'grub// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus pa'i// bdud rtsi chen po'i don spyod pa'i// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// sna tshogs rnam par bkod byas pa// de dag bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams te// rang bzhin gcig pa'i dngos grub mchog/ yang dag rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar// phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis// sna tshogs snang ba tha dad de// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i rdzas// yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar// 'go'u ci hwang dang le le hwang// 'gi hwang ci hwang ra sA yan// ga pur mu tig lan tshwa rnams// 'di dag rtsa brgyad la sogs rdzas// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya// dkyil 'khor gsang ba yang dag gnas// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi// thams cad gnyis med rol pa nyid// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun spyod pa'o// ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus// thams cad bdud rtsi ra sA yan// de dag rigs rnams bkod pa'i rdzas// rang gi dkyil 'khor sngags kyis sbyar// thams cad rab tu sbyor byas pas// thams cad gnas kun ngo bor 'grub// bdud rtsi chen po lnga rnams la// rtsa ba yan lag kun ldan pas// bye brag rang gi las grub pa'i// sbyor ba sna tshogs bstan pa yin// ji ltar rdzas ni gcig gnyis la// grogs sogs stobs kyi sna tshogs pa// bre brag stobs kun ston par byed// rdo rje'i rigs kun 'grub byed pa'i// byang chub sems kyi yan lag tshogs// klad pa gzhung pa chu ba dang// be la gzhung gnas rgyu ba'i lam// gshegs shul pho brang tshul dag gis// sbas pa nang gi gnas su bstan// mig dang sen mo so skra spu// mthar phyin phyi yi gnas dag go// mi khyi rta dang ba dag gi/ 'o ma nang gi gnas yin te// gnyis su s+ya snum khur mAng sa dang// shang shang gre'u 'dra phyi'i gnas// bya khri seng khri rgya spos dang// nA ga ge sar a ka ru// snying zho tha kar rdo rje dbang po lag/ sna 'dren sbyar ba kun gyi sman// bong nga dkar po shu dag dkar// ya bag k+Sha ra ka ko la// 'jam 'gras til dkar se 'bru dang// zi ra shel tsha cong zi gsum// ne'u shing tha kar ram nye ba// go ro tsa na rus pa'i tshogs// mtshal bu tsit+ta mdog dkar zhing// mngar ba'i ro mchog tshad mnyam pa// de dag byang chub sems kyi sde// rang gi dkyil 'khor pho brang ngo// bdud rtsi dri chen las 'phros pa// slob dpon yum dang drang srong mchog/ rta glang bya dang khyi rnams kyi// nang dang phyi yi rdzas tshogs pa// cha mnyam tshad kyis rnam par gzhal// rdo dreg lcag ro shing rtsi dang// chu dreg rdo thal shing thal dang// lci dkar sdong ro'i snying po dag/ bdud rtsi snying po phud du sbyar// seng ge

dzA ti shing tsha dang// ru rta skyob phri nyung dkar dang// chu srin sder mo rwa tshwar bcas// sman gyi mchog tu bshad pa yin// a bar rnam gnyis gser me tog/ gu gul gla sgang yung ba dang// chu shel brag zhun ka sho dang// dkar ser rigs kun kha bar sbyar// sha yi rigs rnams rnam bkod pa// lce snying mkhal ma bshul sha dang// yan lag bzhi yi phyi dang nang// khyu mchog ma he rta rgod dang// rkyang glang gzings tshogs pa'i// ha sa de ba ga pur dang// sug smel phob sna rta dang rkyang// ni lot+pa la tsi tra ka/ zi ra nag po til nag dang// tig ta me tog lug mig sogs// ro bskal kha dog sngon po'i rdzas// rtsa ba yan lag bcud kyi len// khrag gi rigs kun mngon bsdus pa// de dag thugs rje chen po'i rdzas// glo snying mchin pa mtsher pa dang// mkhal rtsa nang gi gnas bzhi'i khrag/ bla ma'i gzungs ma las 'dzag cing// phyi yi rtsa phran nas phyung dang// na chung za thog thog ma'i rdzas// 'dab chags sder chags rmig zlum dang// rtse gnyis 'chi ka chu la gnas// kan ta kar dang tsan dan smug/ sbrang rtsi g+han d+ha pa tra dang// rnam par bsgyur te rdzas kyi mchog/ skyu ru ra mchog shri shing sna// kha ro dang kha li shi dang// dmar zhing ro mchog skyur ba kun// ra sA ya na'i rdzas mchog go/ gzhan yang 'byung tshogs gnas las grub// khrag gi gtso bo nyi shu ste// rigs mthun sbyor ba'i gnas bcas pas// chags pa chen po'i las kun 'grub// kun tu dag byed dri yi chu// dam tshig chen po'i rdzas rnams las// mchog chen yongs su dag pa'i rdzas// mkha' rtsa lgang pa'i be d+ha la// rdo rje chu ba'i gnas byung bas// nang gi las kun sbas par ston// slob dpon phyag rgya byis pa gtsang// dmar ser pa las byung ba'i chu// phyi rol rdzas kyi dag byed cing// gtso bo brgyad du gnas pas 'grub// gangs chu ser ba lu ma dang// khron pa chu klung rgya mtsho'i gnas// cong zhi brag las byung ba dag/ de dag rigs rnams 'byed pa'i rdzas// thams cad dri bcas shing kun dang// lce phog li shi ba le ka// khyi lce nim ba kun du ra// sngon bu mi sdom li ka ngur// chu rtsi lcum la sogs pa'i rdzas// kha dog ljang zhing ro skyur kun// phyi nang rdzas kyi kun tu dbye// de ltar rigs mchog gtso bo yi// byin rlabs dam tshig bkod pa'i rdzas// rtsa ba brgyad la yan lag stong// so so'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin gnas// phyi nang 'byung tshogs ma lus kyi// tha dad rdzas sogs mthun bcas pa// ra sA ya na'i sman rnams kun// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas sbyin spyod// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// ma lus kun tu rnam par dag/ ra sA ya na la sogs rdzas// ji snyed 'byor pa ma lus kun// dkyil 'khor tha ma bskor te bzhag/ rtsa ba

brgyad dang yan lag sogs// rdzas rnams sems dpa' bcu drug ste// snod dbyings sems ma bcu drug go// mig dang rdo rje chu+u ba dang// sna la bi dang shar dang lho// lce dang pad+ma nub kyi phyogs// rna ba tsit+ta byang du ste// lug mig tha kar rdo rje dang// sri shing dbang po'i lag pa dang// kha 'bar rgun 'bru ka sho ka/ snying zho sha rnams ched mnyam pa// phyogs bzhi rang gi gnas bzhi bskor// tshad med rdzas kyis brgyan par bya// rtsa ba sdong bu shar gyi phyogs// yal ga lo ma lho ru ste// me tog shun pa nub kyi gnas// byang du 'bras bu snying po'o// de ltar sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// rang bzhin grub pa'i mthu bcas pa// ra sA ya na tshogs rgyas shing// 'jig rten 'dir gnas gzhan yang 'grub// de dag rten 'brel mthu bcas pas// lam kun mngon par ston byed cing// so so'i grogs skyabs rnams kyis ni// rgyal dang blon tshogs bzhin du gnas// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// lha yi drang srong rig 'dzin bcas// lus kyi ra sA ya na'i rdzas// nges par spyad pas 'grub gyur cing// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dam tshigs la gnas pas// byang chub sems ldan snying po'i mchog/ thabs mkhas 'gro ba'i don bskyed pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa zhes bya ba las// ra sA ya na sgo mtha' yas par bstan pa ste/ rim par phye pa gnyis pa'o//// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// gtsor bcas lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rang gi mchod pa'i tshogs bcas pas// yang dang yang du dgyes par mdzad// mi gnyis ye shes chen po'i gnas// thabs mkhas byang chub sems dpa'i don// rang bzhin bdud rtsi gnas rgyas mdzad// don kun gsal ba rnam kun nyid// kye ma ho stobs mchog rnam spyod pas// rang rig dkyil 'khor ma 'dres tshogs// thams cad chos kyi gnas su sbyor// 'di dag nye bar spyod byed pas// las kyi bya ba ji ltar bsgrub// bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin gang// dkyil 'khor sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// rnal 'byor tshogs bcas grol bya'i phyir// de dag nye bar ston pa'i rigs// de nas bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dbyings rgya chen kun// gnyis med gnyis su med sbyor ba'i// lam mchog 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i// thub pa gtso bos bstod bstan bzhin// dus 'dir bkod pas rnam gsal mdzad// thams cad byang chub sems nyid mchog/ phyogs dus bdud rtsi chen po'i gzhi// sna tshogs gnyis med ye shes nyid// thabs ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu// las rgyud smin cing grol bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dam tshig dang// bsnyen bsgrub spyod dang phrin

las dag/ spyi dang khyad par nas brtsams te// rang rtogs 'jug pa'i don bzhin bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las mngon gsal byed// phyag rgya sngags gsal la sogs pas// thabs mkhas 'bras bu la spyod pa'o// thog ma mtha' ma med pa'i tshul// rang bzhin chos sku'i snying po nyid// zab cing rgya che gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor gnas kun rdzogs par snang// dus gsum mtha' gnas kun gsal zhing// ma 'dres chos tshogs brtson byed pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rigs bzhin du// zhing khams mtha' dag rnam par sbyong// phyag rgya che mchog kun gsal bas// chos kyi phyag rgya rdzogs sbyor cing// dam tshig kun gyi gnas 'jug pas// las kyi phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan thams cad ston mdzad dbyings// rin chen rigs kun rdzogs pa'i tshogs// rin chen dkyil 'khor che gnas bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab rin chen sbyor// bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya las// rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhan rgyud bzhin// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs te// rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams// bsrung nyid nor bu 'bar ba la// rang gi sngags bcas rten sbyor bas// thams cad dkyil 'khor gnas rnams rgyal// oM rat+na si mo rta/ ta ra ta ra/ ma hA chu+u na si di hUM swA hA// rdo rje bcings pa'i rgya chen po// rigs kyi sbyor ba klu gsal ba// thabs dang shes rab 'od tshogs rnams// rang gi gnas su brtan par bsdus// de dag byin rlabs rol pa'i mthus// thams cad rin chen dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje bsdams pa bstan byas pas// gung mo gnyis ni smyug gu'i tshul// rang mdzub mtheb chen rtse sbyar bas// yon tan rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// gung mo mtheb chen mthe'u chung dag/ rtse sprad bsgreng ste gzhan rnams sbed// nor bu rin chen phyag rgya 'dis// dkyil 'khor kun nas las la gzhung// yon tan dkyil 'khor rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan ma'o// bde gshegs gtso bo rigs kyi bdag/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sgrib med gzhi// mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor che// gtso bo 'khor bcas gnas spyod mdzad// 'di dag 'khor lo che gnas pa// 'khor lo'i skyil krung sbyor ba'i tshul/ 'khor lo lta bus kun spyod cing// rigs kyi 'khor lo rgyas pa'i tshogs// phyag rgya mtshan ma'i sku sbyor bas// thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i dbyings// gsung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// 'khor lo yi ge'i mtshan mas brgyan// oM sarba ta thA ga to ya/ swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha pa ri ba re hUM swA hA// dam tshig chen pos stobs byed pa'i// lag gnyis rgyab bsnol sor mo

rnams// 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin rtse bsnol sbyor// phyogs rnams kun tu skor byed de// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhag/ rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// rtse mo gdengs pa 'khor lo'i rgya// g.yon pas bsnyems bcas dbyings sbyor cing// rang gi las kun ston byed pa'o// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po nyid// mi gnyis ye shes gsung gi bdag/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che gnas bzhugs// phyag rgya mtshan ma rgyan dang bcas// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// pad+ma'i tshul du sbyor mdzad cing// pad+ma'i rigs kun dag pa'i chos// las kyi chos kun ston pa'o// chos rnams kun gyi tshogs bcas pas/ chos kyi don kun gsal bar byed// pad+ma'i sngags su sbyar ba'i mthus// gsung dbyangs yan lag kun rdzogs 'gyur// oM d+ha rmA+o shud+d+ha sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+he dz+nyA na sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ rdo rje bcings pa bskyed bya ste// sor mo mtha' gnyis gshibs te bsgreng// pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed tshul// dam tshig sngags kyi 'phro 'du bcas// rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// gung mo mtheb chung rtse sbyar bsgreng// pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri med spyan// chos rnams kun gyi gnas kun gzigs// rang gi las bzhin bskul byas te// las kyi dkyil 'khor dag par mdzad// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan ma'o// bde gshegs dam tshig thugs kyi mchog/ sku rnams ye shes rigs kyi bdag/ de bas gnas kun sbyor mdzad pa'i// mi bskyod rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid// kha dog rgyan bcas kun rdzogs pa'o// gtso dang sprul par bcas pa dag/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing// rdo rje skyil krung mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje'i rigs rnams gsal byas te// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par 'gyur// sgra yi rgyun bcas kun spyod pa'i// lce la rdo rje rtse lnga nyid// sa bon sngags bcas 'phro 'du yis// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam par sbyor// oM badzra mo ha ri ni shud+d+ha sa mA+o yA swA hA// rdo rje bcings pa las byung ba'i// gung mo bsgreng ste rtse sbyar cing// sor mo'i mtha' bzhi bkug byas pa// 'od zer sngags kyi sngags kun sbyar// rang gi phyag rgya kun gyi gnas// dam tshig chen po'i ye shes sbyor// rdo rje khu tshur bstan byas pa'i// sor mo'i rtse rnams phyogs bzhir gdongs// sna tshogs las rnams rdzogs bskul zhing// gsang sngags mthun pa'i don kun sbyor// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan ma'o// thams cad kyis ston mdzad pa'i// phyag rgya ji bzhin rnam gsal bas// sku yi dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// rigs kyi tshogs rnams 'byung ba'i gtso// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje zhabs mnyam sbyor// thabs dang

shes rab de dag bskul// las kyi dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa'i// rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags phreng ba'i tshul// sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pas// gsang sngags yi ge kun rdzogs shing// gnas nyid rang gi mtshan ma'i rgya// oM ma hA su kha kar ma gan d+ha ro ni sha sarba hUM phaT/ dam tshig phyag rgya bstan pa yi// 'phro 'du las kun rnal 'byor pa// de dag rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bong bsnol te rtse sprad cing// de bzhin gung mo mthe'u chung dag/ rab tu sbyor bas sna tshogs nyid// dam tshig dkyil 'khor kun gnas su// rang rigs sngags kyis brtan par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur bcas pa las// mthe bong mtheb chung gung mo dag/ legs bsgreng g.yon pas yum sbyor bas// las kyi dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs pa'i// rigs bcas kun bskul bar byed// phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan ma'o// sngags 'di rnams yig nor rgyun 'byams mang ba dpyad dgos/ oM rat+na swA tA ba da kha ra nir ti swA hA// oM gu Na badzra d+ha ra hI sa mo ya hUM/ oM badzra d+ha ra ya mi ma hA su gi swA hA/ oM gu Na su ta ta thA' ga to ba ra hri hUM/ oM gu Na ma rA ga si ga san ti swA hA/ oM gu Na pad+mo d+ha ra ba ni hUM/ oM ma hA sur+ya bi da ra swA hA/ oM gu Na kar ma ba burta hUM/ oM d+har ma da ra sa mu ka hUM swA hA/ oM gu Na swA sa ka ra badzra hUM/ ma hA tsan da ni ka ra swA hA/ oM gu Na bi kran badzra hUM/ ma hA a tu la swA hA/ oM gu Na si brta badzra hUM/ ma hA bi d+ha dza ra ka swA hA/ oM gu Na ra ba sa badzra hUM// ma hA te dza swA hA/ oM gu Na sa mo haM tsakra hUMM/ ma hA bya gri sa la swA hA/ oM gu Na ra tsa tsa tra hUM/ ma hA te hi swA hA/ oM gu Na a mr-i ta tsakra hUM/ ma hA du sha swA hA/ oM gu Na sa ka ra ya tsa tra hUM/ ma hA bi shwa ri swA hA/ oM gu Na rA ga su da pad+mo hUM/ ma hA bi d+ha swA hA/ oM gu Na ka ro rta pad+ma rta hUM/ oM gu Na kha ka pad mo hUM/ ma hA na gud tha swA hA// oM gu Na saM bud ta pad+mo hUM// ma hA bu ti swA hA/ oM gu Na tsan d+hi kar ma hUM/ ma hA gan d+ha ra swA hA/ oM gu Na mu tra ga kar ma hUM/ ma hA spyid ta swA hA/ oM gu Na mi lo ga ka ra hUM/ ma hA ud sid th+ya swA hA/ oM gu Na tri bi shwa kar ma hUM/ ma hA ku mu ri swA hA/ oM gu Na lA s+ye hUM/ oM gu Na sa mA le hU~M// oM gu Na gIrti hri/ oM gu Na nI ra ti A/ oM gu na d+hU pe hUM/ gu+u na puSh+pe tAM/ gu Na a lo ko hrIH/ oM gu Na gan d+he a/ oM gu Na ki ta badzra da ra ba ni hUM/ ma hA gu Na aM ku sha dzaHswA hA/ oM rat+na si so ta rat+na ra ti hUM/ ma hA gu Na pA sha hUM swA hA/ oM rat+na pad ma pa di t+ya khad ka hUM/ ma hA gu Na s+pho Ta paM swA hA/ oM rat+na a mr-i ta su ka ya kar ma hUM/ ma hA gu Na gan d+he ho swA hA/ yon tan rin po che'i sngags rdzogs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta shri bai ro tsa na hUM/ ma hA ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya hUM/ badzra te sha sa ma ta s+t+wam/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na

swA b+hA wa hUM/ rat+na rA ga ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mi d+he wa hUM/ pad+ma rA ga ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hUM/ karma rU ga ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra sa twa hUM/ oM rA dza hUM/ oM badzra rA ga hUM/ oM badzra sA d+hU hUM/ oM badzra rat+na trAM/ oM badzra te dz+wa trAM/ oM badzra ki tu trAM/ oM badzra ha sa trAM/ oM badzra d+harma hrIH/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na hrIH/ oM badzra tsakra hrIH/ oM badzra bAg hrIH/ oM badzra yak+Sha ho/ oM badzra karma haM/ oM badzra rak+Sha haM/ oM badzra muSh+ti haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra oM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na oM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma oM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma oM/ oM tsakra lA s+ye hUM/ oM tsakra mA le traM/ oM tsakra gir ti hri/ oM tsakra nIr ti a/ oM tsakra d+hU pe d+hU/ oM tsakra puSh+pe pu/ oM tsakra A lo ke hrIH/ oM tsakra gan+d+he gan/ oM ya mAn ta ka hUM/ badzra ma hA shrI a mu ka swA hA/ oM ma hA ba la hUM/ oM ma hA rat+na sa ma ya swA hA/ oM ha ya grI wa hUM/ ma hA pad+ma bi gar swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUMM/ ma hA karma raM pa ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i gsang sngags rdzogs so// oM pad+ma ma hA su kha ka ra ka ra hUM dum swA hA// ma hA sid+d+hi a nan ta sa mur swA hA/ oM pad ma tsakru badzra da ra ni hUM/ ma hA sid+d+hi gu ru rA ga swA hA/ oM pad+ma sang ga ra tsa tra/ ma hA sa mu ka tsan de shwa ri swA hA/ oM pad+ma rat+na b+han d+har+ya ni shu la hUM/ ma hA sid+d+hi tsakru ne swA hA/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra karma sid+d+hi hUM/ ma hA ga ga na a ma la swA hA/ oM pad ma hA ra ga hUM/ oM ni dan d+ha sur+ya hUM/ 'di nang sngags mtshan gnyis ma tshang/ oM pad mo kasma ra hUM/ pad mo ba yang gu hUM/ oM pad ma nA laM pa ni traM/ oM pad+ma gnya' na ba mod te tr-i/ oM pad+ma sa ra ya ni traM/ oM pad+ma d+ha ma so khya hr-i/ oM pad+ma tsan+Da ra kha hri/ oM pad+ma bi ska la sa ba hri/ oM pad+ma karma su ya ha/ oM pad+ma ta thA ga to rta re ha/ oM pad+ma bi sbu ta mang ga la ha/ oM pad ma ha nan gar parta/ oM d+harma ta lA s+ye hUM/ oM d+harma mA le traM/ oM d+harma gIr ti hri/ oM d+harma nir ti a// oM d+harma d+hU pe d+hU/ oM d+harma puSh+pe pu/ oM d+harma A lo ke hrI/ oM d+harma gan+d+he gan/ oM ya mAn ta ka hUM/ ma hA badzra aM ku sha swA hA/ oM ma hA ba la hUM/ ma hA rat+na pA sha hUM/ oM ha ya grI ba hUM/ ma hA pad+ma s+pho Ta baM swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta kun+d+hi li hUM/ ma hA d+harma g+haN+De ho swA hA/ pad+ma'i rigs gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i sngags rdzogs so// oM hUM badzra d+h+r-ig/ mUM d+hA twI shwa ri hUM/ oM dzi na dzig/ lAM gwe Sha ra ti/ oM swA rat+na d+h+r-ig/ mAM mo ha ra ti tAM swA hA/ oM AM A ro l-ika pyaM rA ga ra ti AM swA hA/ oM hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ tAM badzra ra ti hA swA hA/ oM k+ShiM hi rA dzA ya hUM/ trAM A gar+b+hA ya hUM/ hrIHpad+ma pA da ma hUM/ dziM ku ru pA Na ya hUM/ mai d+ha rA ya hUM/ th+l+hiM nis+sa raM b+hA ya hUM/ hUM sa ra dzA ya hUM/ mu shrI AM rA gA ya hUM/ hUM badzra lA s+ye hUM/ hUM badzra mA le trAM/ hUM badzra gIr ti hrIH/ hUM badzra nir ti a/ hUM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ hUM badza puSh+pe trAM/ hUM badzra A lo ke hrIH/

hUM badzra gan+d+he hoH/ oM badzra ya mAn ta kr-ita hUM/ ma hA badzra aM ku sha dza/ oM rat+na big+h+nAM ta kr-ita hUM/ ma hA rat+na pA sha hU~M/ hUM pad+ma pad+ma ta kr-i ta hUM/ ma hA pad+ma s+pho Ta baM/ hUM karma pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hUM/ ma hA karma g+han+De ho/ rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i sngags rdzogs so// oM shri bi shwa tsan d+ha ma gu ta ra hUM swA hA/ ma hA su kha ba d+ha shu sa na swA hA/ oM bi shwa badzra d+ha rod ma hA ru pa ni hUM/ badzra sur+ya ka ma la ma ku ta ya swA hA/ oM bi shwa rat+na a ka ta si d+ya ni ra hUM/ ma hA rat+na mu shwa ri swA hA/ oM bi shwa pad+ma d+ha ra ma swa b+ha wa hUM/ ma hA pad+ma d+hA ri Ni swA hA/ hUM bi shwa 'bu ta ma bu d+ha ra hUM/ ma hA tsan d+he h+ya shwa ri swA hA/ oM badzra san te saM ba ra hUM/ oM badza rA tsa ma ni shwa ra hUM/ oM badzra du ka stir ya ka ni hUM/ oM badzra a mu ka ga li hUM/ oM badzra karma u mi shwa hUM/ 'di nang sngags tshan bcu skor chad/ oM bi shwa lA s+ye hUM/ oM bi shwa mA le trAM/ oM bi shwa gIr ti hrIH/ oM bi shwa nir ti a/ bi shwa d+hU pe d+hu/ bi shwa puSh+pe pu/ bi shwa A lo ke hrIH/ bi shwa gan+d+he gan/ oM bi shwa a mu ka ya mAn ta ka hUM/ aM ku sha hUM dzaH/ oM bi shwa ma hA ba la hUM/ pA sha hUM trAM/ oM bi shwa ha ya grI ba hUM/ s+pho Ta baM hrIH/ oM bi shwa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ g+haN+De ho hA/ las kyi rigs kyi phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i gsang sngags rdzogs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rang gi phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// nyi zla pad+ma la gnas pa'i// 'phro 'du gnas gsum brtan par 'gyur// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ chos dbyings ye shes gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes mdzad cing// yab yum dga' bde gnas gsal grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun khyab mdzad// thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i tshogs// phyi nang gsang ba rgya chen po'i// mchod pa kun gyi mnyes par spro// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ thams cad gnyis med byang chub sems// rang bzhin spros bral ye shes che// dus gsum rnam par gsal byed pa'i// dmigs pa'i mtshan rtog yul las 'das// oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rang bzhin byang sems thugs rje'i dngos// khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad pa'i// gnyis med bde ba chen po'i mchog/ nam mkha' sprin las glog bzhin byung// oM d+harma d+hA tu badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'di dag rnam kun ye shes nyid// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// thugs rje dkyil 'khor sgrib med pa'i// mthu las brtan g.yo rnam par 'phrul// thams cad don kun 'byung byed

pa'i// rkyen gyi gsang sngags phyag rgya nyid// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pas// don kun gsal ba 'di nyid do// b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he tsakra ma d+ha la karma rag sha haM/ oM tsik+Shu ma d+ha la hUM/ rdo rje bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rigs kyi sangs rgyas kun sbyor zhing// thams cad gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin ma bcos mtha' las 'das// snying ga'i rten yig rnam spros pas// phyogs bcu'i rdo rje mtshon cha'i tshogs// me 'od 'phros pa rnam par 'khrigs// rdo rje'i ra ba sa gzhi dang// gur dag gnas nas gtams byas pas// khro bo'i tshogs bcas 'khrugs pa'o// rang sems zla ba rgyas pa las// 'od zer yi ge gnas byas pas// zhing khams chen po dag byas te// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// thugs rje nyi ma la gnas pa'i// 'od zer rnam gsum kun gsal zhing// yi ge'i gang ba'i tshogs bcas rnams// byang chub sems nyid ye shes sku// rten dang brten bcas 'khor lo bzhi// don kun ye shes chen po'i tshogs// ngo bo gnyis med brtan byas pas// rigs kyi zhing khams kun tu sbyor// de dag gnyis med brtan pa'i mthus// mtshan ma'i yi ge sngags dang bcas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byed cing// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing// byin rlabs brtan pas gnas kun sbyor// rigs mthun rigs dang 'khril pa'i sku// ye shes rnam par gsal ba'i yum// chos rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ byang chub sems nyid gang byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor gnas longs spyod// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rgyu dang 'bras bu rigs mthun pa'i// sprul bcas kun tu rnam spyod pa// de dag rang byung dkyil 'khor gtso// thams cad skyong byed rgyu 'bras nyid// rnal 'byor kun tu sbyor ba'i mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs// de dag de las de snang bas// ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin no// dam tshig dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// dam tshig gsum gyi gnas rdzogs 'gyur// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing// gnyis med brtan pa'i phyag rgya che// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru NI ka dr-i sh+ya haM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra sa ma ya hoH/ gnyis med sbyor ba chen po'i mchog/ phyag rgya sngags kyi sku sbyor cing// dkyil 'khor lha rnams brtan byas pas// bdud rtsi'i gnas chen don sbyor grub// thog mar gnyis med sbyar ba'i tshogs// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pas// grol ba'i chos kun la spyod de// dkyil 'khor gsang bas yang dag 'jug/ legs par spyod pa'i cho ga yis// gnas kun dag par sbyangs byas pas// lha dang rdzas mchog lhag gnas shing// yang

dag rdzogs pa'i cho gas spyad// mi spang ba dang dang du blang// spyad pa'i dam tshig bco lnga bsrung// shes bya bsgrub lnga bsrung ba gsum// nyi shu rtsa brgyad gtso bo mchog/ stong rtsa brgyad du rnam spros pas// thams cad don kun rdzogs par rdzogs// rang bzhin ma bcos gnyis med chos// de dag dam tshig chen po'i gzhi// bzhi po rdzogs nas kun tu bzang// thabs kyi theg pa bla med pa'o// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// mnan bzlog drug gi gcig tu sbyar// khru tshad bzhi dang ldan pa la// bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring// stod smad phyed la sked pa phra// tshigs pa zlum zhing sor mo ring// yon tan 'od can bcu gnyis lon// ye shes rigs can yin pas na// thams cad 'grub byed gzungs kyi mchog/ bcu gsum rdo rje'i rigs su 'grub// dga' zhing mdog dkar sngags dang ldan// bcu drug sngags pas nges 'grub gnas// rin chen rigs mchog yin par bshad// nyi shu rtsa gcig pad+ma'i rigs// spyan ras gzigs dbang rta mchog gnas// nyi shu rtsa lnga la sogs dag/ kun tu las rnams spyod mkhas pas// thogs med byang chub sems phyogs 'dren// las kyi rigs tshogs thams cad 'grub// sum cu rtsa gnyis tshun chad kyi// mtshan ldan dge ba'i sems 'phel zhing// yid 'ong grogs kyi dam pa ste// de bzhin rigs kun 'grub par byed// bde chen 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// rigs rnams lha mo gang bsnyen dag/ phyi nang khrus byas dri yis byug/ gos dang rgyan gyis rab tu mdzes// dzA ti pha la gu ru rtse// ka ko la dang ga pur dang// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ gi waM glang po'i spos rnams kyis// lus dang kha sogs bsgo byas te// rin chen me tog phreng bas brgyan// ras 'jam dar stan la sogs pas// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par bklubs// gser gyi rna cha gdub skor dang// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan rnams kyis// rigs kyi lha mo'i tshul bzhin brgyan// ji bzhin bde ba'i stan dag las// g.yon phyogs dag tu gzhag par bya// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po'i// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// 'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du ston// bdud rtsi lnga sogs rdzas kyis byug/ sha chen gu gul spos kyis bdug/ dkyil 'khor de la mngon phyogs te// thabs dang shes rab gsal bar bsgom// spyi bor oM dkar 'od ldan pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhag/ lce la AHdmar pad+ma'i dkyil// thugs ka'i nyi mar hUM mthing ga/ lte bar swA sngon rin chen la// rkang mthil hA ljang 'od 'bar gnas// paM las pad+ma'i mkha' dkyil du// gru gsum me 'od 'bar 'dra bsam// nyi ma la gnas rdo rje

nyid// hUM oM swA yis rnam mdzes pa'o// nyon mongs lnga rnams sbyong ba dang// sdug bsngal lnga rnams tshar bcad phyir// lag g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yon pa ro langs chen mo ste// de yi kha la khro gnyer can// ral pa gcig ma pad+ma la'o// g.yas su sngags dang khro mo bzhi// sngags dang phyag rgya brtan par sbyor// oM AM hUM swA hA/ yang dag don gyi bdud rtsi 'dis// thams cad gnas kun sbyor mdzad cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par sbyor// don kun gsang ba ston byed pa'i// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor tshogs// rang bzhin lha mo rgyan bcas pa// mdzad pa bcu gnyis 'phro 'du dang// phrin las rnam bzhi kun gsal byed// mar me'i phreng ba ji bzhin du// chos rnams thams cad bdud rtsi'i dbyings// nges par bstan pa'i don chen 'di// rigs kyi rgyal bas kun nas sbyor// phyag rgya chen po bzhi yi bdag/ gnyis med mnyam par sbyor byas te// lha yi bdud dang phung po'i bdud// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom// thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs rgyud// don rtags gnyis med ye shes nyid// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gnas 'jug pas// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// mkha' las sems 'phreng spro zhing bsdu// byang chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// bdud rtsi chen po'i mkha' dbyings su// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam par sbyor// stong gsum chos rnams sna tshogs kyi// mtshan mar bstan pa thams cad kun// bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// byang chub sems su rnam dag pas// skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings// gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po'i mchog/ yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal// 'di ni snying po byang chub sems// lus kun yongs su 'khyud pa yis// rdo rje pad+mo gdan byas te// byang chub 'khor ba 'phel ba'i rgyun// rang snang rnam dag byang chub sems// phul bas don kun rdzogs pa nyid// yon tan phrin las rmad du byung// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta rA ga pU dza ho// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur zhing// dngos grub chen po'i rdzas kun sbyor// dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas dag tu// mtshan ldan thod par rdzas bsags te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas pas// ra sA ya na'i gnas rgyas 'gyur// thabs kyi theg pa ma lus kun// bdud rtsi chen po'i gnas 'jug pas// yang dag ye shes sbyor ba'i stobs// don kun gsal bar ston pa po// de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// don 'di bstan pa'i gnas dgongs te// mi gnyis ye shes dkyil 'khor gnas// gsang ba'i rgyud chen ston par mdzad// de tshe rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// thabs mkhas byang chub

sems bcas pas// sku gsung thugs kyi bstan pa dag/ sna tshogs 'byor zhing bzung bar byed// dga' mgu yi rang gus pa yis// bdud rtsi'i gnas rnams mngon par bstod// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa zhes bya ba las/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du yang dag par sbyar ba'i rim par phye ba gsum pa'o//// de nas zhing khams thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i bstan pas 'dul ba'i phyir// blo gros mchog rnams grol mdzad cing// thams cad rigs bcas yang dag sbyor// de tshe nyon mongs dregs pa'i stobs// las kyi mthu rnams kun rgyas pa'i// 'gro ba'i gnas chen bdag po dag/ rang gi sde bcas kun nas rmongs// nyon mongs las rnams rgyu dang rkyen// 'bras bu'i bya ba tha dad kyis// bdag dang gzhan rnams kun spyod cing// dug gsum nyon mongs bde ba'i mthus// me dpung ri bo mun pa'i tshogs// 'thor byed chu rlung rba rlabs kyis// khams gsum kun gyi gnas bcom ste// rtsa ba yan lag nyon mongs rgyun// grogs kun spyad pas rab tu rgyas// rang gi sder bcas dpung rnams kyis// rig sngags sbyor bas phyogs bcur spros// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yang dag thugs rje chen po'i thugs// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun nas spros mdzad cing// mi gnyis kun tu bzang po la// phyogs rnams kun nas gsol ba 'debs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// ye shes lha tshogs thugs rje'i bdag/ rigs kun dkyil 'khor ston mdzad pa// khyod kyi thugs rjes bzod lags sam// khams gsum dregs byed gnas tshogs 'di// thabs kyis sgrol bas mi 'dul zhing// nyon mongs kun spyod gnas rgyas pas// dus 'dir yang dag thugs rje'i mthus// shugs kyis bsgral ba'i dus la bab// thabs mkhas mi gnyis thugs rje'i gnas// dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i don kun gyis// de dag mtha' yas las rgyud dag/ nges pa'i gnas gzhan rgyud bral zhing// mngon spyod phrin las spyod par 'tshal// de nas sangs rgyas kun tu bzang// chos dbyings ye shes las bzhengs te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun ston cing// yang dag thugs rje chen po'i mthus// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par mdzad// zhal gsum phyag rnams bco brgyad pa'i// dpa' bo mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dur khrod kun gyi rgyan gyis brjid// khros pa'i cha lugs kun ston pa'o// dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu las/ kha dog 'gyur ba'i zhal rnams brjid// rdo rje ral gri pad+ma phreng// gri gug 'khor lo dgra s+t+wa dag/ bdud rtsi g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams// thod pa zhing dbyug mi mgo

dang// rgyu zhags g.yang gzhi mche ba sbrul// sdigs mdzub gzhu dang dbyug pa g.yon// rang 'od yum la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ rigs kyi bdag pos dbang bskur zhing// gnas kun phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rgyan// phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don spros te// ye shes byin rlabs chen po'i gnas// gzhal yas khang chen sgo bzhi pa'i// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la// rin chen dregs byed gdan tshogs gnas// gnyis med phyag rgya chen po yis// phyogs mtshams thams cad sprul byas te// rigs kyi khro bo rnam sprul pas// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams 'gug par byed// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI a a// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM// gr-i h+Na gr-i h+na hUM// gr-i h+Na pa ya gr-i h+Na pa ya hUM A na ya ho// b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ khrag 'thung thugs kyi gsang ba nyid// gsang sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs spros pas// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams 'joms byed pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dpal chen ye shes rnam sprul ltar// zhing khams kun tu las mdzad pa'o// oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM// oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gr-I ba hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha pad+ma kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hUM/ sarba duSh+tAn phaT// badzra kI li kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra A' dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bA ka tsid+ha badzra kI la ya hUM/ dkar dang ser dang dmar po dang// ljang gu sngo skya gser gyi mdog/ le brgan ljang sngon mthing ga dang// dmar skya'i mdog la zhal gsum pa// phyag drug mtshon cha'i tshogs bsnams shing// tho ba rdo rje pad+ma dang// ral gri dbyug pa zhags pa nyid// gtun shing sna tshogs rdo rje dang// rdo rje sdigs mdzub rtse gsum tshogs// rang gi yum bcas rnam par sbyor// thod sbrul nyi zla rin chen tshogs// dur khrod rgyan rnams kun gyis 'jigs// rigs kyi lha mo dang bcas pa'o// sprul pas phyogs bcu kun tu gang// 'od 'phros me 'od mtshon cha'i tshogs// bgegs kyi rgyal po kun bkug pa'i// chung ma g.yog dang bran bcas dang// rang gi gnas kun bsdus byas te// 'jigs pa'i mtshon chas thams cad 'joms// brgya byin gshin rje la sogs pa'i// 'jigs pa'i tshogs bcas ngu 'bod cing// nyes pa spyad pa'i tshogs dran zhing// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'khod// de dag sprul pa yang sprul dang// rigs kyi sde dpung tshogs bcas pas// khro rgyal rnams la skyabs gsol zhing// sngags dang phyag rgya 'bul bar byed// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur te// dam tshig bstan pa'i dbang gtad

cing// phyogs kyi bgegs rnams 'dul mdzad pa// dam bcas phrin las bzhin du spyod// de tshe phyogs bcu'i snang ba yi// rnam rgyal gshin rje'i gshed po dang// rta mgrin khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// dbyug sngon mi g.yo mgon po dang// 'dod pa'i rgyal po stobs po che// hUM mdzad pad+ma 'khyil ba la// rang gi dam tshig bstan byed cing// rang gi lus kyang gdan du 'bul// de dag thugs rje chen po yis// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed mdzad cing// rnam par sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rang gi rigs kyi sangs rgyas 'grub// 'jig rten kun la phan gdags phyir// las skyes gzugs kyi gnas mdzad cing// gsang sngags gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// bgegs dang 'byung po gzir bar mdzad// brgya byin tshogs bcas gshin rje dang// klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs kyi gdon// me yi bdag po srin po rgyal// rlung dang dbang ldan mtshams kyi bgegs// nyi ma zla ba gza' skar dang// sa bdag lha mo lha min dang// sde dpung blon po dmag dpung bcas// de dag rjes su 'jug byed de// rang gi rgyal po'i rang bzhin gnas// yang dag don gyi ston byed cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas rgyas pas// ma 'ongs don phyir sgrub par mos// de dag rtsom pa'i dkyil 'khor che// 'dren pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// sa bon mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya ma hA si di da ra hUM// rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i// gung mdzub srin lag rtse gsum bsgreng// mthe bong mthe'u chung bsnol te bsdams// khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor gnas kun brtan byed cing// sbyaur bcas dam tshig sngags kyis 'grub// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// lag gnyis rtse gsum g.yas dang g.yon// las rnams ma lus kun sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya gsang ba sngags dang bcas// de nas 'dren byed gtso bo'i mchog/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i tshogs 'dus te// tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang// rgan byed gnas bcu'i bdag po'i tshogs// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul sku ston cing// sde dpung dmag bcas kun tu rgyug/ de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bde chen gtso la gsol btab cing// de dag gnas tshogs zhi byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor sprul pa kun nas ston// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus// gtso bo rnam par sprul byas te// thams cad 'od bcas snang ba'i mthus// dkyil 'khor gdan la legs par gnas// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma 'khor lor bcas// gtso bo che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la// nyi shu rtsa gcig zhal ldan cing// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gis mdzes// 'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro bo'i

bzhin// zhabs brgyad rol pa'i rigs rnams sku// dpal chen yang dag gdan la bzhugs// rgyu yi he ru kas brgyan te// zhal gsum phyag drug dkar ba'i mdog/ sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal gnyis mdzes// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma thod pa bum pa'i rdzas// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// gtso bo'i zhal rnams sna tshogs mdog/ 'od bcas rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs// phyag rnams zhi dang khro bo yi// dkyil 'khor gdan bcas sprul tshogs 'dzin// khro mo dbyings kyi yum chen mo// sngo nag zhal dgu phyag bco brgyad// zhabs brgyad rigs kyi khro bo gnon// sgaig la sogs pa'i gar gyis mdzes// de dag kha dog sna tshogs pa// 'od 'phro phyag rgya'i mtshan ma dag/ dbyings dang ye shes mnyam par sbyor// rigs lnga khrag 'thung chen po rnams// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sngo nag dkar ser dmar dang ljang// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ni// rigs kyi yum bcas rnams la sbyor// khro bo chen po bcu gnas sbyor// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro phra men dag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs byed gzugs// 'jigs pa'i rgyan cha kun gyis mdzes// rang gi rigs tshogs sprul par bcas// sgo bzhi'i khro bo'i rgyal po dag dkyil 'khor kun nas longs spyod pa'o// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri s+t+waM hUM dza sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A ra li hUM phaT/ oM badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM dza/ oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM dza/ oM rat+na shrI he ru ka rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM dza/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM dza// oM karma shrI he ru ka karma kro d+hi shwa rI s+t+waM dza/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ ha la ha la ma hA dz+wa la phaT/ oM badzra go'u rI ha/ oM badzra tso'u rI ha/ badzra phra mo hA ha/ badzra be tA lI ha/ badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasma rI ha/ badzra sma sha nI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badzra sid+ha mu kha he/ badzra bya g+h+rI mu kha he/ badzra sr-iM ga la mu kha he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra kang+ka mu kha he/ badzra kA ka mu kha he/ badzra u lU ka mu kha he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza tang dza hUM phaT/ oM badzra a mu khe hUM phaT/ badzra lo ka baM hUM phaT/ badzra b +hasmi sa la ya ba tu ho hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha la ha la ha la phaT phaT phaT/ ye shes 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyogs bcu'i gnas nas kun spros te// khams gsum dregs byed tshogs rnams kun// rang gi gnas su brgyal bar mdzad// kun nas 'jigs pa'i nga ro dang// zhum tshig sgra rnams 'don byed cing// sder bcas dpung dang mgon med pa// nye bar dman pa'i gnas su 'khor// de tshe che mchog dkyil 'khor tshogs// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam spros pas// zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// dregs byed tshogs kun bcom byas te// rang gi rgyu 'bras dran rdzogs bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku

gsung thugs// gnyis med rdo rje chen po 'di// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gnas gsal ba// 'gro rnams nyon mongs gnas su sbyangs// nye bar sbyor ba'i rkyen rnams kyis// bdud rtsi chen po'i gnas rgyas so// 'di dag nye bar spyod pa'i mthus// rang gi don kun gsal bar byed// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems kun yi rang ste// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// ngo mtshar rmad byung nye bar zhus// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// rang gi sgrub pa chen po kun// de dag nye bar bsgrub pa yi// bsnyen bsgrub phyag rgya'i tshogs 'jug pa// phrin las kun tu bstan byed pa'o// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag rgya chen po gsal byas pas// ljags la sa nu he ru ka/ mtshan ma yi ge rab sbyor zhing// snying po phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// oM shrI ma hA kA ya su kha he ru ka si ta d+ha ra dz+nyA na gar b+ha hUM// rdo rje bcings pa bstan byas te// b+ha ga che dang ling+ga che// yang dag sbyor ba dga' mdzad pa// pad+ma la gnas rdo rje nyid// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par mdzad// rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab skur ston pa'o// de nas bdud dang dregs byed rnams// phyogs rnams kun nas sdud byed cing// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam 'phrul gyis// rang rang gnas su nges par bsgral// ye nas rgyu nyid dag pa la// nga dang bdag tu bzung ba'i blos/ 'khor ba'i gnas kun rnam par 'phrul// khams gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing// oM ma hA a tsa la sa ma ya d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang// chos kyi sku las bzhengs nas kyang// mi rtog thugs rje chen po yis// khams gsum las kun rnam pa bzhi// 'tshe ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog/ thugs rje che dang shes rab dang// thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba mtha' dag sbyong bar mdzad// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// gnyis med rol pa'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad cig char bsgral byas te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che gnas sbyor// oM swa b+hA bas ka ra d+he d+ha sa si s+t+waM/ ma hA ka ru Ni hUM dza dza/ dregs byed rnams kyi rnam shes dag/ nges par gzugs la babs nas ni// mkha' 'gro'i zhal ni nub tu bstan// phyag rgya bzhi yis 'grub par byed// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis gcod// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rkang lag bsnol ba'i tshogs// yul las 'das pa'i don gyi dbye// oM ka ta ka ri kan d+ha kan pra be sha phaT/ 'byung ba'i sgo rnams bcad byas nas// bde gshegs thugs rje khyab par mdzad// dregs byed ma rungs lha chen rnams// sems kyi sgo bcad rnam 'byed cing// rdo rje 'bar ba spu

gri yis// nyon mongs rgyun bcas gcod byed cing// sems kyi gnas kun gzung bar mdzad// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar gnyis su brkyang// ta ki rngam brjid 'bar ba yis// zhabs kyis dkyil 'khor kun mnan cing// bgegs dang 'byung po gzir ba'i tshul// rdo rje drag po rta skad bcas// oM ma hA sa ma ya ki sha tsi ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ khams gsum nas byung sems can gnas// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la gzud// spro ba rdo rje sna tshogs kyis// sku gnas ye shes mchog tu sbyor// thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// skal ldan blo la 'jug pa ltar// dregs byed lha chen tshogs sogs nas// rang bzhin bde chen gnas su sbyor// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje chen pos kun sgrol zhing// zhing khams gnas kun rnam dag sbyor// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las// bde bar gshegs pa 'gro ba'i chos// gnyis med dbyings su gcig pa'i rgya// sku yi ngo bo mnyam pa nyid// thams cad snying po byang chub sems// ma skyes pa na 'gag pa 'jig/ bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sku// thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad// ye nas de ltar gnas bzhin du// sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos// bdag dang gzhan du so sor 'dzin// rtag chad mtha' rnams ma spangs pas// 'khrul pas bstan pa'i phung po lnga// log rtog phyin ci log gis bcings// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyu bsags te// 'khor ba'i 'bras bcas kun tu spyod// mya ngan 'das sogs mthar phyin pas// phung po khams dang skye mched rgyun// dag dang ma dag gnyis kyi chos// bde 'gro'i lam la sgrib byed rnams// rtog pa'i mtshan ma kun sbyong pa'i// mi rtog ye shes snying po'i chos// oM ma tha ma tha sarba pre ta ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba tIr+ya ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// mtshan med ston pas rnam par dag/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// gsung gi mtha' yas sems can sgrol// thugs mchog tshad med bzhi dang ldan// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// tshe dpag med pas dbang bskur te// yang dag nyid las yang dag sgrol// yang dag sgrol nas bde chen thob// mi ldog rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rgyal ba'i zhing khams rnam par dag/ oM AMHhUM swA hA// las bzhi ye shes lcags kyu yis// 'gro gnas gsang bar hUM gis bsdus// byin rlabs ye shes lhun grub pa'o// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams kyi// bde

gshegs pho brang kun sprul zhing// rdzu 'phrul yan lag kun ldan pas// 'phags lam brgyad tshogs gnas kun sgrol// rigs kyi sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs spyod// 'jig rten lhar bcas gtso bo dang// nyan thos rang rgyal dgra bcom rnams// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// phyag 'tshal yang dag mchod cing bstod// stug po bkod pa'i sa 'das nas// rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal// stong gsum ma lus ston byas pas// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de// skyes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsgral ba 'ba' zhig snying rje'i mchog/ bdud dang dbang phyug snying rje dag/ thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas// ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te// 'dzam gling lho yi rgyal khams su// bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni// dur khrod chen po brgyad du grags// mgo ni lho phyogs gnas su bstan// lag gnyis g.yas dang g.yon du brkyang// mgo dang lus gnyis yan lag kun// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// rang byung sprul pa'i lha mo gnas// de dag byin rlabs khyad par mthus// mchod rten shing la sogs par snang// 'di ltar sa gzhi de dag kun// bkra shis thugs rje ya mtshan can// chos dang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// cho 'phrul rol par rab bstan pa'o// de yi lus snying ma ga d+hA/ ma mo chen mo ko'u ri gnas// mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i yul// khyad par chos kyi tshogs rgyas shing// mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu nyid// mgo ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i// dur khrod chen po rab snang byed// sing+ga'i yul gyi gling phran dag/ ma mo chen mo tso'u ri gnas// mthong thos rnam pa'i 'phrul bag can// mchod rten ri bo ta la yin// lag pa g.yas pa shar lho mtshams// dur khrod chen po bal po'i yul// ma mo chen mo puk+ka sI// lhag par zas kyi longs spyod che// mchod rten khri de ka ra ste// rab tu sprul pa snang byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa lho nub mtshams// dur khrod chen po sA la'i yul// ma mo chen po g+hasma rI// phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pas// byang gi mchod rten mngon 'phags pa// rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams// dur khrod chen po li yi yul// ma mo chen mo tsan+da lI// me dang chu yi rdzu 'phrul can// mchod rten ming ni myu gu'i tshogs// ma mo sngags rnams kun 'grub gnas// rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams// dur khrod chen po li yi yul// ma mo chen po smra sha nI// bde skyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs// mchod rten ming ni ka ni ka/ mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kun rgyu ba'i gnas// mtshan ma'i gnas te byang phyogs gnas// dur khrod chen po'i au Di'i gnas// ma mo chen mo be tA lI//

'byor pa'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan// dngos grub can yang de na mang// mchod rten chos kyi 'khor lo'o// de yi nang khrol thams cad kun// dur khrod chen po'i nub phyogs spangs// rgya mtsho gling gi gnas chen po// lang ka pu ri srin po'i yul// ma mo chen mo pra mo ha// rin chen nor dang dpag bsam shing// 'byor pa'i longs spyod kun dang ldan// mchod rten grub pa'i dngos grub can// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur ba'o// de ltar sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// rang gi rigs bcas dkyil 'khor nyid// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du// byin rlabs brtan pas kun spyod cing// sngags mchog bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// dam rdzas brgyad rnams bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub byed pa'i// dam tshig chen po mchog gi rdzas// pra dz+nyA ki sha tsit+ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ma nu da ra ma sha/ u ma da ra ma ma hA maM traM/ khA hi khA hi hUM phaT/ e h+ye ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho// ka ra pa ta ni hUM phaT// thugs rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur khrod bdag po kun 'dus te// mchod rten gtso dang rigs bcas rnams// rang gi snying po 'bul bar byed// drag po'i chung ma dbang phyug tshogs// nyi shu rtsa brgyad g.yog dang bcas// dkyil 'khor chen por dbang thob nas// dam bcas las bzhin rnam par bkod// de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang// rigs rnams thams cad zhi byed pas// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab bsdus pa'i// sku ni smug nag 'bar ba la// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// rab tu 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor las// rigs tshogs sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// bdud tshogs dregs byed chung mar bcas// thugs rjes rig 'dzin dbang bskur nas// dam tshig bstan pa la gnas mdzad// phyogs rnams kun nas smras pa'i tshig/ rang gi dam bcas bsdam par byed// rdo rje 'bar ba'i me dpung gis// bskal pa'i me rnams 'joms bar byad// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu+u ma rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing// phyag na 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha thogs// zhi ba phyag stong spyan stong tshogs// 'jig rten khams kun spa bkong byed// khro gnyer rab tu 'bar ba'i skus// 'jig rten dregs tshogs smos ci dgos// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung// rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rngams dang zhi bar ston// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can// 'jig rten thal bar brlag mdzad pa'i// e ma ho che mchog he ru ka/ khro rgyal khro la skyabs su mchi// thugs rjes nan tan mi gzung ngam// gal te bka' ltar ma bgyis na// mgo lus snying dag brgyar 'gas shing// rab tu 'bar bas

bsreg par mdzod// de nas de dag thams cad kyis// che mchog 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rjes su bsgrub pa'i don phyir zhus// yang dang yang du gsol btab ste// e ma ho ston pa khyod nyid kyis// yang dag mdzad pa rgya chen po// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi phyir// thugs rje dag par bstan par mdzod// 'di dag sngon dus ci bzhin du// ston pas bstan pa'i don gsal mdzad// dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba yi// khang pa gru bzhi sgo bzhis brgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rta babs tshogs// nyi zla me tog phreng bas brgyan// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo'i sprin// rdo rje rin chen ba dan las// snyan pa'i dril bu phyogs bcur sgrogs// ra ba rdo rje pad+mas brgyan// pho brang dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// dus gsum dkyil 'khor rgya chen tshogs// phyogs bcu kun nas 'khrigs pa yis// zhing sbrul thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// mtshon cha sna tshogs me 'od 'bar// dbu yi dkyil 'khor phyogs dang mtshams// rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs bcas par// re'u cha brgyad pa'i phreng bas mdzes// 'khor lo pad+ma rin chen dag/ ka ba'i cha brgyad phyogs dang mtshams// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yi// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud can// dar dang me tog rin chen tshogs// dur khrod rdzas rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi gnas bcas twa ra Na// pa tra'i 'phreng bas kun bklubs pa'i// rnam mdzes 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan// 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor dbus// kun bzang yab yum rol pa'i mthus// sems can sna tshogs phyogs dang mtshams// rang gi phyogs skyong rgyal po tshogs// gnas rnams kun nas legs bkug ste// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i gnas su bkod// gsang sngags mthu las rab 'phrul pa'i// ye shes khro bo bcu po rnams// yum dang gnyis med sbyor mdzad cing// rang gi phrin las kun bskyed pas// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// rin chen ka ba mchog brgyad kyis// nyi zla pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// rigs kyi bde gshegs yum dang bcas// phyogs mtshams dbus su brtan gyur pa'i// sprul pa yang sprul dkyil 'khor tshogs// sku mdog mtshan ma rim bzhin bkod// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug la// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum 'bar ba'i stabs// 'jigs byed rgyan cha'i cha lugs dang// khro bo 'bar ba'i gar bcas pas// rin chen nyi zla'i gdan bzhugs pa'o// kro d+hI shwa ri dbyings kyi yum// sku mdog sngo nag dbu dgu pa// bco brgyad phyag bcas zhabs brgyad mdzes// bde gshegs rigs lnga he ru ka/ yum bcas gnon thabs gar gyis bzhugs// khro mo dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang// che

mchog khro bo mnyam sbyor bas// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad smug nag 'jigs pa'i tshul// rin chen rgyan tshogs chas rnams dang// dur khrod gnas kyis rnam par brjid// phyi rol ma tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas kun tu// sprul pa yang sprul tshogs bcas 'khod// phra men sgo ba khro bo'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun tu khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa chen por sbyor// rigs rnams kun gyi dbang bskur zhing// byin rlabs sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ dkyil 'khor bdun gyi brjid pa'i sku// sbyor ba brgyad kyi bdag nyid can// rab tu rdzogs par gsal byas te/ zhing khams chen po spro mdzad cing// phyag rgya cher gnas rnal 'byor bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid do// khams gsum thams cad bsgral ba'i zhing// rgyud drug gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sdud pa'i sbyor bas kun sdus nas// mi ldog dbyings su yang dag nyid// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun gsal bas// thig le chen por dbang bskur mdzad// zla gsang dbus na byang chub sems// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med// sha chen bshang gci khu ba dang// bder gshegs lnga yi sa bon gyis// rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad// phyi rol chen po lnga dag pas// nang gi rgyu 'bras ye nas dag/ chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid// mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid de// dmigs med ye nas dag pas na// mAM sA rin chen 'byung ldan gtso// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med dngos// snang ba rak+ta mtha' yas thugs// skye 'gag med pa ye nas dag/ don yod dri chu las grub pa// kun kyang gtsang zhing dri ma med// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// ma lus rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid// ma bcos ye nas lhun gyis grub// de phyir sman chen bcud kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// rtogs pa'i klong du su 'dris pa// mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin// bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med// 'byung ba lnga las rgyud lnga rgyu// sprul pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nyid// rang gi lus la bsdus pa'i phyir// sku gsum rdo rje'i dbang thob nas// sgrub pa'i rdzas su rnam par spyod// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal 'dud rtsi rol pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'du mdzad pa ste/ rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o//// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun 'dus shing// thabs dang shes rab sprul spyod pas// de dag dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad// de tshe 'khor gyi byang chub sems// rdo rje chos kyis bskul mdzad cing// yang dag rdzogs pa'i thabs 'di dag// dkyil 'khor gnas kun 'jug par dgongs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo

nyid// bde chen bstan pa'i thugs rje yis// sgrub pa gsang ba'i las kun dag/ byin rlabs mthu yis ston par mdzad// sngon du yun ring tshogs bsags pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i las thabs kun// yon tan rigs rnams kun ldan pa'i// mdangs dga' mchog tu gyur par bsngags// dad cing rgya chen shes rab kyis// brtson pas yang dag sgrub par byed// de nyid yang dag bstan pa'i snod// rnal 'byor chen po'i mtshan nyid ldan// yang dag bla mas dbang bskur cing// yang dag dam tshig la gnas pas// yang dag sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// yang dag bsgrub pa brtson par bya// bde ba chen po'i sa gzhi dag/ kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i gnas// nyes pa'i tshogs bral mdangs ldan pa// bar chad bgegs kyis gnod med par// phyi nang tshul bzhin sbyang pa dang// bskrad dang bsrung dang byin gyis brlabs// yang dag ye shes brtan 'gyur ba'i// sa gzhi zab mo byin brlabs pa'i// mchod dang gtor ma rgya chen tshogs// de dag sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus// nyes par spyod pa'i las rnam dag/ thams cad dngos por grub byed pa'o// ri rtse nyamasas dga' mdangs bzang ba'i// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// byin brlabs mtshams bcad brtan par gnas// lha yi tshogs bcas thun mong dang// khyad par rnam par rol pa yi// bde gshegs byin rlabs lha mor bcas// mang du 'dus nas kun mnyes mdzad// dkyil 'khor bzang po'i gnas brgyan te// rigs rnams bkod pa kun sprul zhing// lhag pa'i lhar bcas ma 'dres rnams// rang gi phrin las mthu las 'phrul// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste// cho ga'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas// sta gon gnas mchog bkra shis par// rigs can dkyil 'khor brtan par gnas// rdzas kyi tshogs kun sbyangs pa dang// byin rlabs 'dod pa'i don bzhin du// thams cad longs spyod yon tan lnga// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi don bsgrub pa'i// thams cad rgyan dang khrus rnams kyis// phyi nang nye bar mdzes byas te// phyag 'tshal sdig bshags la sogs rgyud// de kun bstan pas rnam par dag/ rdo rje rgyal po rgyal thebs che// shes rab phyag rgya 'khor rnam gsum// sems bskyed sdom pa la gnas shing// dbang dang dam tshig rtogs byas te// bya ba chen por las mtha' phyin// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dri sna lnga yi byug pas brgyan// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// re'u cha brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin blta// de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang// yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa'i rdzas// srid gsum b+han d+ha bzang 'khor yug/ ye nas ma bcos rang bzhin

snod// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la// gnas de nyid du dgod pa'i sman// ye nas rang byung bdud rtsi lnga// sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag/ dag pa'i rgyu de bdud rtsi dngos// stong las sbyor bas ye nas dag/ pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang// gru bzhi sgo khyud rta babs rgyan// phyogs rnams kun tu gsal ba yi// rin chen kha dog rnam lnga la// ba dan dril bus rnam par bklubs// dra ba'i tshogs rnams rnam par 'brel// sna tshogs rdo rje'i sa gzhi la// 'khor lo nyi zla pad+mas brgyan// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud dang// 'dod yon lha mo 'khrigs pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas rnams su// kun bzang ye shes gsang ba'i sngags// A li kA li gsang ba'i rgyun// yig 'bru 'od phung phyag rgya'i tshogs// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bdag nyid// 'phro 'du bstan pa'i don spyod pa'o// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor kun rgyas pa'i// gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// ljang ser dkar dang dmar bas mdzes// dbu rgyan rin chen sman rnams dang// na bza' kun gyis rnam par bklubs// rdo rje rgya gram bdud rtsi'i snod// nor bu rin chen pad+ma dang// rtse gsum be con mtshan ma thogs// mtshan dpe cha lugs yum rnams dang// zhi dang khro bcas gnyis ka'i tshul// rang 'od yum dang mnyam sbyor te// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rigs rnams spro// dbang bskur rigs gyi bdag pos brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang// 'od tshogs sprul pa kun spyod pa'o// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsal ba la gnas te// rang sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams kyis// phyogs bcu'i bdud rtsi rdzogs par mdzad// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// bde gshegs rigs kyi khro rgyal bzhi// dkar sngo dmar dang ser ba'i mdog/ zhal gsum g.yas g.yon rnam par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// 'khor lo bdud rtsi bum pa nyid// rgya gram ral gri dgra s+t+wa dang// rin chen phreng bcas yum dang 'khril// phyi rol mchod pa'i longs spyod rgyan// lha mos gnas kun mdzes byas pas// rgya cher rnam par spro zhing bsdu// phyogs bcu kun nas 'khrigs pa'o// sgo srung rigs kyi khro bo dag/ zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed rgyan// dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang// rtse gsum bdud rtsi bum pa nyid// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba'i// rigs bcas mtshan mas mdzes byas pa'o// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM karma kro d+hI shwa ri swA hA/ oM bi shwa badzra he ru ka hUM/ karma badzra kro d+hI shwa rI swA hA/ oM bi shwa rat+na he ru ka hUM/ karma rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI swA hA/ oM bi shwa pad+ma he ru ka hUM/ karma pad+ma

kro d+hI shwa rI swA hA/ oM bi shwa bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM/ karma tsakra kro d+hI shwa rI swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta badzra kro d+ha hUM/ badzra aM ku sha swA hA// oM a mr-i ta rat+na kro d+ha hUM/ rat+na pA sha hUM/ oM a mr-i ta pad+ma kro d+ha hUM// pad+ma s+pho Ta be swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta bud+d+ha kro d+ha hUM/ bud+d+ha g+haN+De shwa rI swA hA// rigs rnams rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ phyag rgya bzhi yis bstan par gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rigs kun gyi// bdud rtsi mtshan ma rgya gram bcas// gsung gi gnas su gsal byas pa'i// pad+ma la gnas sna tshogs mtshan// sa bon sngags kyis brgyan pa dag/ 'od 'phros gsung gi dkyil 'khor// oM a mr-i ta karma sid ti sa mo g+ha g+ha hUM/ rdo rje bcings pa bstan byas pa'i// gung mo mthe bong mthe'u chung rnams// nang du rtse sprad snying gar bzhag/ gnas kyi dkyil 'khor gnas kun sbyor// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// bcangs ste sor mo so sor gdengs// sna tshogs rdo rje 'byung ba'i tshul// gzhan rnams kun nas bskul bar byas// btag dang btsag dang gzhal ba dang// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du yis// stong gsum khyab pas don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir// mu tig dkar po dri med ltar// bka' bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grub dag/ rigs rnams phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyar// de nas 'jam dpal rnon po nyid// rang gi 'khor tshogs sder bcas pas// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal mchod// de dag bstan pa'i gnas su 'khod// dngos grub chen po'i dkyil 'khor nyid// thabs dang gsang ba'i phyag rgya mchog/ mtshan ma rtags bcas gsal ba dag/ byin rlabs mthu yis gsal ba dang// gnyis med dngos grub mnyam sbyor pas// rigs kun 'bras bu ji ltar 'grub// de nas kun tu bzang po nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// snang ba'i tshogs chen kun khyab pas// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor bsdu bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor kun nas gru bzhi pa'i// khang pa gru chad sgo khyud bcas// bar khyams rta babs ra ba dang// rin chen rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor zla gam gyi// rin chen pad+ma'i gdan rnams su// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dbang mdzad pa'i// rta mgrin rol pa rnam par brjid// zhal gsum phyag drug dbang gi sku// dmar dang mthing ga dkar po'i zhal// g.yas na pad+ma ral gri bum// g.yon na 'khor lo rdo rje 'phreng// rta mgrin ljang gu zhal gdangs pa// kha T+wAM rtse gsum phyag rgyas mtshan// sna tshogs rgya gram pad+mo'i phreng// rin chen rgyan bcas gos kyis bklubs// khro mo mi pham ro langs dang// khro gnyer ral pa gcig ma dag/ dkar ser dmar dang ljang

gu'i mdog/ sna tshogs rdo rje pad+ma dang// rtse gsum rak+ta bdud rtsi'i snod// phyogs bzhi thabs dang shes rab kyi// snyoms 'jug shes rab bzhi yi tshul// bde gshegs rigs kyi dbu rgyan dang// byin rlabs cha lugs kun rdzogs pa'o// oM hrIHha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra a mr-i ta hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM rat+na a mr-i ta hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha a mr-i ta hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM karma a mr-i ta hu lu hu lu hUM phaT// de dag dkyil 'khor rnam spros pas// ye shes bdud rtsi kun bsdus te// dngos grub las rnams dbang mdzad cing// thugs rje chags pas kun bkod mdzad// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor brtan byas pas// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa'i mthus// phyi rol mchod pa'i tshogs rnams dang// sgo srung khro bo yab yum bcas// rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i// rta mgrin phyag rgyas phyogs bcu nas// dngos grub tshogs rnams brtan par byed// gung mo mtheb chung rtse sbyar te// srin lag bsnol ba mig gi tshul// mdzub mo mthe bos legs mnan la// dam tshig mchog gi gnas kun bzhag/ rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// srin lag mthe bong rtse sbyar zhing// nyi zla gsal ba'i sngags dang bcas// las kyi phyag rgya kun spyod pa'o// oM ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu pad+ma d+ha ra Ni sid+d+hi hUM/ gsang bcas lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// gzhung bzhin pad+ma'i 'phro 'du bya// de dbus klu bdag sa bon gyis// dngos grub pad+ma blang bar bya// dgug pa'i sngags kyis bstan nas ni// le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya// yang dag bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor nyid// oM gyi ye shes las byung zhing// AM gis mes bsregs thal bar gyur// hUM gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ gsal nas 'byung 'jug lhan ne pos// rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// mang du ston na grub rtags yin// de la ya mtshan skye mi bya// mtshan ma 'di dag ma byung na// bskang gso cho ga rgya bskyed do// spogs thabs bskyed pa rtsal shugs 'byung// dam tshig chen po bskang ba'i phyir// rdzas rnams dag kyang bkang la bzhag/ de nas mchod cing dngos grub blang// slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro// bla ma lung ldan de dag gis// tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do// don dam ma skyes rnam dag sems kyi dbyings// dag dang ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das// dus gsum gcig pa'i sku bstan phyi bshol med// dngos grub sna tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba 'di// su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta 'di la longs// bskal par sgribs dang gti mug mun pa la// sprin mthong nyi shar khud par dro ba bzhin// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po dbang chen 'di byin

pas// rig 'dzin rgyal po'i gtso bo'i go 'phang thob// rnam pa kun gyis nges par chos la sbyor// tshe dang dngos grub yid du 'ong// bgegs rnams kyi byas la sogs te// nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i// yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis 'thob// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems tshogs yi rang ste// ston pa'i bka' la gus bskyed cing// yang dag snying po myur du bzung// yul kun gsang ba'i bdag po nyid// phyag rgya 'khor lo tshogs gyur cing// mdzad spyod rgya chen gnas bsgrub pa'i// rtog pa'i don kun yang dag zhus// de tshe rigs lnga'i bde gshegs kyis// yang dag don 'di rnam par bshad// tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// klu dang bram ze gtsang ma'i rdzas// de kun grol bar ngas ma gnang// byol song rtswa mchog za ba yang// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du za// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas ni// chos sku zhi bas mtha' dag zhi// rigs lnga kha dog skur snang bas// rab tu brtags pas grol bar 'gyur// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas// mnyam pa'i dbyings su dag rtogs na// gnyis med don gyis zin pa nyid// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// dngos dang dngos med rtog pa'i mtshan// gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan// mkhas pas gnyis la gnas mi 'gyur// bdud rtsi chen po'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub sems ni dkar bas na// dri med rnam dag ye shes sku// rak+ta chags med dmar bas na// chos rnams kun spyod pad+ma'i sku// sha chen yid bzhin rin chen sngo// sna tshogs 'byung gnas mnyam pa'i sku// dri chen gser mdog snang mdzad de// mngon byung sprul pa chos kyi sku// dri chu dag byed ljang gu'i mdog/ kun tu don yod las rab sku// sku lnga lhun grub bdud rtsi 'di// kun gyi lus la gnas pa nyid// dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang// sha chen sems bcud 'di dag kun// sems can rtog pa zlog pa'i phyir// gtso bor dang du blang bar byos// gtsang sme med par kun gyis spyod// gnyis med mnyam pa'i bdud rtsi 'grub// the tshom med par dngos grub thob// rnam grol skyes bu chen po dag/ tshe 'dir dngos grub mngon du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa zhes bya ba las/ dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar bsgrub pa'i tshul te/ rim par phye ba lnga pa'o//// de nas bdud rtsi'i snying po nyid// nges pa'i lung gis sgrub byed pa// don kun gsang ba bstan pa'i gnas// zab mo'i rgyud 'di nges par gsungs// dang po phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas// dge zhing bar chad med pa'i gzhi// phyi nang rgyan rnams kun gyis

mdzes// dben zhing sman rnams kun rdzogs pa'i// nye bar spyod pa'i gnas dag tu// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen brtsam// phyi nang gdon kun bsrung ba'i phyir// gsang sngags ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang// sman rdzas lag cha phun sum tshogs// gnod byed bar chad dgra bgegs bzlog/ de nas sgrub pa'i yo byad dang// dam rdzas gsang ba kun bsag cing// 'tsho ba zas kyi rdzas rnams dang// dkyil 'khor rgyan bcas phun sum tshogs// mchod dang gtor ma rgya chen rnams// nye bar bkod pa'i gnas su brgyan// phyi nang gsang ba'i lha dag la// ji bzhin nye bar der gnas te// sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs byas nas// tshes grangs yar ngo'i brgyad la brtsam// bkra shis snga dro la sogs dus// dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam bya zhing// ba yi rnam lnga dri lnga dang// bdud rtsi lnga yis nye bar byug/ bsnyen bsgrub so so'i bye brag bzhin// sgrub rdzas mkhas pas dbye bar bya// mtshan ldan thod pa lnga rnams su// tshil chen me mar gtams byas te// ras kyi sdong bu brgya brgyas brgyan// me mar lnga brgya bltams nas ni// phyogs rnams kun nas byin dbab ste// bsnyen bsgrub don chen gsang ba brtsam// phrin las bzhi yi sbyin sreg dang// las bzhi'i sbyor ba mchog kun bya// zhi ba'i tshe ni byang du blta// dbang gi dus su nub phyogs te// mngon spyod tshe na lho phyogs su// rgyas pa'i las kun shar bltas brtsam// so so'i gdan la gnas par bya// shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng dag tu// sgrub rdzas thams cad gzhag par bya// lho yi dkyil 'khor steng dag tu// mar me lnga brgya smos pa gzhag/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas brgyan par// sgrub mchog yab yum gnas par bya// byang gi dkyil 'khor steng dag tu// khams gsum dag pa'i rdzas rnams bzhag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// rin chen pad+ma'i khri steng la// bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i rdzas// yid 'ong mtshan ma'i snod rnams bzhag/ ye shes lnga ldan ri mos brgyan// rdo rje thod pa dbus su ste// sku gsum lhun grub tshogs rdzogs pa'i// 'khor lo'i thod pa shar gyi phyogs// mi shigs mdzod ldan kun 'byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor thod pa lho yi rdzas// srid gsum yongs bsgral rnam dag nyid// pad+ma'i thod pa nub kyi phyogs// cho 'phrul rtags kun las nyid rdzogs// sna tshogs thod pa byang du bzhag/ mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rdo rje dag/ dngos grub gsol byang rten du bzhag/ mi shigs mdzod ldan rdo rje dang// khams gsum rnam dag rdo rje dang// nyon mongs gnas sbyong rdo rje dang// mtshan ma spros bral rdo rje dang// thod pa yid 'ong mtshams bzhi ru// rigs mthun pad+ma'i gdan la dgod// yon tan tshogs rdzogs rdo rje dang// bkra shis mtshan ldan

rdo rje dang// mi 'gyur sra brtan rdo rje dang// dpal ldan 'joms byed rdo rje dang// pad+ma can dang dung can dang// ban glang can dang ri mo can// mtshams dang sgo gnas pad+ma la// rigs kyi rdzas rnams bkod par bya// yang na b+han d+ha dpal ldan rdzogs// zlum la 'khyil bas pad+ma 'dra// dbus na bu ga gcig yod pa// 'di dag bdud rtsi mdzes pa'i snod// nang du hrIHzhes bri bar bya// phyi rol pad 'dab sngags dang bcas// snying po tshims byed bcud kyi mchog/ gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// dri zhim bcud ldan thams cad kun// 'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir// mang po 'dus pas mthu byin che// yang dag rtsa brgyad stong du sbyar// gtso bo lnga dang sbyor ba'i sman// a mra rgun 'bru pa na se// na le ge sar a ga ru// 'di dag nang gi 'bras bu lnga// sha lnga'i yon tan rtsal rdzogs dag/ dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar// de yi 'phral du dgos pa yang// shing thog rgun 'bru ka ko la// a mra pa na bum sha ri// dri ni chen po sna lnga dang// cha yi grangs su mnyam sbyar te// nA ga ge sar shing tsha dang// sug smel g+han+d+har+b+ha dra dang// kun ta re ta dri yi mchog/ rgya spos dza ti pha la dang// ga pur tsan dan li shi dag/ dri yi rgyal po spos mchog ste// rang gi rigs bzhin dgod par bya// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ pog dang sbrang rtsi lce pog dag/ gser dngul zangs lcags dung rnams kun// brdar zhing zhib tu btags te sbyar// de dag rab tu cha bsnyams shing// rang gi mthu bcas sbyor bas 'grub// btag btsag las kyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis sbyar// oM a mr-i ta ha na ha na a mr-i ta mu+u sa la swA hA// khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor gyis// bar gcod bgegs rnams tshar gcod cing// gnas dang rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i rdzas// thams cad 'byor pas brtan par bya// rigs lnga rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// sku gsung thugs tshogs bsgrub pa'i gnas// ting 'dzin bsten pas gsal bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi khrol bu'i rigs dkyil 'khor// de nyid sngags dang phyag rgya dang// 'od zer mthu yis sbyor byed cing// rang gi dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// btag btsag phrin las gsal ba'i tshogs// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor 'ju 'dul bcas// rigs kyi 'khor los sbyor ba'i mthu// sprin las bdud rtsi gnas chen 'grub// de nas dpal chen he ru ka/ dur khrod bdag po chen po ni// che mchog shin tu mi bzad pa'i// rigs rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyis brgyan// sku ni smug nag 'bar ba la// nyi shu rtsa gcig zhal gyis mdzes// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gi tshogs// rigs kyi sangs rgyas khro bo dang// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor yum bcas

rnams// pho brang gdan dang bcud du ldan// khams gsum dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brgyan// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor sbyor// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la// bdud rtsi zab mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid// phrin las mtshams gyi dkyil 'khor gnas// mkha' 'gro rol pa'i tshogs dang bcas// yang dag bdud rtsi gsang chen bsgrub// phyag rgya kun tu bkod pa'i tshul// gar dbang dgyes mchog dkyil 'khor la// mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pas// thams cad gnyis med byang chub sems// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor las// thabs shes 'od 'phro dkyil 'khor 'char// rnam dag chos nyid dkyil 'khor du// tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor rgyas// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyis// dngos grub bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rgyu 'bras mthun par sbyang ba yang// rigs tshogs 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor nyid// gsang ba yum gyi tshogs rnams kun// phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod bya ste// yang dag tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab// nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal bar spro// gnyis mnyam gnyis su mnyam sbyor bas// dug gsum sku gsum gnas su sgrol// yangs shing rgyud la goms pa dang// chos sku zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin// yon tan tshogs dang ldan pa la// nges par dbang thob dam tshig gnas// 'byung ba bzhi las bskyed pa'i yum// mtshan mchog bzang po bdud rtsi gnyis// cha lugs rdzogs par ma 'dres gsal// zla gsang dkar dmar klung dkar lci// rab sbyangs gsal ba'i grogs ldan pa// ma dang sring mo rnal 'byor ma// btsal nas bsgrub pa chen po bya// dri sbyar spos chus mgo lus bkru// dkyil 'khor gnas su nye bar sbyang// 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi ra sA yan// chags chen sbyar ba'i sems dang bcas// khyad par bdud rtsi gnas kun tu// rab tu rgyas pas kun 'grub 'gyur// mtshan dang ldan pa'i thod pa ru// gsang sngags phyag rgya 'phro 'dus sbyang// bdud rtsi dam pa'i gnas nyid du// kun byed thams cad gsang ba yin// slob ma dpal brtul gtsang sbra can// skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi// mi phyed ba ni dgu dang ldan// dam tshig thams cad ma nyams rdzogs// lus srog bu dang chung ma dang// rin chen sna tshogs rdzas rnams dang// sring mo shin tu brgyan pa dag/ slob dpon bla ma mchog la 'bul// de dag rab tu sbyangs pa yis// nyung yang bdud rtsi'i grangs bzhin du// rab tu brtags shing bsal byas pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsgrub// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho gnas chen 'dis// rang

byung don kun rdzogs byed pas// re dogs mtshan ma'i mtha' spangs te// don bzhin rigs kyi dngos grub blang// de tshe phyi nang gsang ba dang// ma dag pa rnams mtshams bcad do// las kyi gtso ni bskang byas te// sbyang dang mtshams dang gsal byas 'grub// nyi zla pad+ma yang dag gnas// rigs mthun dpa' bo 'bru lnga'o// 'phro 'du mtshan ma sku yi tshogs// gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya// 'di dngos phyi ma rab 'byams mchog/ dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma kun// ma thob par du mi gtang bzung// btang na bar chod chen por 'gyur// gsang sngags bdud rtsi'i gnas chen 'dir// mi gnyis mnyam par bsgrub par bya// de dag the tshom rnam spangs pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor brtan byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya nye bar sbyar// bde ba chen po'i tshogs rab rgyus// oM a ho su kha d+harma kA ya sid+d+hi a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hrIHswA hA/ gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya// spyi gtsug dbus su zla gam ste// de ni oM dkar 'od ldan pa// 'od zer rnam lnga 'phro 'du'i rgya// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad gtso// rigs kyi phyag rgya'i tshul bzhugs pa'i// lce yi pad+ma hrIHdmar po// 'od zer rnam lnga'i mdangs dang bcas// mtha' yas chos kyi gsung ldan pa// mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul bstan pa'o// de nas bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor kun// snying ga'i nyi dkyil hU~M mthing ga/ rin chen sna lnga'i zer dang bcas// thugs mchog mi bskyod rdo rje sems// rdo rje dril bcas sa gnon mdzad// lte ba'i nyi mar swA ser po// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'phro 'du las// yon tan rin chen 'byung ldan nyid// yid bzhin rin chen sbyin pa'i rgya// gsang gnas nyi mar ha ljang gu// 'od zer sna lnga'i phreng bar bcas// phrin las don yod grub pa'i sku// skyabs sbyin sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgya// pho brang dkyil 'khor re cha'i gnas// phung po'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin pa'o// rigs lnga gtso bo yum bcas kun// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ye shes lnga las der snang ba'i// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'phro 'du las// khams gsum 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// slar 'dus bdud rtsi'i gnas su thim// pho brang dkyil 'khor gdan rnams su// sman nyid phyag rgya gsal gyur nas// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas sbyor cing// rigs gnas kha dog las kun dag/ de dag mtshan mar gsal bar gnas// oM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyis// rin chen bdud rtsi gnas spyod mdzad// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// 'bar ba byang chub sems nyid sbyong// swA sngon rin chen 'od 'bar bas// sha chen bdud rtsi'i gnas dag mdzad// dmar po hrIHlas pad+mar gyur// chags pa'i rak+ta sbyong byed pa'o// hA ljang rdo rje rgya gram

las// dag pa'i dri chu bdud rtsir gyur// yang dag goms pas spro dang bsdu// yun ring brtan pas kun tu sbyor// oM AHhUM swA hA/ rigs rnams rtsa ba'i snying po yis// bde gshaigs kun gyi gnas sbyor zhing// rigs bcas zhing khams thams cad kun// bdud rtsi gsang chen rgya mtsho nyid// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrI Tha/ ye shes lnga yi 'od 'byung bar// bsdus pas bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ thams cad gnyis med byang chub sems// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon sangs rgyas// ma skyes byang chub sems kyi dbyings// dug gsum nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod// yon tan tshogs kun dbang sdud cing// dam bcas 'jig rten ma lus sgrol// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// pho brang 'bar ba'i gzhal yas gnas// bdud rtsi rtsa ba grogs dang skyabs// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// de dag longs spyod yon tan rnams// ma 'gags rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku// thams cad gcig tu rdzogs pa'o// phyag rgya'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// phrin las so so kun gsal ba// sprul pa'i phreng ba rgyun mi chad// gsang sngags yi ge 'khor lo'i tshul// phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs pas// rang rig dkyil 'khor sbyang mdzad gsal// oM ni chos kyi rang bzhin te// thams cad thabs dang shes rab tshogs// skye med dbyings las ma g.yos pas// yum gyi mkha' nas 'gyur ba med// A+oM ni gsung gi rang bzhin te// skye ba med las skye ba'i tshul// ting 'dzin rnam gsum 'brel pa'i tshul// lhums nas bltams pa nyid du bltams// hUM ni thugs kyi rang bzhin te// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don// gnyis med ye shes rnam sprul pas// gzhon nu rol pa ji bzhin mdzad// sems gnas kun gyi gzhir gyur cing// thams cad bskyed pa'i yum nyid de// dbyings dang ye shes 'brel pa'i rgya// rigs kyi lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i// g.yo bas kun tu bskyed mdzad cing// kun tu ston pa'i gnas ldan pas// 'khor dang myang ngan 'das par sbyong// rab tu byung ba'i tshul 'dzin pa'i// drug pas kun tu sdud mdzad cing// rnam rtog dri ma 'khru bar byed// don kun gsang ba bstan pa'i sgos// dka' thub chen po mthar phyin pa'o// bdun pa kun tu snang byed cing// thams cad bsregs pa'i mthu ldan pas// rnam rtog ri bo'i bdud tshogs kun// thugs rje nyi mas bsdu bar mdzad// brgyad pa byang chub sems nyid kyis// skye med dbyings su rnam dag cing// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor pas// yang dag rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor nyid// dgu bas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// thugs rje rnam dag ye shes tshogs// sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad

pa dag/ cho 'phrul kun tu ma 'gags pa'o// phra zhing gting dpag med pa'i chos// zab cing rgya che 'gro la ston// skye med dbyings su zad med de// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa'i tshul// hrIHbcas dbang du sdud pa'i sngags// brtan g.yo'i dngos bcas ma lus kun// thams cad bdud rtsi chen por bsgyur// skye med dbyings bral mya ngan 'das// phyogs bcur sngags kyis spro byed cing// 'byung tshogs dam rdzas yab yum sku// rang bzhin gnyis med phyag rgya las// sprul pa'i sku ston sku gdung bgos// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i rgya// slara'adus bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gnas// 'byung ba'i rgyu ni yab yum mkha'// 'di dag don kun skye shi med// rnam rtog mtshan ma kun sbyong ba// thabs dang shes rab rnam bkod pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pas kyang// mthe bong srin lag sbyor ba'i bar// thabs shes dkyil na yi ge hrIH// gsang ba'i mtshan ma bstan byas nas// mdzub mo gung mo mthe'u chung brkyang// sngags kyi phreng ba 'od bcas kyis// sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams byin brlabs pas// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba brtan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba la// bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra bas bskul// le lo nyams spangs g.yeng ba yi// glal dang sbrid pas bar mi bcad// oM badzra a mr-i ta hUM hrIHTha/ oM AHhUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// a mr-i ta prA be sha ya/ A be sha ya a a/ rang bzhin bdud rtsi gnas rnams nas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus te// de dag gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rtag par gnas// gnyis med gdod nas dag pa ste// sku gsung bdud rtsi'i gnas rgyas shing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya rol pa'i tshul ston pa'o// de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo dag/ kun tu longs spyod mnyes pa'i tshogs// rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'i// bdud rtsi'i gnas kun longs spyod nyid// de tshe dga' mgu dad pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bstod// oM nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ye shes te// mtshan nyid sna tshogs nam mkha' bzhin// bya dang byed tshogs rnam par grol// bdud rtsi'i rgyal mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// A+oM chu zla bzhin du ma 'gags gsal// thams cad rtog pa yongs su
