'byung// ji ltar snang ba dag pa'i dbyings// ma bcos ye nas mkha' ltar dag/ gnyis med thabs dang shes rab don// mnyam pa nyid las gzhan med do// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag pa las 'das pa'i sems dpas byang chub kyi sems rtogs pa'i tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi dbyings las thams cad shar// shar ba nyid na brjod du med// brjod med ngang las thams cad gsal// gsal ba'i bye brag thams cad gsal// gsal ba'i bye brag so sor 'byung// de las thams cad nyon mongs med// dri med rnam dag rgyal ba'i sku// rnal 'byor blo ldan gyis bsgoms 'grub// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas// byang chub kyi sems rtogs pa'i tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// chos sku byang chub sems las byung// rgyu yi dus na de nyid gsal// rim pa rim par gsal byas te// gnyis med ngo bo nyid la gnas// ma bcos brjod med ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor dam pas bsgoms nas 'grub// ces gsungs so// de nas bde bar gshegs pa lnga la sogs pa 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams gnyis su med pa'i ngang nyid brjod pa dang bral ba'i don la sems nas bzhugs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las byang chub sems kyi nges pa de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pa rnam par dag pa phul nas/ lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas shing/ brkyang phyag 'tshal nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa/ e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// kun gyi gnyen gyur dam pa'i gtso// kun la snyoms pa'i ngang tshul can// 'khor ba'i gnas nas drangs pa dang// sems

can lam la 'god pa'i phyir// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rin chen dkyil// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor las kyi dkyil// rnam snang mdzad chen dkyil 'khor ni// dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// bde gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la 'dus// gsang ba gsum las byung ba rnams// 'gro ba rigs drug thams cad la// rab tu phan pa'i sems 'chang zhing// rnal 'byor rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir// bdag cag 'khor tshogs zhu bar 'tshal// zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas ston pa gsang bdag gis rdo rje chos kyi tshig gsan nas/ so sor rang rang dkyil 'khor rnams// rab tu nyams dga' thogs med bshad// rnal 'byor blo ldan brtse phyir ro// las kyi bye brag thams cad dang// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma rnams// slob dpon byed par 'dod pa dang// bde bar gshegs pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// so so'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rgyud shes legs par ston pa dang// ting 'dzin drod ldan gdeng du bcang// bka' dang bstan bcos thams cad la// rab tu mkhas shing the tshom med// don la sran tshugs bsgom la brtson// gnyis med blo ldan dad pa che// gsang ba bzhi yi don rnams dang// gab cing sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// snod ngan sbas pa gsang mi thub// de la rtag tu mi ster zhing// gsang gsum dbang mchog thob pa ni// rdor 'dzin dkyil 'khor dag la shis// rtsa ba dag dang yan lag bcas// dam tshig ma nyams legs thub dang// mdog bzang gzugs mdzes dri mchog ldan// mi 'os stobs ldan shugs 'chang zhing// lag mthil 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad yod// kha dog ser zhing shin tu 'tsher// 'khor lo can gyi las rnams ni// ci dgar dkyil 'khor bya bar gsungs// blo yangs yon tan kun gyi brgyan// shes pa gsal zhing yon tan ldan// rig pa'i gnas mchog kun la mkhas// spyod lam rnam bzhir lhun sdug cing// mdzes pa'i glu dbyangs rnams la mkhas// yon tan kun la ma 'gags spyod// rdo rje slob dpon bka' bzhin byed// rdo rje spun la gdung ba che// rin po che yi las rnam kun// rnal 'byor de yis bya bar gsungs// rtag par ting 'dzin rgyun mi gcod// bzlas pa dag la rab tu brtson// sngags kyi don rnams ma lus mkhyen// ngag kyang shin tu 'jam par smra// bden smra mgrin bde glu dbyangs mkhas// phyi nang chos la mos shing 'chad// tshig sgo gsal zhing kha dog dmar// pad+ma can gyi las kyi rigs// phyi nang las rnams thams cad la// shin tu ma rmongs dbang yang thob// sngags la brtson zhing shes rab gsal// phyi nang rgyud kyi las rnams la// lhag gam 'on te chad kyang rung// de yi don rnams ma nor skong// phrin las

rnam bzhi'i las la mkhas// las kyi dkyil 'khor bya bar gsungs// yon tan thams cad kun dang ldan// phyi nang sde snod kun la mkhas// spyod pa'i bye brag mang po spyod// las dang bya ba kun la mkhas// rtag par dad ldan snying rje che// ting 'dzin bye brag kun la mkhas// byang sems mtshan nyid thugs su chud// dkyil 'khor spyi yi las su rung// slob dpon lung ldan dam pa des// slob ma'i mtshan nyid brtag par bya// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bsrungs// shes rab rnam gsum sgo nas sbyangs// dad ldan brtson 'grus rkyen thub dpa'// ston pa'i bka' dang bstan bcos mkhas// slob dpon 'khur zhing snying rje ldan// rdo rje spun la brtse gdung che// bla ma'i man ngag shin tu 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i slob mar rung// lus la dri zhim ngad ldang zhing// lus mdzes skra yang ser la 'jam// slob dpon rdo rje spun la gdung// dkyil 'khor gyi ni las la mkhas// stod smad phyed cing mig dkyus ring// drang por smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ngag kyang shin tu bde zhing 'jam// 'khor lo can gyi slob mar rung// spyod pa spang zhing dpa' rtsal che// rin chen sna tshogs nor rnams 'chang// gser dang bye ru mu tig rnams// ji ltar 'os pa'i rin chen gyis// bla ma'i dgongs pa skong bar byed// ngag snyan lus kyang mdzes pa dang// skyon rnams thams cad spangs pa ni// rin chen dkyil 'khor slob mar rung// lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi// mi dge bcu po yongs su spong// dge ba bcu la rtag tu brtson// ngag snyan mgrin bde glu la mkhas// mdog dmar lus la tsan+dan dri// skra yang mthon mthing sen mo dmar// yan lag phra la tshig rnams drang// pad+ma 'chang gi slob mar bshad// phyi nang chos la rtag tu dga'// phrin las rnam bzhi'i las la 'grus// dpa' rtsal che zhing lhun yang sdug/ bzo la mkhas shing rig pa gsal// bla ma dam pa mnyes byed cing// dgongs pa thams cad skong byed pa// sna tshogs las la shin tu mkhas// las kyi rigs kyi slob mar rung// yon tan mchog rnams kun tshang zhing// mang pos bkur zhing bsngags pa brjod// lus mdzes spyod gzo yid du 'ong// phyi nang dkyil 'khor las la mkhas// man ngag gsang ba sbas pa thub// spyod pa gang bsgoms slob dpon 'khur// rig pa'i gnas la 'gag pa med// spyi yi dkyil 'khor slob mar rung// dang po gnas kyi brtag pa ni// bzang ngan gnyis su shes par bya// bzang po dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// ngan pas rnal 'byor nyid brlag 'gyur// spang blang gnyis su shes par gyis// sngon la spang ba'i gnas bstan pa// gnod sbyin srin po bsgrub pa dang// srin mos brad pa'i sder rjes dang// srin

gdug mtshon cha 'dra ba dang// srin po bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang// 'byung po mang po 'du ba'i gnas// klu gdug chu mig ngam gnag dang// lha 'dre can gyi rgyun srang dang// sngon chad lha mi'i gnas gzhi dang// gnod sbyin gnas pa'i lha rten sa// de lta bu yi gnas dag tu// blo ldan rnal 'byor des bsgoms na// kha na ma tho bcas 'gyur zhing// sdug bsngal rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur// de lta bu yi gnas dag ni// mtshan nyid legs par shes byas la// spangs na dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// blang bar bya ba'i gnas rnams ni// rdo rje brag dkar mdangs bzang ba// ri bo lhun sdug brag chen gtams// ri ni rin chen spungs pa 'dra// de lta bu yi rtse rnams sam// nyams dga' gangs ri mtha' ma bskor// shin tu nyams dga' yid 'ong ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas// spang phug ri bo nyams dga' dang// sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis bsgrubs pa// mi dang 'du 'dzi dben pa dang// ri bo chen po'i sul dag dang// nags tshal chen po gtibs pa dang// skyed mos tshal gyis mtha' bskor dang// nyams dga' shar du kha bltas dag/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas// kha dog rnam pa lnga yod dang// rin chen sna lnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba// yang na rin chen zur brgyad dam// rin chen myu gu 'dra ba'am// mdzes pa'i bya skad sna tshogs sgrogs// lung pa mdzes shing kha dog sngo// skye shing legs po yod pa'i gnas// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas// ri ni dri zhim sna tshogs yod// tsan+dan dmar po'i nags tshal can// me tog pad+ma'i gling yod dmar// yid 'ong lung pa dmar la mdzes// pad+ma 'dra ba'i dbyibs yod dang// gnam ni zlum la ya yo med// bra ma smug pos gtibs pa der// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod ma mo 'du ba'i gnas// thang yangs grog po mdung btsugs sam// lam gsum bsnol ba'i dbus su'am// grog po phas chod tshus chod gleng// ri la rdza mo yod pa dang// brag sngon rag rag mang ba dang// ral gri 'dra ba'i dbyibs yod par// las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par shis// ri bo lhun sdug bsgyings pa dang// ri brag mang pos bskor ba dang// lung pa mdzes shing kha dog yangs// lcug phran tshal dag skyes pa dang// mdzes pa'i sa ni rin chen 'dra// gnam ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dra// logs la sman gyi nags tshal yod// dkyil 'khor spyi yi bsgrub pa'i gnas// yang na dkyil 'khor lnga char ni// yon tan cha dang cha yis brgyan// de ltar spyi yi gnas su bstan// de lta bu yi gnas rnams ni// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pa yis// mtshan nyid shes shing rtogs byas la// dang du blangs te bsgrub par

bya// slob dpon slob ma gnas rnams dag/ gzhung dang mthun par rnyed nas ni// slob dpon ting 'dzin mi ldan na// nyes dang bcas shing ya gar 'gyur// dngos grub med cing tshi chad 'gyur// de yi mtshan nyid zin byas la// shes dang spang bar bya ba yin// ting 'dzin las su rung ba yis// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pa des// gnas dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni// cho ga yo byad ma tshogs kyang// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'bras bu thag mi ring// gnas dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni// cho ga yo byad ldan gyur na// mkhas pas rim pa byas bsgoms na// dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'grub ces// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas// kun gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yin// dngos po'i chos la dad pa dang// mtshan ma dag la dga' ba dag/ drang zhing mtshan dngos gzhom pa'i phyir// lung pa'i ri dang bar snang dang// rigs lnga so so'i mtshan nyid dag/ rab tu brtags te gzung bar bya// gnyis med don la dga' ba dang// ma bcos don rnams nyams su len// gsang ba sbas pa'i don la brtag/ de la rtse gcig ting 'dzin brtan// dang po rang lus rnal 'dug ste// ting 'dzin rtse gcig byas nas su// phyi nang dngos po thams cad la// rang bzhin med rtog des bsgoms na// de ni sa sbyong dang po yin// mig g.yas nyi ma g.yon zla ba// sna nas rlung gis bsreg gtor bkrus// de ni sbyong ba gnyis pa yin// byang chub sems chus rab bsal ba// de ni sbyong ba gsum pa'o// de'i tshe phyag rgya bcas nas ni// dbang gyur lha mo spyan drangs la// mchod de 'od zhu sa la thim// bdud dang gnod sbyin ma rungs pas// bar du gcod par mi nus shing// bsod nams tshogs bsags dam pa mchog/ dngos gzhi dam par de 'gyur ro// sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bya// gzhung dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi de// rgyal po'am sa bdag la sogs la// dbang btsan thug thub ma yin par// bden pa'i gtam smras rin gyis blang// de nas rdo rje'i khang pa bya// de dbus stegs bu gru bzhi brtsig/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga rnams dang// dri zhim po ni sna tshogs pas// rab tu bsres te byugs par bya// mthug srab pa yi go ba tsam// legs par 'thas shing snyoms par bya// rdo rje'i khang pa gsal yang gdab// dkyil 'khor so so'i kha dog gi/ rigs dang mthun pa'i grogs mchog des// mdzes shing khrus byas rgyan gyis spras// byin dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// de dag rnal 'byor g.yon du bzhag/ tshad ldan rdo rje srad bu la// de ldan dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// thig gi bye brag dkyil 'khor gzhung// ji ltar 'os par thig gdab brtsam// de rjes dri yi thig le bya// so so'i pho

brang gdan du brtsig/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// mchod bstod rim par byas nas ni// rab tu mnyes byas dkyil 'khor ni// tshon rtsi sna lnga rab 'bring tha// rab tu bsgrims te byin brlabs la// 'gro ba rmongs pa las dang pos// dang po mtshan nyid shes byas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor de// rab tu mtshon par bya ba'i phyir// rnam lnga'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bshad// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su rab tu zlum pa la// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// gru chad dang ni bar khyams dang// sgo khyud dang ni rin chen lnga// 'dod yon rin chen pha gu dang// dra ba dra phyed rol mor bcas// 'ba' hu la dang rta babs dang// dril bu g.yer kha sil sil sgra// chos kyi 'khor lo twa ra Na// rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan par bri// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin// dbyings phyug ma dang gnyis med 'khril// seng ges gtams pa'i khri steng du// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag gnas// rgyan rnams yongs su rdzogs par gsal// kha dog mthing ga 'od dang bcas// g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba yin// phyag ni rnam pa drug tu gsungs// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// bar ma 'khor lo tha mar ni// g.yon gyi dang po dril bu dkur// bar ma rin chen myu gu'o// mtha' ma ral gri 'bar ba bsnams// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bcas// mdun du rnam par snang mdzad de// sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis su med// glang po'i gdan dang bcas pa la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag gnas// kha dog dkar po'i 'od 'bar bas// g.yas ser g.yon pa sngo ba yin// g.yas dang 'khor lo thugs kar 'dzin// bar pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa// mtha' ma rin chen myu gu'o// g.yon dang dril bu dku+u la brten// bar pa pad+ma kha 'bus bsnams// tha ma rdo rje rgya gram mo// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan te// mA ma kI dang gnyis su med// rdzu 'phrul rta yi khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag bzhugs// kha dog dzAm bu na da'i gser// g.yas dmar g.yon pa dkar po yin// phyag drug g.yas dang rin po che// bar ma rdo rje mtha' ma pad// g.yon dang dril bu bar ma 'khor// mtha' ma ral gri bsnams pa'o// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// rgyab tu snang ba mtha' yas te// gos dkar mo dang gnyis med bzhugs// rma byas gtams pa'i khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag bzhugs// kha dog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ g.yas pa dkar la ser ba ste// g.yon pa sngau la skya ba'o// g.yas dang pad+ma thugs gar 'dzin// bar ma rdo rje mtha' ma

'khor// g.yon dang dril bu dku la brten// bar ma rdo rje rgya gram ste// tha ma rin chen myu gu'o// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// g.yon du don yod grub pa ste// dam tshig sgrol dang gnyis med bzhugs// nam mkha' lding gi khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag bzhugs// kha dog in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba yin// phyag drug g.yas dang ral gri thugs// bar ma rdo rje mtha' ma pad// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// bar ma 'khor lo mtha' ma rin// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan// yum ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// rdo rje dril bu thogs nas 'khyud// kha dog yab dang 'dra bar brtag/ kun gyi mtshan nyid yin pas so// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang// las kyi ral gri bsnams pa'o// shar lho mtshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// lA s+ye dkar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rin chen myu gu bsnams// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum ni 'gying stabs yab la 'khyud// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// lho nub mtshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma dkar po'i khri steng du// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// kha dog sngon po mdangs dang ldan// mA le sngon mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon dril bu// yum ni phreng ba gtso la 'khyud// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// nub byang mtshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// gIrti dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril// yum ni pi wang yab la 'khril// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// byang shar mtshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// byang sems phyag na rdo rje ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang// nIrti ljang gu sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril// yum ni gar gyi phyag rgyas 'khril// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// d+hU pe dkar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa klu shing g.yon pa dril// yum ni pog phor sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// lho nub mtshams kyi gru chad la// pad+ma sngo skya'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib sel ni// zhal gcig

phyag ni gnyis pa ste// sku mdog sngo skya 'od dang bcas// puSh+pe sngo skya sku+u la 'khril// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon pa dril// yum ni me tog phyag rgya can// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// nub byang mtshams kyi gru chad la// pad+ma dmar ser gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// kha dog dmar ser 'od dang bcas// A lo ka dmar ser sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rin chen snye ma bsnams// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum ni mar me sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ byang shar mtshams kyi gru chad la// pad+ma ljang gu'i gdan steng na// byang sems 'jam dpal gzhon nu ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang// g.yas pa ut+pal g.yon pa dril// yum ni byug pa sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// shar gyi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma ser po'i gdan steng na// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// g.yas pa gseg shang g.yon par bu// bzhengs nas mi rnams ston pa mdzad// lho yi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma ser skya'i gdan steng na// lha yi thub pa brgya byin ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku ser skya// pi wang bzhengs nas lha yi ston// nub kyi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// lha min thub pa thags bzangs ris// pad+ma dmar skya'i gdan la bzhugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku dmar skya// phyag na ral gri go cha bsnams// bzhengs nas lha min ston pa mdzad// byang gi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma dkar skya'i gdan steng na// yi dwags thub pa kha 'bar ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku dkar skya// sgrom bu bzhengs nas yi dwags ston// shar gyi khyams 'gram bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma sngon po'i gdan steng na// byol song thub pa a glang mgo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// pu sti bzhengs nas byol song ston// nub kyi khyams 'gram bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma nag po'i gdan steng na// dmyal thub gshin rje mi thod can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ me chu bzhengs nas dmyal pa'i ston// shar gyi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// kun bzang phyag na rdo rje dkar// rdo rje thal mo phyag rgyas gnon// nub khyams g.yon na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// kun tu bzang mo gtso dang mthun// dkyil 'khor shar gyi sgo ru ni// 'joms pa ya mAn ta kr-ita ni// zhing gdan me dpung nang na bzhugs// thod gdeng rta gdong sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis bgrad pa'i tshul du bzhugs// lho yi sgo ru bsam bya ba// 'joms pa pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ni// zhing gdan me dpung nang na

bzhugs// pad nang rdo rje phag gdong 'khril// zhabs gnyis gyad gyi dor stabs bzhugs// nub kyi sgo ru bsam bya ba// 'joms pa pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ni// zhing gdan me dpung nang na bzhugs// thod phor rdor bcug sbrul gyis dkris// nyi zla lcags sgrog sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bzhugs// byang gi sgo ru bsam bya ba// 'joms pa big+h+nAM ta kr-ita ni// zhing gdan me dpung nang na bzhugs// rdo rje rgya gram thod pa gnon// thal byed dril bu sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis bgrad pa'i tshul du bzhugs// sgo ba'i khro bo khro mo ni// sku mdog rigs las shes par bya// bcom ldan bder gshegs skur rdzogs te// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa nyams dga' yin// 'khor lo can gyi dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud can// gru chad bar khyams la sogs pa// rdor 'dzin dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// dbus su seng ge'i gdan dag la// rnam snang yab yum bsgom par bya// spyan sngar mi bskyod yab yum bcas// gzhan rnams so so'i mtshan nyid ni// rdor 'dzin dkyil 'khor 'dra bar bri// rin chen dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// rin chen zur brgyad 'dra ba la// bde bar gshegs pa'i pho brang bya// bar khyams la sogs gong bzhin bya// dbus su rdzu 'phrul rta yi khri// de'i steng rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom// yum dang gnyis su med par bzhugs// lho ru rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgom// yum dang gnyis su med par bzhugs// gzhan rnams gong ma ji bzhin no// pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// ze'u 'bru pad+ma 'bras bur bcas// dbus su+u rma bya'i gdan dag la// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum bsgom// nub tu rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgom// gzhan rnams gong ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// shin tu rgyas par bri ba yin// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su le'u tshe dgu dang ldan// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ldan// rin chen zur brgyad pad+mar mdzes// dbus su nam mkha' lding gi khri// de'i steng don yod yab yum bsgom// byang du rdor 'dzin yab yum ste// gzhan rnams kyang ni gsal bar bri// dkyil 'khor dam pa de dag la// brgyan par bya ba'i rdzas rnams ni// bum pa brgyad dam bcu drug gam// kha rgyan mdzes pa'i shing los bya// nang du gtams pa'i bcud rnams ni// bza' dang bca' ba'i bye brag dang// bu+u ram sbrang rtsi mar rnams dang// til la sogs pa'i 'bru rnams dang// rin chen sna lnga snying po lnga// zla ba nyi ma chu sman dris// yongs su gang ba'i bum pa ni// dang po gser las byas pa brgyad// gnyis pa shel dung dngul las byas// gsum pa bai DUr+ya yi brgyad// bzhi pa zangs las byas pa

brgyad// lnga pa lcags las byas pa brgyad// de rnams dkyil 'khor lnga yi brgyan// dkyil 'khor drug pa la brgyan pa// zangs lcags dngul dang bai DUr+ya// gser la sogs pas brgyan par bya// gzhan yang brgyan par bya ba'i rdzas/ rol mo'i bye brag thams cad dang// yid du 'ong ba'i lhab lhub dang// bza' dang bca' ba'i bye brag gis// dkyil 'khor dam pa brgyan par bya// phyogs skyong gtor ma la sogs pa// dkar gsum mngar gsum 'o mas brgyan// 'bru sna tshogs pa'i chan rnams dang// sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dgram// de nas rnal 'byor can dag gis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje brlab// phyag rgya snying gar gsal bar bskyed// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bya// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs zhes bya// rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas nas ni// bde gshegs 'khor bcas spyan drangs mchod// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang yang nod// de la mchod pa'i bye brag bya// lha mo mdzes pa'i kha dog lnga// phyi nang mchod par dbul bar bya// phyi yi mchod pa dbul bya ba// d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke// gan+d+he ma yis mchod bstod bya// lA s+ye mA le gIrti dang// nIrtis mchod bstod las bya'o// nang gi mchod pa'i las bya ba// yum lnga'i mtshan nyid can gyis bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa de bzhin no// de nas las rnams so so yi// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bu mchog der// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan pa'i phyir// bu tshur ci la dga' zhes dri// rigs dang ldan pa'i bu mchog des// bdag ni 'di la dga' lags so// so so'i dkyil 'khor mtshan nas brjod// slob dpon lung ldan dam pa des// mna' bsgag chu blud bya ba'i phyir// oM badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha no da ka Sha/ bzlas pa'i chu 'di kha ru blud// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag la// gang dag mi mos pa yi drung// khyod kyis smra bar ma byed cig/ gal te smra bar gyur na ni// khyod ni sdug bsngal dang mi 'bral// tshe yi 'du byed byas nas ni// sems can dmyal ba chen por skye// khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni// yi dam lha la rtag gnas bya// bla ma mig gi 'bras ltar ltos// rdo rje spun la brtse gdung skyed// sngags dang phyag rgya rtag tu bca'// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// snod ngan gzhan la spel bya min// zla ba yab kyi byang chub sems// nyi ma yum gyi rak+ta chu sman dri// sgrub rdzas rtag tu bsten par bya// sha yi bye brag rnam pa lnga// chang lnga rnams kyang bsten par bya// bud med 'dod pa drag tu bsten// sbyor sgrol phra ma mi snyan brku// 'di dag rtag tu spyad par bya// mu stegs dka' thub ma yin zhing// nyan thos khrims dang sdom pa min// gsang ba'i sdom pa

'da' bar dka'// slob dpon smad par bya ba min// gal te smad par gyur na ni// dngos grub med cing dmyal bar ltung// de ltar dam tshig bsgrags nas ni// de nas bla ma lung ldan des// snod kyi khyad par ci rigs par// dbang rnams rim par bskur bar bya// dang po dkyil 'khor gzhug pa'i dbang// gnyis pa gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang// gsum pa rdo rje slob dpon dbang// bzhi pa las bzhi'i lung yang bstan// lnga pa dbugs dbyung bstan pa ste// drug pa rab 'byams rgyal po'i dbang// bdun pa gsang ba'i dbang dag sbyin// brgyad pa shes rab dbang mchog sbyin// dgu pa ye shes dbang mchog ste// mthar phyin dbang mchog rdzogs par sbyin// de nas dbang mchog ldan bya'i phyir// so sor rigs kyi bu mchog des// bye brag so so'i yon rnams dbul// bdag lus srog dang nor la sogs// bdag nyid bu dang chung mar bcas// zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dbul// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i yon tan no// bran dang bcas pa'i 'dod yon lnga// de ltar rigs pa'i rdzas rnams kun// 'khor lo can gyi yon du 'bul// rin chen sna lnga'i bye brag dang// glang po rta dang ma her bcas// dgos pa'i bye brag ci yod par// rin chen rigs kyi yon yin no// ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams// rin chen sna lngas brgyan byas la// rgod ma la sogs mo yi ming// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yon yin no// glang po nor gyis brgyan pa dang// ma he nor gyis brgyan pa dang// shing rta nor gyis brgyan pa dang// theg pa'i bye brag thams cad la// rdzas kyi bye brag mang po bkal// las kyi rigs kyi yon yin no// rin chen bye brag sna tshogs dang// theg pa'i bye brag sna tshogs dang// bza' dang bca' ba'i bye brag rnams// yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas rnams kun// spyi yi dkyil 'khor yon du bshad// dkyil 'khor dam pa de dag tu// dbang gi rim pa thams cad kun// tshang bar bskur ba mthar phyin dbang// de yi gzungs ma de dag la// gong gi yon rnams dbul ba yin// dbang mchog thob pa'i slob ma la// dbang thob rtags re sbyin pa dang// dang po rgyu 'bras mi bslu bstan// gnyis pa phyag rgya bsgom pa bstan// gsum pa gsang ba'i nges don bshad// bzhi pa phyag rgya bzhi yang bstan// lnga pa chos kyi 'khor lor sbyin// drug pa chos kyi dung yang sbyin// bdun pa gsang ba'i man ngag sbyin// brgyad pa sems kyi gtan tshigs sbyin// dgu par gnyis med byung ba'o// de ltar rtags rnams tshang bar sbyin// de nas slob ma gnas bya ba// lus bkrus gos bzang gon nas ni// shar phyogs kha bltas mi smra nyal// de dus rmi lam brtag byas la// dbang mchog dam pa thob pa'i ltas// bde gshegs sngun

na gnas pa la// rang gi dbang nos rmi ba dang// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la// bdag gis 'khor bar rmi ba dang// 'gro ba rigs drug thams cad la// kha lo sgyur bar rmi ba dang// rgyal po dbang 'dus rmi ba dang// sa dang bar snang chu dag la// mi 'byin mi thogs 'gro rmi dang// rgya mtsho chen po'am chu bran la// gru gzings byas nas mi sgrol rmi// mang po'i kha dpon byas nas ni// 'thab pa'i g.yul las rgyal ba rmi// rdo rje thogs nas chos 'chad rmi// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang thob rtags// sa bdag rgyal po yin par rmi// kun la dbang sgyur las kyang bsgo// kun gyi slob dpon byed pa dang// phyi nang chos la thogs pa med// mi mthun gzugs la chos ston dang// lus la me 'bar chu yang 'brub// gzugs skye rnam pa mi 'dra ston// rnal 'byor mang po 'dus pa yis// kun gyis bkur ba'i 'os yin rmi// rgyal mtshan lag tu thogs nas ni// rnal 'byor kha dpon byed pa rmi// tshogs kyi slob dpon byed rmi dang// lag tu ba dan thogs nas ni// kun gyi dmag dpon byed pa dang// lag tu 'khor lo babs rmi na// 'khor lo can gyi dbang thob rtags// rin po che yi bang mdzod la// bdag ni rtag tu spyod pa dang// rin chen sna tshogs lus la brgyan// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po la// thogs pa med par spyod pa dang// sdug cing mdzes pa'i gos gon dang// phyi nang chos la nyan sems dang// glegs bam chos kyi sbyin pa gtong// mi 'os pa yi sgra thos dang// sa dang shing dang rdo dag dang// sngon ma thos pa'i sgra rnams kun// bdag gi thos par rmi ba dang// rin chen lag tu thogs pa dang// de yis sems can skong ba dang// bdag nyid yongs su tshims rmi ba// rin chen rigs kyi dbang thob rtags// pad+ma'i stan la 'dug pa dang// pad+ma'i rdzing na brtse ba dang// pad+ma'i 'bras bu za ba dang// pad+ma'i rtsa ba brko ba dang// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// don la dpyod cing glegs bam rnyed// de don gzhan la 'chad cing ston// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can la// ji ltar 'tshams pa'i chos 'chad dang// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras bcas kyis// bdag la bskor ba rmi ba dang// pad+ma lag par bcangs pa dang// pad+ma'i khang par zhugs rmi ba// 'od dpag med pa'i dbang thob rtags// phyi nang las la 'jug pa dang// ro yi phung por zhugs pa dag/ lus la me 'bar rmi ba dang// ral gri rnon pos gcod pa rmi// ri rab gling bzhi bcas pa rnams// bdag gi lag thogs rmi ba dang// nyi zla lag par thogs nas ni// sems can rnams kyi don byed rmi// 'jig rten pa yis longs spyod la// brel ba med par spyod pa dang// g.yul 'gog dgra rnams bsad rmi dang// g.yul las shin tu

rgyal rmi dang// rta dang glang chen la sogs pa'i// theg pa'i bye brag thams cad la// bdag gi dbang byas zhon rmis dang// sbyin pa'i bye brag thams cad la// chags pa med par gtong ba dang// bdag nyid bshas par rmi ba dang// bdag gi sha rnams bgos rmi ba// las kyi rigs kyi dbang thob rtags// rigs lnga'i rmi lam thams cad rmi// gsang ba gsum gyi dbang thob rtags// de yi gnyis med don rtogs rmi// 'on te rmi lam thams cad kun// med par chos nyid la gnas rmi// rigs lnga so so'i phyag mtshan rnams// rang gi lag pa brgyan rmi ba// spyi yi dkyil 'khor dbang thob rtags// rigs kyi bu mchog gang zhig gis// dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu// dbang rnams thob pa'i gang zag de// rgyal pos bkur zhing mchod pa dang// rgyal phran dang ni dmangs kyis bkur// rigs ngan bram ze'i rigs kyis kyang// mchod cing bkur sti byed par 'gyur// tshe ring nad med gnyer ma dengs// 'jig rten 'di yi bde ba yang// phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur// ji ltar smras pa ngag snyan 'gyur// spyod pa ci byas sdug par 'gyur// sems kyi bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dus pa kun gyis bstod par byed// bsngags pa dag kyang rjod par byed// rgyal po'i bu mo'i snying du sdug/ 'jig rten 'di ru grags pa yi// lha'am klu'am gnod sbyin rnams// mi mos mthu chen thams cad 'dul// rtse gcig sems ni mnyan par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i spun du dgongs// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras yin pas// de la dbang bskur byed pa'o// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// de yi rgyal po'am bdag por mthong// ma mo mkha' 'gros las rnams bsgrub// de yi rje dpon yin par mthong// sems can rnams kyis gtso bor mthong// de ltar dbang thob yon tan ni// bsam mi khyab ste dpag mi lang// sangs rgyas bde chen gsang ba ni// sku yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yis// nang zhugs dbang thob yon tan ni// ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du 'grub// yon tan gong las brjod med 'das// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// gsung mchog dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yi ge'i tshogs rnams bkod pa las// de nang zhugs nas dbang thob pa// yon tan gong dang 'dra ba thob// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// thugs mtshan phyag rgya bkod pa ru// nang zhugs dbang thob yon tan ni// gong gi yon tan de dang 'dra// sku yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yis// gti mug 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yis// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i phur

pa'o// yon tan dkyil 'khor gsang ba yis// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi// phrag dog 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// de ltar phur pa drug po yis// btab na ci 'dod spyin no zhes// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu bsgrags// rang gis snying gar zla dkyil 'khor// de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng so so'i yig 'bru dbus// tha ma bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor// bsnyen bsgrub gnyis la de bzhin te// las su sbyar bar bya ba'i sngags// so so'i las gang sngags kyis spro// de ltar bltas la sngags rnams ni// glod la ting 'dzin 'dres par bzlas// sngags kyi phreng ba dam par bya'o// bye ba sa ya bsnyen pa'i dus// nyis 'bum sum 'bum sgrub pa'i dus// stong ngam brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni// las kyi dus su shes par bya// mtshan ma'i bye brag mthong nas ni// de nas las gang brtsam par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// de las 'phros pa bsam mi khyab// de bas nges pa med par ni// dus gsum bde gshegs rnams kyi gsung// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las/ so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas ye shes gsang ba'i bdag/ phyi nang gsang gsum bdag nyid gtso// sngags kyi bdag por gyur pa des// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las// rdo rje'i gsung 'di bka' stsal to// glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis bya// til chen po yi snag tsha bya// dur khrod rkang gi smyu gus bris// brgyad dam bco brgyad nyi shu brgyad// nyin mtshan gung la bris byas te// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mkha' 'gro dam can 'khor bcas la// gtor mas yongs su tshims byas nas// lus la zhing chen gon nas ni// skra yang spyi bor bcing bar bya// lho phyogs kha bltas dang ba'i sems// dri zhim spos bltams bri bar bya// lugs su blugs sam 'bur du brkos// ri mor bri bar bya ba'i tshe// dur khrod ras ma btsal nas su// hUM gi dbyangs ring lan gsum blangs// ha ha'i gad mos mkha' 'gro bskul// de nas rnal 'byor blo ldan gyis// rang gi ting 'dzin gsal byas la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor la bri// mchod rten tsha tsha 'debs pa rnams// oM las bskyed de so so yi// bye brag gis ni gdab par bya// ma dang yi ge lnga rnams kyis// ci rigs par ni bskyed nas su// mchod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'bul// de rjes so so'i gzhung dag gis// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// gnyis med bstim la mchod

pa brtsam// bstod dang khrus gsol rim par bya// zhal bsro brtan bzhugs smon lam gdab// bkra shis pa yi tshigs bcad brjod// chos kyi sbyin pa rgya cher btang// yongs su rdzogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o// de nas rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la bltas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dgyes chen gsang gsum bdag/ brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// byas shing 'di la rtag gnas na// 'di don 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur// bcom ldan gsang mchog dgyes chen gyis// rdo rje chos kyi tshig gsan nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sa yi 'du ba byas pa dang// rdo rje'i thig gdab tshon rtsi yis// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pas ni// las de dag la 'jug mi bya// gal te zhugs par gyur na ni// dngos grub 'bras bu thag ring 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin bsgom// mkha' mnyam rdul bral ngo bo'i dbyings// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dbang chen rnams// gsal la dag cing dri med bsgom// b+hUM las gyur cing gzhal yas rdzogs// rdo rje me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs// rgyan dang stan rdzogs bltas gsal ba// der ni sngags kyi bdag por bsgom// bstod dang mchod pa la sogs pa// rim pa ma lus yongs rdzogs bsgom// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rol mo rgyan dang rdo rjes 'khr-igs// de dbus rang sngags rdo rje can// rnal 'byor blo ldan dam pas bsgom// gnyis med rdo rje can du 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas mchog/ rol mo rgyan dang 'khor los 'khrigs// de dbus rang sngags 'khor lo can// gnyis med don ldan rnal 'byor pas// bsgoms na 'khor lo can du 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor ni// rin chen rgyan dang rin chen 'khrigs// de dbus rang sngags rin po che// rnal 'byor blo mchog ldan pa des// bsgoms na rin chen 'byung ldan 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// 'od dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rol mo rgyan dang pad+ma 'khrigs// de dbus 'od dpag med pa bsgom// rang sngags pad+ma dag pa bskyed// bsgoms na pad+ma can du 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus gnas par// las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rol mo rgyan dang sna tshogs 'khrigs// de dbus rang sngags ral gri can// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pa des// bsgoms na las kyi sems dpar 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rol mo sna

tshogs kun dang ldan// de dbus rang sngags kun tu bzang// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pas ni// bsgoms na sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di dag bsgoms pa'i gnas dag ni// dur khrod rab tu dben pa'i gnas// ri bor sbrul gdug yod pa'i gnas// chu klung chu srin yod pa'i gnas// dom dred stag gzig nags 'dab dang// gdug pa'i gnas sam dben pa ru// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgoms na ni// ji ltar bsams pa'i 'bras bu dag/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// a las byung ba'i ban+d+ha'i nang// glang po'i sha dang khyi sha dang// rma bya'i sha dang shang shang sha/ rta sha lnga rnams bsam par bya// zla ba nyi ma chu sman dri// yig 'bru lnga yang bsam par bya// a las nam mkha' zla dkyil 'khor// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga ste// 'od 'bar la sogs bskyed bstim bya// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor kyis// bdud rtsi sbyangs pa'i las rnams bya'o// lce la paM las pad+ma ste// de steng hUM las rdo rje ste// chang bzung hUM gi rdo rje 'od// bdud rtsi stob pa'i las bya'o// thab mchog dam pa 'di bza' ste// dman pa'i zas la chags mi bya// nyan thos gzugs la mthong bar bskul// rang rgyal gzugs la de bzhin te// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// gnyis med mchod bstod dgyes par bstod// byang chub sems dpa' chen po la// zung 'jug don la gnyis med bskul// bde bar gshegs pa'i rang bzhin la// sems can don mdzad smon lam bskul// bde gshegs lnga yis sku gdung bskyed// rgyal mtshan bzhi yi rigs gsal bya// snang mdzad sems dpa'i lugs la sogs// ji lta'i rim pa bskyed par bya'o// cho ga'i rim pa go rim bzhin// kun la de bzhin bya ba yin// glegs bam zab mo'i gzhung 'di ni// yum mchog shes rab pha rol phyin// de la cho ga yongs rdzogs bya// bum pa brgyad dam bcu drug gam// phyogs kun bskor te dbang yang bskur// de zhu yi ge'i rang bzhin te// bde gshegs gsung gi byin gyis brlab// nyon mongs dug gsum gzer yang gdon// mkhas pas cho ga rim bzhin bya// mkha' dbyings rnam dag gzhal yas su// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting zhing// rang sngags sku yi dkyil 'khor rnams// bsgoms na dngos grub dam pa thob// mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dbyings nyid du// rang sngags gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnams// bsgoms na dngos grub dam pa thob// mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dbyings nyid du// rang sngags thugs kyi phyag mtshan rnams// bsgoms na dngos grub ya mtshan 'byung// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin rtse gcig gis// gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// ting 'dzin dkyil

'khor dam pa 'dis// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur ba'o// mtshan mar bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// ji ltar ting 'dzin bsgoms byas kyang// gnyis med 'bras bu thag ring 'gyur// gnyis med don la rab gnas mis// bde chen lha la rab gnas pa'i// de bas ting 'dzin nan tan bskyed// gnyis med don la brtson par 'bad// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal pos yang rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba// kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la/ rdo rje chos kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan gsang bdag dgyes pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngags rnams dang// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid thams cad kun// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad dang// sems can rnams la sman slad du// bde gshegs mgon pos bshad du gsol// de nas gsang bdag rgyal po yis// rdo rje chos kyi tshig gsan nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sems can chen po tshur nyon cig/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i don bshad kyis// legs par lus ngag yid gsum nyon// A+oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na A+oM/ 'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// mtha' phyin las gang snying po yin// 'di la rnal 'byor su mos pa// snang mdzad sems dpa' nyid 'drar 'gyur// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur gyis// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni// g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang du gzhug/ thugs kar brtan par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzad las kyi rgya// bsgrubs na sngags gang 'grub pa'i dus// ji ltar mchod par 'os pa'i rdzas// ji ltar bsam pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi 'bras bu brjod las 'das// byang chub mchog tu gdon mi za'o// gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las// A+oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya hUM/ sngags 'di phreng bar bskor cing bsgrub// legs par 'grub pa'i dus su ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug nas// lag g.yon rdo rje pang bar bzhag/ lag g.yas rdo rje sa gzhi gnon// khros pa'i sems bcas phyag rgya gtad// rab tu drag po'i sngags bzlas pas// sangs rgyas kun kyang skrag 'gyur na// bar gcod bdud rnams smos ci dgos// gzhan yang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'di// snying po dam pa 'di yin no// A+oM rat+na sam b+ha wa trAM/ sngags 'di ma nor don gyis bzlas// sngags 'di bsgrub pa'i dus su ni// lag g.yon rin chen pang par bzhag/ lag pa mchog sbyin phyag rgya ni// las gang byed pa'i dus su ni// phyag rgya gtad cing sngags bzlas pas// tshe zad shi las slong bar byed// nor

phyugs 'phel bar de 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'od dpag med pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i sngags// ma bcos dam pa 'di yin no// A+oM pad+ma a mi tA b+ha hrIH/ sngags 'di ma nor don gyi bzlas// ji ltar rtags rnams 'byung ba dang// lag gnyis bsnol nas pang par bzhag/ gdung ba'i sems bcas phyag rgya gtad// sngags bzlas pas ni sangs rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpa' las la bskul// rgyal po'i bu mo dbang du 'gyur// gzhan yang don yod grub pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i sngags// oM badzra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a// sngags 'di g.yo ba med par bzlas// grub dus phyag rgya bca' ba 'di'o// lag g.yon pang par bzhag nas ni// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa ni// las byed pa yi ngang du gtad// sngags bzlas phyag rgya gtad pa yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sems dbang 'gyur// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gzhan yang dbyings phyug ma yi sngags// sku gsung thugs las byung ba 'di'o// oM bud+d+ha lo tsa na oM/ sngags 'di zhi ba'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags de grub pa'i dus nyid du// lag mthil thal sbyar spyi gtsug bzhag/ sngags bzlas pas ni dregs pa kun// pho mo thams cad zhi sems 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i sngags// A+oM ga ga na lo tsa na hUM/ sngags 'di gdung ba'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags gang las la sbyar dus su// rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las// mdzub mo mig 'bras mthe bong mig/ las gang byed pa'i dus nyid du// phyag rgya bca' zhing gtad byas na// sngags bzlas sangs rgyas mnyes pa 'byung// zhi dang rgyas pa shi dang sos// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za'o// gzhan yang mA ma kI yi sngags// sku gsung thugs las 'byung ba 'di'o// A+oM ki ri ki ri ma mA kI hUM/ sngags 'di khros pa'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags grub dus su phyag rgya gtad// lag gnyis thal sbyar gung mo bsgreng// tshigs gsum par ni mdzub mo dgug/ rdo rjer byas te bsrung ba yi// gnas gsum dag tu gtug cing bsrung// de yis bsrung ba byas gyur na// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis mi tshugs// gzhan yang pad+ma dbyings phyug ma'i// sku gsung thugs las byung ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// oM ka te bi ka te ka tang+ka te swA hA/ sngags 'di dmigs med sems kyis bzlas// sngags grub dus su phyag rgya bca'// lag gnyis pad+ma kha phye'i tshul// bcangs te snying gar gtug par bya// gnyis med don thob bde bar 'gyur// gzhan yang las kyi dbyings phyug ma'i// sku gsung thugs las phyung ba 'di'o// oM tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ sngags 'di g.yo ba'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags grub bca' ba'i phyag rgya

'di'o// lag gnyis thal mo khang stong sbyar// mdzub gnyis sor mo sprad nas dgug/ de steng mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan// gung gnyis rtse sprad bsgrengs nas ni// srin lag mthe chung so sor bsnol// gang 'dod yul la gtad par bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// gang 'dod dbang du 'gyur bar nges// de las gzhan pa'i sngags rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi las sngags ni// dbang bskur bdag sbyin skabs su sbyar// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+ha wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje khu tshur bsdams bcangs la// mtheb gnyis gyen du bsgrengs pa ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi rgya// gang la byin brlabs sku yi gnas// rgyas bcings sngags bzlas byin brlabs na// gnyis med rdo rje lta bur 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// g.yas pa'i mthe bong rab bteg ste// g.yon gyi mthe bong nang du bcings// gang la byin brlab gsung gi gnas// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtad byas na// gsung ni skye 'gag med pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung du 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings la// g.yas pa'i mtheb bteg g.yon pa'i nang// gang la byin brlab thugs kyi gnas// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtad byas na// gzhan gyis sems 'phrog mi nus la// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su 'gyur// sku gzugs lugs ma 'bur du brkos// de la sogs pa ci rigs par// dbang bskur dus su brtsam bya ba// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings la// gung mo gnyis gshibs bsgrengs byas nas// cod pan dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// A+oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// sarba ta thA ga ta mu ku Ta rat+na trAM/ sngags brjod dbang bskur gnas su gtug/ rin po che dang rigs lnga yis// so so'i skabs kyi dbu rgyan sogs// skabs su rgyan du shes par bya// de la sogs pa sna tshogs pa// mkhas pas brtags shing ci rigs par// las rnams yongs su shes par bya'o// de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang// sngags la sogs pa brjod mi lang// chos dbyings brjod bral de las 'byung// 'byung ba nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa// brjod med bsam las mi dpog pa// yon tan bsam yas de las 'byung// zhes gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las/ phyag rgya rnam par spro ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje chos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho ma bcos ngo bo nyid// brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// dus

gsum sangs rgyas sku yi mchog/ ji ltar rtags snang khyod la bstod// e ma ho ma bsgribs mkha' ltar dag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog/ so so'i sgra skad rnams su gsal// rnam dag sgra chen khyod la bstod// e ma ho gnyis med ngo bo nyid// brjod med brjod bral tshig mtshon med// ye shes gtso gyur dam pa'i mchog/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs la bstod// sangs rgyas mngon gyur ye shes gtso// chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid// ye shes chen po rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku yi mchog/ me long ye shes ngo bo nyid// thams cad kun gyi bdag po gtso// 'khor lo 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum sangs rgyas yon tan mchog/ mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// yid bzhin nor bus re 'dod skong// nor bu 'dzin pa khyod la bstod// dus gsum sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bdag/ ma chags skyon gyis gos pa med// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum sangs rgyas phrin las mchog/ bya grub ye shes ngo bo nyid// ma rig dra ba gcod mdzad pa'i// don yod grub la phyag 'tshal bstod// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// ji lta'i sgo nas chos ston 'gyur// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// thabs ni ji lta bu yis ston// zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des// de bzhin nyid la dmigs shing/ de'i ngang las 'khor rigs lnga dang/ de las 'gyur ba'i gdul bya'i ngo gang la/ snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di phyung ngo// gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul bar 'gyur// la lar sku yi 'dul bar ston// la lar gsung gi 'dul bar ston// la lar thugs spros med pas 'dul// sprul pa'i sku ni sna tshogs pas// so so'i ngo bor 'dul ba la// kun la sdig spang tshul gyis so// dmyal ba rnams la gshin bu'i rje'i// sku yi dbyibs bstan tshul gyis 'dul// yi dwags rnams la kha 'bar ma// tshul mthun sku yis 'dul bar 'gyur// byol song rnams la glang mgo can// seng ge la sogs thams cad kyis// mthun bcas gzugs kyis chos ston to// mi rnams kun la 'khor lo sgyur// cha lugs bzung nas chos kyang ston// lha min rnams la thag bzangs ris// go mtshon mthun byas chos kyang ston// lha yi gnas su brgya byin gyis// mthun byas gzugs kyis chos kyang ston// tshangs ris rnams la tshangs chen gzugs// mthun byas gzugs kyis chos kyang ston// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// shAkya thub par mthun byas ston// rang rgyal rnams la rus pa'i gzugs// mthun byas tshul gyis

chos kyang ston// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// rnam par snang mdzad cha gnyis ston// 'gro ba'i bsam pas dbang bsgyur bas// ji ltar gdul bya skur bstan 'dul// gsung gi bye brag bsam yas te// bsdus pa'i tshig tsam bshad bya ba// la lar sde gsum dag tu bsdus// bsdus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar gsung rab bcu gnyis su// bsdus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar stong phrag brgyad cu yis// so so'i rgyud du chos kyang ston// gti mug gis 'thibs 'gro gang la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can kyis ston// zhe sdang gis ni gzir ba la// rdo rje 'dzin pas chos kyang ston// nga rgyal gyis khengs 'gro gang la// rin chen 'byung ba'i 'khor lo bskor// 'dod chags kyis gdungs 'gro gang la// 'od dpag med pas 'khor lo bskor// phrag dog gis myos 'gro gang la// don yod grub pas 'khor lo bskor// 'gro ba'i skad ni bsam yas par// bde gshegs gsung gis de snyed ston// thugs las nges med gzugs byung ba// 'gro rnams gcig par 'dzin rnams la// thugs kyi sprul pas mdo tsam bshad// la lar yongs su lung bstan tshul// la lar lhums su gshegs par ston// la lar mngal gnas bde bar ston// la lar lhums nas bltams bar ston// la lar phyogs bzhir gshegs par ston// la lar gzhon nur rol rtsed ston// la lar khyim pa lta bur ston// la lar khab las rab byung ston// la lar dka' thub mdzad par ston// la lar sems bskyed skyo bskyed ston// la lar bdud tshogs 'dul bar stod// la lar byang chub shing gi drung// la lar rdo rje gdan la gshegs// la lar cho 'phrul chen por ston// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis su// lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo bskor// la lar mya ngan 'das par ston// la lar sku gdung dag tu ston// la lar sprul pa'i mchod rten ston// la lar chos kyi glegs bam ston// la lar rten bcas sku yis ston// la lar 'byung ba'i sgra skad las// chos mthun skad kyis 'gro rnams 'dul// la lar bskul ba'i sa la gshegs// la lar 'jig rten zad par bsgom// la lar bsam gtan rim gyis bsgom// la lar 'khor lo'i tshul du snang// la lar dge 'dun sde bzhir snang// la lar thig le'i rang bzhin ston// la lar byang chub sems su ston// la lar spyan lnga rnam dag ston// la lar khyab 'jug gzugs su ston// la lar dbang phyug gzugs su ston// la lar skyong ba'i srung mar ston// 'gro drug ji ltar 'dul ba'i dbang// thugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas ston// de yi dus kyi 'gro ba rnams// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med don gyis 'dul bar

gsungs// log pa'i lam la ma gtogs so// khams gsum sangs rgyas bstan la dad// de snyed 'bras bu bden gnyis mthong// dus der 'khor du sprul pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa// ngo mtshar yid bde rmad du byung// rdo rje chos la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho don zab rdo rje chos// rab zab khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma ho sngags kyi bdag nyid can// yongs gsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma ho mi 'dul gcig kyang med// cho 'phrul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi mi 'dul med// 'di ni ngo mtshar ya mtshan che// zhes gsol pa dang/ rdo rje chos kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs rnams byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kun nyon cig/ gsang ba'i theg pa'i yang rtse la// su zhig dad cing mos gyur na// de yis las rnams thams cad 'grub// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// mi bsrung ba ni gang yang med// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// mi tshangs par yang spyad par bya// brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya// tshig rtsub pa yang smra bar bya// rin chen rigs su nges par skye// pha dang khu bo rtag tu bsad// mes po bu rnams rtag tu gzhom// spun dang tsha bo rnams spangs te// zhe sdang sems kyis med byas na// rdo rje 'dzin par de 'gyur ro// ma dang bu mo gdol ba mo// sring mo dang ni phyal ba la// chags pa'i sems kyi rab sbyar na// pad+ma'i rigs su nges par skyes// zas su bshang gci sha rnams dang// rnag dang khrag dron 'thung bas ni// las kyi rigs su nges par skye// ngan pa zos shing ngan pa spyad/ ji ltar ngan pa thams cad kyis// gtsang sme med par spyad byas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag skrag ste/ rab tu brgyal te kha bub tu 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje chos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag/ sngon gyi 'du shes ngan pa dran nas brgyal na// 'di dag gso bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'khyil pa yis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstims te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dran pa rnyed par byas so// de nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhal du mig mi 'dzum par bltas te 'khod do// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig pa las byung bu mchog rnams// sngon gyi 'du shes ngan pa

rnams// 'di la gnas par ma byed cig/ 'di nyid byang chub spyod pa'i gnas// gang la yod pa brgyad du shes// gang la ci 'dra'i de nyid srid pa yin// rnam bzhi bye brag drug las brgyad dkyil na// gang la snyoms 'jug de la yod pa la// de la de yod de la blta bar bya// gang las byung ba de las byung ba yin// de las de byung de nyid kho na'o// gsang ba'i shes rab thig le'i dbyings// bcu drug gnyis kyi dkyil na bzhugs// shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug la// kun tu rgyas btab dkyil 'khor yin// bdag nyid chen po lngar blta zhing// thur du 'phro zhing gyen du 'bar// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// steng gi snying po skul bar byed// de 'od thig le mnyam 'byor las// lnga gnyis drug gi dkyil na'o// bde ba chen po'i ro yis ni// dgyes pa chen po rtogs par bya// shes bya'i 'byung zad rtogs pa yis// de nyid sgyu mar rab snang ba// gzigs mo'i bde ba mtha' yas kyis// bde ba chen po'i sprin las spro// bcu gsum gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor na// thig le'i de nyid mnyam pa'i dbyings// kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso// bcu dang bzhir ni mngon rdzogs pa// gsum dang gnyis su yang dag gnas// kun gyi dngos por bdag nyid 'gyur// de la bsgyur ba'i dbang ba yin// yid la gnas pa de nyid de// de la gnyis rdzogs lhun gyis grub// thams cad de yi rgyan du che// gnyis rdzogs thig le mnyam sbyor bas// snying rje chen po yongs kyis 'char// bcu bzhi'i sems can gdul dka' la// sgyu ma'i sems can sgrol ba yi// rnal 'byor chen po'i 'od ldan spyod// 'od la rtag tu gang 'dug pa// sangs rgyas sras dang 'khor bcas kyis// thugs rje'i nyi ma shugs kyis 'byung// dngos med nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni// mtshan nyid la yang mi gnas so// de nyid sna tshogs par yang snang// phyag rgya lhun grub de nyid do// de ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin pas// de ltar dngos med dngos dang bral// ji ltar spyod cing bltas pa rnams// gnyis med don las g.yos pa med// dmyal ba yi dwags byol song rnams/ 'di yi sdug bsngal byang chub la// de yi gnas nyid bla med gnas// khams gsum 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// lus kyi sgrib pa mngon sangs rgyas// 'di zhes bya bar bstan pa ni// ngas kyang bstan du yod ma yin// rang rang lus ngag yid la ltos// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag the tshom dang bral nas rang rang gi lus ngag yid gsum gyis de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las sku

gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang/ 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te/ phyin ci log pa'i lam la dad pa'i dbang gis da ltar dngos po la lhag par mngon sum du gyur pa/ mngon pa'i lus ngag yid kyi mthu brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la skur pa 'debs shing 'jig rten phung bar byed pa/ khro gtum brlang tshig gi 'o dod 'bod cing/ sems can thams cad bred cing brgyal bar byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu rgyas par spyod pa'i sems can de/ chos nyid zhi bas 'dul ba'i skabs la ma babs te/ thabs mkhas pa'i rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la/ rdo rje chos kyis 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// e ma ho bde gshegs gsang ba'i bdag/ log pa'i lam du zhugs pa 'di// shin tu khros shing gtum par 'gyur// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs su sbyor mdzad pa// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// gdug pa'i nga rgyal zhi bar 'gyur// de phyir 'khor rnams bsdu bar mdzod// ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan gsang mchog dgyes bdag gis// rdo rje chos kyi tshig gsan nas// hUM zhes brjod de rab tu bsdus// rigs lnga la sogs 'khor rnams kun// thugs kar bsdus te mi snang mdzad// hUM zhes brjod de gzhal yas bsdus// sku yi dbyings su mi snang mdzad// hUM las gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang rab bsdus te// gsung gi gnas su mi snang mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ nyid kyi sku mi bzad par rab tu khros pa'i sku mi bzad par bya ba'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs las gsang ba'i sngags 'di brjod do// oM badzra kI li kI la ya ma hA rA dza ya hUM zhes brjod cing/ rab tu khros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rab tu khros pa'i sku mi bzad pa dbu stong mnga' ba/ phyag stong khams kyi rdul dang mnyam pa/ spyan bye ba stong mnga' ba/ zhabs kyis phyogs mtshams gnon pa'i sku shin tu mi bzad pa zhig tu gyur to// rab tu mi bzad pa de'i thugs ka nas// e bton te// e A kA sha hUM zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' gru gsum pa ste/ chos nyid bde ba'i rol pas bde ba bskyed par mdzod/ de nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas yaM phyung ste/ karma rak+Sha haM zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor yum dam tshig sgrol ma'i mkha'i rang bzhin du/ rdo rje rgya

gram ba dan bzhis mtshan pa cig tu gyur te/ phrin las thogs pa med pa'i don mdzad do// de nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas raM bton te/ raM badzra dz+wa la raM zhes brjod pas// 'byung ba me'i rang bzhin/ yum gos dkar mo'i mkha' gru gsum pa ste gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu smin par mdzad do// de nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas/ ma bton te ma hA rak+ta dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ khrag gi rgya mtsho'i gting mtha' med pa/ yum mA ma kI'i mkha' zlum po ste/ sdug bsngal dbang du bsdus nas gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du mdzad do// de nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas suM bton te/ suM sa ma ya hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba sa'i rang bzhin/ yum sangs rgyas spyan gyi mkha'i rang bzhin gru bzhi pa bton te/ khams gsum thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po la gnas par mdzad do// de nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas/ keM bton te keM ni ri ti maN+Da la zhes brjod pas/ keng rus kyi ri rab gcig tu gyur te/ 'khor ba gnas su dag cing cho 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas rin po che'i b+hUM smug nag bton te/ b+hUM b+han+d+ha dz+nyA na tsakra dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba/ 'bras bu lnga mngon par shar bar mdzad do// de nas yang A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya ma hA kro d+h-i hUM/ zhes pas de bzhin nyid kyi ngang las yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma mngon du phyung ste/ nyid kyi sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur to// de nas yang yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI li kI la ya bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Dal phaT phaT/ ha la ha la zhes brjod pas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ zhe sdang rjes su dran par gyur to// nyid kyi sku las kyang rab tu mi bzad pa'i sku 'bar ba/ gsung gtum tshig tu smra ba mang po 'thon pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs so// kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// tshig rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu tshig go// 'thor rab tu 'thor/ kun tu rab tu 'thor ro// de ltar khros pa'i rgyal po'i cho 'phrul byung ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten phung bar byed pa'i gdug pa can/ lus ngag yid gsum gyi dregs pa ston pa'i dbang phyug chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ khyab 'jug rnams rang rang gi mthu stobs ston cing rab tu khro gtum mo// de nas 'jigs byed kyi bdag po badzra kI la ya/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ sarba big+h+naM baM hUM hUM hUM phaTaH zhes brjod pas/ sku gsung thugs las phyung ba'i khro bo de dag gis/ phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can

de dag bsgral nas slar 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nur gyur te/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yas dkar ba/ g.yo dmar ba/ dbus mthing nag/ zhal shin tu yang rngams pa/ zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ rdo rje'i gshog pas gtams pa// skra kham nag gyen du brdzes pa/ khrag 'thung lngas dbu+u la brgyan cing g.yang gzhi ya ba kor du mnabs pa/ glang chen gyi ko rlon go zur mnabs pa thod pa skam rlon gyi phreng bas brgyan pa/ sbrul rigs bzhis mdo bzhir brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ dur khrod kyi me ri smug nag gi nang na bzhugs shing/ yum ral gcig ma dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa gcig tu gyur te/ bran jo bo la bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing/ gdug pa can gyi dregs pa rnams zhabs 'og tu brdzis te gnas par gyur to// de nas khrag 'thung chen pos khros pa'i nga rgyal chen por byin te dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ hUM badzra kI la ya hUM dz+nyA na badzra zhes brjod de/ ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa ni g.yas kyi dang por byin/ ye shes lnga'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa ni phyag g.yas kyi bar mar byin/ nyon mongs pa gzir ba'i ri rab ni g.yas kyi tha mar byin/ thugs rje chags pa'i b+han+d+ha ni g.yon gyi dang por byin te dbang bskur ro// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa can btul nas de'i lag cha kha T+wAM ga phrogs nas/ g.yon gyi bar ma na dpa' rtags su bsnams so// de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la yas phyogs skyong ba bsgral ba'i ched du rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje phur pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las thon to// oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+wAM baM hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ A+oM rat+na kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ A+oM karma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ zhes brjod pas khrag 'thung khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ rdo rje khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ rin chen khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ pad+ma khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ las kyi khro bo las kyi phur pa dang/ rigs lnga las gyur pa'i las kyi phur pa bcu 'thon par gyur to// de yang sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum du snang ba/ dbu skra kham pa ral pa zur gsum pa gyen du snang ba/ dbu la rigs lnga rdzogs pa/ thugs ka na sa bon dang ldan pa e'i gdan la sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i spyan snga na/ bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la yas/ rab tu khros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM dzaH zhes brjod pas/ bgegs kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thang

gcig yud tsam gyis rang dbang med par 'dus par 'gyur ro// de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu la 'di skad ces bskul lo// hUM mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// badzra 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// thugs mchog mnyam pa'i dbyings nas sprul pa 'gyed// zhe sdang bdud 'dul gcer bu ral pa can// zhe sdang 'dod chags can gyi snying la thob// hUM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// sku mchog mnyam pa'i dbyings nas sprul pa 'gyed// mthing nag gcer bu mi bzad ral pa can// ngag 'khyal rdzun du smra ba'i snying la thob// hUM mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rat+na 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// yon tan sku la 'od phung dbyings su thim// srog gcod log par lta ba'i snying la thob// hUM mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// gsung mchog bsgrags nas 'gro ba ma lus 'dul/ phra ma ma byin len pa'i snying la thob// hUM mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrin las drag pos log lta tshar gcod pa// ngag rtsub gnod sems can gyi snying la thob// ces bskul bas/ sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i phyag g.yon gyi mtha' ma la/ rdo rje khros pa las kyi phur pa dang/ bud+d+ha khros pa las kyi phur pa dang/ rat+na khros pa las kyi phur pa dang/ pad+ma khros pa las kyi phur pa dang/ karma khros pa las kyi phur pa rnams kyi ske nas bzung nas/ so so'i gnas su btab ste bsgral lo// de nas khrag 'thung chen po badzra kI la yas/ 'od rab tu 'bar zhing za byed rdo rje gzhon nur byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ badzra dz+wa la raM/ zhes brjod pas/ me dpung dud kha 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i dbus na lhag par yang bzhugs/ phyag g.yon gyi dang po na bsnams pa'i me des las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas/ phung po lhag ma ha ha zhes zhal du gsol nas/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa gsol bar mdzad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la yas/ rdo rje chos kyi lce la hUM bzhag ste/ rdo rje rgya gram du byin gyis brlabs nas/ lag par yang rdo rje byin te/ las kyi he ru kar dbang bskur ro// de'i tshe las kyi he ru ka yis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// e ma ho khrag 'thung rgyal ba'i gtso// gnyis su med las thams cad snang// srid gsum gtsor gyur sems can 'di// ngan song gsum du skye nges la// 'di lta'i thugs rje dpyang thag can// 'khor bar yang nas yang du 'khor// 'di lta'i sems can nyon mongs la// 'di lta'i rdzu 'phrul bstan

pa mtshar// 'di lta'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar che'o// de yi rjes su bsgrub pa yis// dkyil 'khor dam pa ji ltar bsgoms// dregs pa'i ma dang bu mo dang// chung ma dbang du mi 'tshal lam// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms// de rjes rim pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs par shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjer gtams byas nas// ye shes khro bo 'grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyings su bdag bskyed cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs bya'i phyir// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig/ de rjes phyi nang gsang gsum dbang// byin rlabs bdag la stsal nas ni// de nyid du ni mi snang gyur// de nas sras mchog yab yum gyis// gnyis med byang chub sems las ni// 'byung ba'i gsang sngags 'di yin no// hUM kA ra dang rnam par rgyal// dbyug sngon gshin rje'i gshed po dang// mi g.yo rta mgrin rgyal po dang// gzhan gyis mi thub bdud rtsi 'khyil// khams gsum rnam rgyal stobs po che// rang rang sku yi dbyings su 'thon// sgra 'byin snyems ma sder mo dang// dur khrod gtun khung gtum mo dang// mda' snyems ma dang rlung 'byin ma// gsod ma bskyod ma rnam kyis ni// khro bo'i sku la rab 'khril 'thon// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dur khrod chas kyis legs par brgyan// gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// gshog pa rdo rje 'bar bas gtams// sku stod rdo rje'i go cha dang// zhing dang glang chen ko rlon mnabs// sku smad stag spags sham thabs can// brang gis 'gro ba chen pos brgyan// de dag yab yum rol pa las// byang chub sems las byung ba'i 'khor// phag dang smrig bu stag dang ni// bya rgod g.yag dang bya rog dang// sha ba 'ug pa gzig dang khwa// byi la pu shud spyang ki khyi// khra dang seng ge pha wang dang// dom dang sre mo dred dang ni// byi ba'i mgo can la sogs pa'i// sprul pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis// srid pa'i rlung yang mi 'chor gtams// de nas yang khro bo rnams kyis gdan rnams dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir/ sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nus/ phyag gi dregs pa rnams kyis brang la bsnol te btsir bas/ phung po'i tshogs

mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang na/ dran pa med par gnas pa las/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs ka nas khro bo sme ba brtsegs pa bton nas mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho rngubs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi 'od zer lus la bstims pas/ slar dran pa rnyed nas bden pa mthong ngo// de'i tshe dpal chen po'i 'bangs su mna' bor te lus khro bo rnams kyi gdan khri ru phul te/ grub pa lang kar khas 'ches shing phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs bskyang bar dam bcas so// de'i tshe phyogs skyong ba rnams/ khro bo rnams kyis zhabs 'og tu bzhag go/ de nas yang dpal chen po badzra kI la yas/ srin mo'i tshogs gdul ba'i phyir/ gsang ba rol pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ hUM hUM hUM e A' ra li ru lu ru lu hUM dzaH/ zhes brjod pas/ dregs pa chen po'i ma dang bu mo dang/ chung ma'i tshogs kyi gtso mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas nas/ badzra kI la ya'i thad du yud tsam gyis 'dus so// 'dus nas kyang mkha' gcig tu bcug ste// sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ ha ha zhes brjod pas/ gau rI ma dang/ tsau rI ma dang/ pra mo hA dang/ be trA lI dang/ puk+ka sI dang/ g+hasma rI dang/ sma sha nI dang/ tsaN+Da lI la sogs pa re re la yang 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas nas/ rang rang gi stan dang lag cha gdug pa dang bcas te/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la 'khod do// de nas yang he he zhes brjod pas/ sid+ha ma dang/ bya g+h+ri ma dang/ sriM gal ma dang/ shwa na ma dang/ gr-i D+ha ma dang/ kang+ka ma dang/ kA ka ma dang/ u lU ma la sogs te de dag re re la yang 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas nas/ rang rang gi stan dang lag char bcas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi me ri'i khyams la 'khod do// de nas yar phaT ces brjod pas// lcags kyu ma dang/ zhags pa ma dang/ lcags sgraug ma dang/ dril bu ma dang/ de dag re re la yang 'khor grangs med pas bskor te/ me'i khyams kyi sgo'i thad du 'khod do// de nas srin mo rnams la phaT ces brjod pas/ rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis bkye'o// de nas yang dpal khrag 'thung chen po badzra kI la yas/ gsang ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams yongs su rdzogs par bstan nas/ e A ra li ru lu ho dzaH/ zhes brjod pas dregs pa ma dang bu mo'i tshogs rnams 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas nas/ rang rang gi lag cha gdug pa stan du chas te/ ci bgyi zer zhing thad du 'dus pa la dam tshig phog cing las kyi dbang bskur te/ gzhal yas khang gi phyi

rol du bzhag go/ rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las gdug pa can btul ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dgyes pa che// 'di bsgrub 'tshal ba'i rnal 'byor pas// gnas ni gang dang gang du bgyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bre brag rnams ni ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas ston pa kI la yas// karma he ru ka yi tshig gsan nas// gnas kyi khyad par 'di gsungs so// phur pa bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams ni// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig drung// rgya gram lam du bya ba dang// ngam grog gnas dang khang stong du// rdo rje drag po'i dkyil 'khor bya// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang// grims 'byin shugs kyis ting 'dzin gsal// de la thabs dang rtags med na// bdag gi gzugs phung brlag pa dang// tshe dang dge ba'i bar chad 'ong// nags tshal chen po ga na bar// der ni legs par dpyad pa yi// klu yi gnas dang 'byung po'i srang// sa yi bgegs dang 'byung ba'i sa// tsha sgo dmyal ba'i chu med par// las kyi bya ba gzhung brtsams nas// bkra shis don gyi gnas yin pas// bsgrub yun ring bas zhi rgyas 'grub// me tog gling dang rin chen ri// dpag bsam shing dang skad snyan bya// 'bru sna tshogs dang gnam sa legs// dbyibs legs lung pa ran pa ni// bkra shis gnas su dbang dgug 'grub// gnas kyi dam pa yin par bshad// drag po'i las su bya ba dang// dang por phur pa bsgrub pa'i gnas// gnas ri tsher ma can gyi shing// gcan gzan gdug pa sna tshogs yod// gnam ni gri mda' ral gri'i shul// sa ni gru gsum me dpung 'dra// logs la dur khrod gnas yod pa/ mkhas pas brtags te btsal byas nas// 'di ni phur pa bsgrub gnas yin// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams dang// dug shing gdug pa yod pa dang// brag la rang rod yod pa dang// grog po ngan pa gting zab dang// stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi lce// sdig pa'i rwa 'dra chu srin kha// ban glang sna 'thab brag chu'i bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs pa// 'di ni sras mchog bsgrub gnas yin// bsad pa'i gnas su bstan pa ni// sngon chad lha mi phung sa dang// g.yul bkye ba dang mtshon dum dang// bsad bcad sa dang ma rungs 'dus// srin po bsgral ba'i bcas gzhi dang// srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang// g.yul ngo bgos pa'i sa mkhar gling// mang po bsad cing phung ba'i sa// brag ni srin po rus pa 'dra// ri ni thal phung bsnyil ba 'dra// lung pa me yis bsreg 'dra

ba// rtsi shing keng thod gzings 'dra ba// sgang gshongs mi ro sbas pa 'dra// 'di ni phur pa 'debs pa'i gnas// sems la chos nyid mi gsal zhing// nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel ba ni// gnas 'di dag tu bya ba min// rnal 'byor nyams med de brlag 'gyur// de bas gzhung dang mthun pa yi// bkra shis pa yi gnas dag tu// yun ring bsrings na gdon to med// dam tshig ma nyams nges thub dang// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo can gyis// gnas ni de dang de dag tu// cho ga'i las 'di brtsam byas na// nges par 'grub pa gdon mi za// de lta bu+u yi sa rnyed nas// snang dang mi snang bdag po la// rin dang bden pas bkrol la bslang// de nas byin brlab mtshams kyang gcad// ma rungs yod na gtor ma byin// de nas zhag grangs 'di tsam mam// drag po'i las 'di ma grub par// gnas 'di rnal 'byor bdag g.yar bas// gtor ma sbyin pa 'di longs la// ma grub par du gzhan du dengs// de skad byas la gtor ma sbyin// bsgo ba'i las rnams gnyer yang gtad// de nas stegs bu gzhung bzhin brtsig/ dam rdzas chag chag gzhung bzhin btab// kha dog tshon rnams bkye byas nas// dbus kyi lte ba'i zlum po la// thig bzhi gdabs pa'i ling tshe brgyad// dbus su drag po gru gsum bri// mtha' mar tshon gyi 'khor lo brgyad// gru chad bzhis ni rab tu brgyan// sgo bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan dag dang// phyogs skyong gdan dang pad+mar ldan// nyi zla bzhi rnams gsal byas nas// dang po sngags kyi bdag por bskyed// de bzhin brgya dang brgyad du brgyad dang brgyad kyang 'dug bstan// bzhi po dag tu gang bstan dang// nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa// mkhas pas gzhung bzhin dgod par bya// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs dag la// dri za bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// rnam rgyal yab yum bdag po bskyed// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gshin rje gshed po yab yum bskyed// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// chu bdag bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// rta mgrin rgyal po yab yum bskyed// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yab yum bskyed// shar lho 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// me lha bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// dbyug pa sngon po yab yum skyed// lho nub 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// bden bral bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// mi g.yo mgon po yab yum bskyed// nub byang 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// rlung lha bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gzhan gyis mi thub yab yum

bskyed// byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// dbang ldan bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// khams gsum rnam rgyal yab yum bskyed// mdun du gza' skar gdan la ni// hUM chen yab yum bskyed par bya// rgyab tu sa bdag gdan la ni// stobs chen yab yum bskyed par bya// gru chad bzhi la dgod pa ni// b+han+d+ha bdud rtsi'i bkang ba bzhi// gnyis med bdud rtsi'i mchod phyir dgod// shar sgor nyi ma'i gdan la ni// pu shud mgo can bskyed par bya// lho sgor nyi ma'i gdan la ni// skye ka'i mgo can bskyed par bya// nub sgor nyi ma'i gdan la ni// srin bya'i mgo can bskyed par bya// byang sgor nyi ma'i gdan la ni// khra yi mgo can bskyed par bya// las kyi lha rnams rim bzhin dgod// rdzas su dgod par bya ba ni// b+han+d+ha bu ga gcig nang du// dbang po lnga rnams blugs pa ni// bdag po yab yum mtshan mar bzhag/ yan lag bzhi yi ni sag bcu// khro rgyal yab yum rnams kyi rdzas// yan lag bzhi yi mtshan ma ni// sgo ba rnams kyi mtshan mar bzhag/ thod pa dum bu bcu drug ni// lha mo bcu drug mtshan mar dgod// so dang 'bar 'bur thams cad kun// pho nya rnams kyi rdzas su dgod// sgal tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// ci bgyi tshogs kyi mtshan mar dgod// so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru rnams// rang rang so so'i mtshan ma la// yab yum byang chub sems de yis// dur khrod smyug gus bri bar bya// thod pa dum bu dgu nang du// til chen mar khu khadagur gdags// de rjes sha chen thang mar brdal// rak+ta chen po rgya mtshor bskyil// keng rus tshogs ni ri ltar spung// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi 'chad// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi brgyad dag tu// stag dang chu srin chu keng dang// zhing gi rgyal mtshan brgyad rnams gzug/ zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sprin ltar gtibs// zhing phran mang po'i 'phan du bkram// de ltar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// sku yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bri// gzhan rnams gong dang mthun par dgod// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// rnam par rgyal ba yab yum bsgom// spyan sngar sngags kyi bdag po'o// de ltar gsal bar bltas pa ni// sku yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// gti mug 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// chags pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba dgod// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// rta mchog rol pa yab yum bsgom// rgyab tu sngags kyi bdag po ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// yon tan dkyil

'khor dam pa ni// rin chen myu gu brgyad du bri// gru gsum me 'od 'bar bar dgod// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// gshin rje'i gshed po yab yum bskyed// g.yas su sngags kyi bdag po'o// yon tan dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i phur bu ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rigs zhes bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// dang po tshad med snying rje bskyed// byang chub sems la dga' ba ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i lam mchog yin// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// khrag 'thung thugs la gnas pa ni// ye shes rtse mo mchog yin te// hUM gsum las ni 'das pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// 'di ni gzug dang byin rlob dang// bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang// dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dang// phun sum tshogs pa bdun po yis// las gang sgrub pa 'grub par byed// dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi yis brgyan pa'i gnas// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// byang chub lnga las bzhengs pa yi// las kyi he ru bsgom par bya// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni// dri za bsnol ba'i gdan dag la// byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs pa'i// rnam par rgyal ba yab yum bsgom// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs pa'i// gshin rje gshed po yab yum bsgom// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// klu gdug bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs pa'i// rta mgrin rgyal po yab yum bsgom// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs pa'i// stobs chen yab yum bsgom par bya// sgo ma yan chad gzhan bzhin gsal// hUM bsgril lnga dang nyi zla dang// phyag mtshan 'od dang bcas pa lnga// so sor rtog pa me long dang// mnyam nyid ye shes chos dbyings dang// bya ba nan tan ye shes lnga// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku ru brtag/ las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yi// thugs kyi rigs las byung zhes bya'o// dkyil 'khor de yis phrag dog 'joms// las kyi phur pa yin zhes gsungs// dkyil 'khor de dag nyid la'ang// bye brag tu ni gsungs pa'o// rnal 'byor blo ldan dam pa yis// rdo rje'i g.yab mos g.yab nas ni// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// gnyis su med par bstim byas nas// bdag nyid lhun grub dkyil 'khor la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsam// bdag nyid thugs kyi 'od zer las// lha mo mang po thon nas ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams la mchod// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i thugs ka nas// lha mo mang po slar 'thon

nas// bdag la mchod pa dbul bar brtag/ de rjes bstod pa byed par bsam// hUM bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yis// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i klong dkyil na// khro bo khro mo rnam bzhugs pa// sku ni cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs// hUM dbu skra kham nag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil cing srid rtser 'bar// mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang mig ni// log par lta ba 'dul ba'i spyan// hUM mche ba zang yag gtsigs pa ni// skye shi'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs las// phyag rgya sna tshogs cing yang snang// hUM thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprin ltar gtibs// byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'gyu// rngams pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs// sprul pa'i thog thog char bzhin 'bebs// hUM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// klan ka chen po bdud la tshol// kyal ka chen po bgegs la tshol// yal gam can la dngos grub stsol// hUM thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs gyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab mdzad cing// bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// 'grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// hUM 'khyil zhing rgyan yang 'khyil pa che// sems la brjod med sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags// hUM srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la phyag 'tshal bstod// khro bo longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badzra kI la ya la 'di
